T04D3903:102a-10: dang / skur pa 'debs par byed pa'o //
T04D3903:102a-11: lta ba ni 'dir nyon mongs pa can gyi shes
T04D3903:102a-12: rab ste gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang
T04D3903:102a-13: dag par gcod cing mi dge ba la 'jug la
T04D3903:102a-14: dge ba rnams la ma yin pa'o //
T04D3903:102a-15: gang de las gzhan pa log par lta ba theg
T04D3903:102a-16: pa gzhan la sogs par lta ba'i mtshan nyid can
T04D3903:102a-17: de thams cad ni log par kun du rtog pa
T04D3903:102a-18: ste / des dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod par 'gyur
T04D3903:102a-19: ba ni ma yin no zhes pa yid kyi las
T04D3903:102a-21: kha cig gsum po 'di rnams bsam pa kho na'i
T04D3903:102a-22: khyad par las rig par bya la gnod sems ni
T04D3903:102a-23: dmigs pa'i khyad par las kyang 'dod do zhes zer
T04D3903:102a-24: ro // mi dge bcu po 'di rnams la so
T04D3903:102a-25: sor 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis
T04D3903:102a-27: gang gi phyir srog gcod pa gti mug las skyes
T04D3903:102a-28: pa yod de chos kyi blos mchod sbyin byed pa
T04D3903:102a-29: rnams phyugs gsod pa dang rgyal po rnams ma rungs
T04D3903:102a-30: pa gsod pa dang sog po par sig pa rnams
T04D3903:102a-31: ma dang pha gsod pa dang /
T04D3903:102a-32: de bzhin du zas med par 'jog pa dang /
T04D3903:102a-34: 'ga' zhig sbrul la sogs pa dang ri dag sa la sogs pa gsod pa ste /
T04D3903:102a-35: sbrul dang sdig pa dang tam pa ka la sogs
T04D3903:102a-36: pa mi rnams la nye bar 'tshe bar byed pa
T04D3903:102a-38: ri dags dang phyugs dang bya dang nya la sogs
T04D3903:102a-39: pa rnams longs spyod kyi don du'o zhes log par
T04D3903:102a-40: lta bas 'jug pa thams cad gti mug las skyes
T04D3903:102a-41: pa'i sbyor ba'o // de bzhin du ma byin par
T04D3903:102a-42: len pa la ste 'dir gti mug las skyes pa'i
T04D3903:102a-43: sbyor ba ni chos kyi blos rgyal po rnams ma
T04D3903:102a-44: rung sa pa tshar gcad pa'i don du dang /
T04D3903:102a-45: bram ze rnams kyang 'di thams cad tshangs pa bram
T04D3903:102a-46: ze rnams la byin pa la dmangs rnams sto bas
T04D3903:102a-47: kyis yongs su longs spyod de /
T04D3903:102a-48: de'i phyir bram ze len pa ni rang gi len
T04D3903:102a-49: pa'o zhes smra ba rnams kyi ste 'di rnams la
T04D3903:102b-0: 'dir pha @102b rol dang rang gi 'du shes su
T04D3903:102b-2: de bzhin du 'dod pas log par spyod pa'i sbyor ba gsum las skyes pa ste /
T04D3903:102b-3: gti mug las skyes pa ni chos kyi blos sog
T04D3903:102b-4: po par sig pa rnams ma la bgrod pa dang
T04D3903:102b-5: bram ze rnams kyi ba lang byin gyi mchod sbyin
T04D3903:102b-6: la gang 'di skad smra ba ste /
T04D3903:102b-7: bram zes ba lang byin gyi mchod sbyin byas nas
T04D3903:102b-8: lo gcig gis ba lang gi brtul zhugs su 'gyur
T04D3903:102b-9: ro // cho ga can gyis chu btung ngo rtsva rnams gcod do //
T04D3903:102b-11: sring mo dang nye ba dang rigs gcig pa dang nye bar 'gro ste /
T04D3903:102b-12: de ltar glang bu 'di 'jig rten las rgyal bar
T04D3903:102b-13: 'gyur ro zhes smra ba dang 'jig rten rgyang 'phen
T04D3903:102b-14: pa rnams kyang ma la bgrod pa ni /

T04D3903:102b-17: / 'dir chos ma yin pa cung zad kyang med do zhes 'jug pa'o //
T04D3903:102b-18: de bzhin du brdzun du smra ba'i sbyor ba ste /
T04D3903:102b-19: gti mug las skyes pa ni skyon ma mthong ba las te /
T04D3903:102b-20: de bzhin bram ze rnams bud med rnams la dang
T04D3903:102b-21: bag ma len pa'i dus dang srog dang nor srung
T04D3903:102b-22: ba'i don du brdzun du smra ba ni ltung ba
T04D3903:102b-23: med do zhes smra ba lta bu'o //
T04D3903:102b-24: de bzhin du dngos gzhi dang 'jug kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams kyis so //
T04D3903:102b-25: de bzhin du gzhan rnams la yang 'dod chags dang
T04D3903:102b-26: zhe sdang dang gti mug sngon du song bas sbyor
T04D3903:102b-28: phra ma'i sbyor ba gti mug las skyes pa ni
T04D3903:102b-29: phra ma byas pa la nyes ba ci yang med
T04D3903:102b-30: do zhes pa'o // de la byed par 'dod pa'i
T04D3903:102b-31: rjes su de la bya ba gang yang rung ba
T04D3903:102b-32: cung zad de ni sbyor ba'i gnas skabs so //
T04D3903:102b-33: sbyor ba des de'i tshe'am dus gzhan du las de
T04D3903:102b-34: yongs su rdzogs pa ni mthar thug par byed pa'i
T04D3903:102b-35: bdag nyid dngos gzhi'i las kyi lam mo //
T04D3903:102b-36: de'i rjes su gang rjes su sgrogs pa dang gang
T04D3903:102b-37: yang dag par dga' ba dang gang yang gzhan de
T04D3903:102b-38: dang mthun pa'i bya ba de ni rjes so //
T04D3903:102b-39: 'o na yid kyi brnab sems la sogs pa rnams
T04D3903:102b-40: la bsam pa ni ci sbyor ba ni ci ste
T04D3903:102b-41: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T04D3903:102b-42: de'i gzhi la de ltar 'du shes pa dang de ltar 'dod pa ni bsam pa'o //
T04D3903:102b-43: de'i bya ba yang dag par 'dzin pa ni sbyor ba'o //
T04D3903:102b-44: de lta nyid du nges pa ni mthar thugs par
T04D3903:102b-45: byed pa'i las kyi lam mo zhes pa bye brag
T04D3903:103a-1: / mi dge bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams kyang
T04D3903:103a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba ste ltung ba ni
T04D3903:103a-3: 'da' ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:103a-4: de lta mod kyi dge ba'i bsam pa can gyi
T04D3903:103a-5: dge ba'i rkyen gyi dbang 'ba' zhig las rjes su
T04D3903:103a-6: mthun pa'i rkyen de dang de las /

T04D3903:103a-9: rnam par drang bar 'dod pa dang 'dul bar 'dod
T04D3903:103a-10: pa nyid kyis 'da' ba ni ltung ba med do

T04D3903:103a-12: bar bya ba dang kun nas slong ba po'i bye
T04D3903:103a-13: // brag gis so // de la lus dang ngag
T04D3903:103a-14: gi las thams cad kun nas bslang bar bya ba
T04D3903:103a-15: ste yid kyi ni kun nas slong ba po'o //

T04D3903:103a-17: la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang de las cig shos
T04D3903:103a-18: so // de la 'dod chags la sogs pas kun
T04D3903:103a-19: nas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las thams cad
T04D3903:103a-20: so // mi dge ba'o // 'dod chags med pa
T04D3903:103a-21: la sogs pas kun nas bslang ba thams cad ni
T04D3903:103a-23: ji skad du bzhi brgya par gsungs pa /
T04D3903:103a-24: byang chub sems dpa' kun rtog las //
T04D3903:103a-25: dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'o //
T04D3903:103a-26: gang phyir de'i yid dbang gyur na //
T04D3903:103a-27: thams cad dge ba nyid du 'gro //
T04D3903:103a-29: de bzhin du slob dpon tsandra go mis kyang /
T04D3903:103a-30: sems dge ba dang byams nyid las //
T04D3903:103a-31: snying brtse ldan la ltung ba med //
T04D3903:103a-33: snying brtser bcas na mi dge med //
T04D3903:103a-35: byang chub kyi spyod pa la 'jug par yang //
T04D3903:103a-36: snying rje ldan dang don mthong la //

T04D3903:103a-41: rgan por myur bar 'dod do zhes //
T04D3903:103a-42: phul bas bub ste shi na yang //
T04D3903:103a-44: dgra bcom nang pa rang nyid kyis //
T04D3903:103a-45: rang gi mgrin pa nyes mthong ba //
T04D3903:103a-46: de ni shi na g-yog byed pa'i //
T04D3903:103a-47: dge slong de ni skyon brten min //
T04D3903:103a-48: gzhan la gzhan gyi 'du shes kyis //
T04D3903:103a-49: bsad par gyur kyang skyon yod min //
T04D3903:103a-50: zhes pa 'dul bar gsal bar gsungs so //

T04D3903:103a-52: gang phyir gso ba'i blo yis ni //
T04D3903:103a-53: mtshams med pa la nye byed pa //
T04D3903:103a-54: mchod rten rko ba skyon ma yin //
T04D3903:103b-1: dge ba'i bsam pas thub dbu la //
T04D3903:103b-2: mchil lham zung ni bzhag pa dang //
T04D3903:103b-3: de bzhin gzhan gyis bsal ba dag / rgyal srid 'bras bu thob par 'gyur //
T04D3903:103b-4: de phyir bsam pa'i rtsa bas ni //
T04D3903:103b-5: sdig dang bsod nams rnam par gzhag / ces pa lung du gsungs gang phyi //
T04D3903:103b-6: sems dge ba la ltung ba med //
T04D3903:103b-7: de phyir brtse ba'i bdag rnams kyis //
T04D3903:103b-8: gzhan la phan gang thams cad byed //
T04D3903:103b-9: las de thams cad dge ba ru //
T04D3903:103b-10: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bsgrags //
T04D3903:103b-11: de ltar yul gyi bye brag gis //
T04D3903:103b-12: gang tshe las kyi lam la gnas //
T04D3903:103b-13: de tshe gang du'ang mkhas rnams la //
T04D3903:103b-14: 'gal ba cung zad snang min nyid //
T04D3903:103b-15: de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' chom rkun pa
T04D3903:103b-16: srog chags du ma rnams dang bdag nyid chen po
T04D3903:103b-17: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T04D3903:103b-18: dpa' rnams zang zing cung zad tsam gyi rgyur gsod
T04D3903:103b-19: pa la 'bad pa mtshams med pa mang po'i bya
T04D3903:103b-20: ba la rab tu zhen pa gzigs te /

T04D3903:103b-22: gal te yang bdag gis 'di 'tsho ba dang bral
T04D3903:103b-23: nas dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur mod bdag
T04D3903:103b-24: dmyal ba rnams su skye ba ni gdong bla'i /
T04D3903:103b-25: sems can 'di mi mang po bsad cing mtshams med
T04D3903:103b-26: pa'i las byas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur na
T04D3903:103b-27: mi rung ngo zhes pa'i bsam pas snying rje dang
T04D3903:103b-28: ldan pas 'dzem bzhin du 'tsho ba dang phral na
T04D3903:103b-29: ltung bar mi 'gyur la bsod nams mang po yang
T04D3903:103b-30: rab tu skye'o // gang yang chom rkun pa gzhan
T04D3903:103b-31: gyi rdzas 'phrog pa rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi'am mchod
T04D3903:103b-32: rten gyi rdzas 'phrogs te longs spyod par 'dod pa
T04D3903:103b-33: de rnams kyi mdun nas byang chub sems dpas rdzas
T04D3903:103b-34: de ma blangs na nges par 'di rdzas yongs su
T04D3903:103b-35: longs spyod pas de rnams yun ring por don ma
T04D3903:103b-36: yin pa dang mi phan pa dang mi bde bar
T04D3903:103b-37: ma gyur cig ces pas blangs nas dge 'dun gyi
T04D3903:103b-38: dge 'dun la mchod rten gyi mchod rten la phul
T04D3903:103b-39: rab tu skye'o // na / 'di ltar ma byin
T04D3903:103b-40: par blangs pa ni ltung bar mi 'gyur la bsod
T04D3903:103b-41: nams mang po yang rab tu skye'o //
T04D3903:103b-42: de bzhin du rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po ma
T04D3903:103b-43: rungs pa chen po gzhan la 'khu ba la rab
T04D3903:103b-44: tu chags pa dge 'dun dang mchod rten dag la
T04D3903:104a-0: gnod @104a * // // byang chub sems dpa' la
T04D3903:104a-1: gzhan gyi bud med chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis
T04D3903:104a-2: 'khrig pa shin tu don du gnyer te /
T04D3903:104a-3: 'ji skad du bdag ji ltar 'dod pa ltar byed
T04D3903:104a-4: pa nyid na khyod kyis gdul bar 'gyur la gzhan
T04D3903:104a-5: du na nges par bdag srog kyang yongs su gtong
T04D3903:104a-7: 'di ltar bdag la 'di nges par brnab sems skyes
T04D3903:104a-8: te bsod nams ma yin pa 'phel bar gyur pa
T04D3903:104a-9: mi rung la 'dod pa thob pa ni ji ltar
T04D3903:104a-10: 'dod par dge ba la yang dag par sbyor ba
T04D3903:104a-11: dang mi dge ba spong du 'jug pa la dbang
T04D3903:104a-12: du 'gyur ro zhes thugs brtse bzhin pas de la
T04D3903:104a-13: log par spyod pa spyad pa'ang ltung bar yang mi
T04D3903:104a-14: 'gyur la bsod nams shin tu mang po yang rab
T04D3903:104a-15: tu skye'o // 'di nyid la dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T04D3903:104a-16: gang yang byang chub sems dpas zhe sdang gis kun
T04D3903:104a-17: nas bslang ba'i ltung ba spang bar bya'i 'dod chags
T04D3903:104a-18: kyis kun nas bslang ba ma yin no zhes pa
T04D3903:104a-19: dang / de bzhin du 'dod chags las skyes pa'i
T04D3903:104a-20: ltung ba ni ltung ba ma yin par rig par
T04D3903:104a-21: dang / bya'o zhes so // 'dod chags kyi sgra ni 'dir byams pa brjod par byed pa ste /
T04D3903:104a-22: de yang byams pa ring du rjes su 'jug pa ste /
T04D3903:104a-23: gang 'di mtha' gcig tu sems can rnams la phan pa'i ched nyid du 'jug pa'o //
T04D3903:104a-24: de bzhin du nye ba 'khor gyis zhus par yang gsungs pa nye ba 'khor /
T04D3903:104a-25: zhe sdang ni sems can yongs su gtong ba la 'jug go //
T04D3903:104a-26: 'dod chags ni sems can yang dag par sdud pa la'o //
T04D3903:104a-27: de'i phyir nye ba 'khor 'dod chags dang mtshungs par
T04D3903:104a-28: ldan pa'i ltung ba gang ci yin pa de rnams
T04D3903:104a-29: thams cad ltung ba med pa zhes pa yong ngo
T04D3903:104a-30: zhes so // 'dir sems can yang dag par sdud
T04D3903:104a-31: pa la zhes pas khyad par du byas pa nyid
T04D3903:104a-32: kyi phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa dang snying rje dang
T04D3903:104a-33: ldan pa la 'di nye bar bstan pa'o zhes pa
T04D3903:104a-34: zhes so // dgongs pa'o // gang gi phyir de ma thag tu gsungs pa /
T04D3903:104a-35: nye ba 'khor de la gang thabs la mi mkhas
T04D3903:104a-36: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams 'dod chags dang
T04D3903:104a-37: mtshungs par ldan pa'i ltung ba rnams las 'jigs so
T04D3903:104b-0: // thabs @104b la mkhas pa rnams ni zhe sdang
T04D3903:104b-1: dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams las 'jigs kyi 'dod
T04D3903:104b-2: chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams las ma yin
T04D3903:104b-3: // no zhes so // thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyang su zhe na /
T04D3903:104b-4: gang shes rab dang snying rje phan tshun mtshungs par
T04D3903:104b-5: ldan pa dag gis sems can gtong ba las zlog
T04D3903:104b-7: gnyis ka ltar na sems can gtong bar 'gyur ba'i
T04D3903:104b-8: phyir te shes rab 'ba' zhig pas sdug bsngal stong
T04D3903:104b-9: pa nyid du rtogs pa las dang snying rje 'ba'
T04D3903:104b-10: zhig pas kyang nyon mongs pa'i stobs las ring po
T04D3903:104b-11: ma lon par snying rje nyams par 'gyur bas so
T04D3903:104b-12: // thabs la mkhas pa'i mdor gsungs pa /
T04D3903:104b-13: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa 'dod pa'i
T04D3903:104b-14: yon tan lnga rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byed
T04D3903:104b-15: cing de rnams kyis kun du 'dre bar gnas la

T04D3903:104b-17: shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa dang thams cad mkhyen
T04D3903:104b-18: pa nyid kyi sems gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan
T04D3903:104b-19: thams cad la longs spyad de shi 'phos nas tshangs
T04D3903:104b-20: pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o zhes so //
T04D3903:104b-21: zhe sdang la yang 'di ltar mi 'dod pa ci zhe na /
T04D3903:104b-22: rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba chen po
T04D3903:104b-23: dang bcas pa'i phyir dang snying rje dang bral ba
T04D3903:104b-24: la thabs nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:104b-25: ci ste gang gzhan gyi don grub pa ni rang gi don las chas lhag par mos pa /
T04D3903:104b-26: pha rol la khro ba 'jug pas kyang pha rol
T04D3903:104b-27: la rjes su bstan te rjes su gdung ba sngon
T04D3903:104b-28: du song bas de ma thag par phyis sdom par
T04D3903:104b-29: byed pa / de'i mi phan pa las zlog par
T04D3903:104b-30: byed pa na khro ba skyon ci yod ce na
T04D3903:104b-31: byed pa / / skabs phye bas de'i bag chags
T04D3903:104b-32: kyi nyes pa las snying rje nyams pa'i skyon du
T04D3903:104b-33: byed pa / / 'gyur te / de chad na'ang rtsa ba chad pa'o //
T04D3903:104b-34: gal te yang sems can de la phan no zhe na /
T04D3903:104b-35: de lta mod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje nyams pas /
T04D3903:104b-36: sems can gyi phung po chen po'i don rgyun nyams par 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:104b-37: 'phags pa bden pa gcig pa'i le'ur yang /
T04D3903:104b-38: bu'i dpe ni snying rje la gnas pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
T04D3903:104b-39: gang yang der ha cang snying rje bkag pa de
T04D3903:104b-40: 'jig rten gyi don kho na thun mong gi bdag
T04D3903:104b-41: po'i dbang du byas te gsungs so //
T04D3903:104b-42: bzlog par bya ba yang gal te na phan par
T04D3903:104b-43: 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro bar
T04D3903:105a-0: gyur na / de yang byang chub sems @105a * //
T04D3903:105a-1: dpa' ma yin pa dang der gnyis ka'i don ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:105a-2: de ltar na 'dod chags la yang skyon mang po gsungs te /
T04D3903:105a-3: rang gi bde ba la chags pas pha rol gyi
T04D3903:105a-4: sdug bsngal la btang snyoms pa mthong ngo zhe na
T04D3903:105a-5: / mthong ba bden te gang gis gzhan gyi sdug bsngal nyid du goms pa med pa'o //
T04D3903:105a-6: de lta na rab tu sbas te bdag po dang
T04D3903:105a-7: bcas pa'am bdag po med pa rnams dang rigs dang
T04D3903:105a-8: chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis bsrung ba rnams la 'dod

T04D3903:105a-11: la nye bar gnod pa med na rjes su 'brel

T04D3903:114a-38: por byas nas tshor ba ji srid par rnam par
T04D3903:114a-39: smin pa mngon par 'grub par byed do //
T04D3903:114a-40: da ltar ba'i srid pa dang len pa dang srid
T04D3903:114a-41: pa rnams kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba la
T04D3903:114b-1: skye ba gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa 'di'i dgos
T04D3903:114b-2: pa dang sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang bar ma
T04D3903:114b-3: rnams la kun du rmongs pa bzlog pa'o //
T04D3903:114b-4: de ltar gsungs mod kyi 'on kyang ma rig pa'i
T04D3903:114b-5: rkyen can gyis 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba bskyed
T04D3903:114b-6: pa'i dus na / sred pa dang len pa dang
T04D3903:114b-7: srid pa rnams kyang yod la de rnams kyis gang
T04D3903:114b-8: ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba skyed par byed pa de
T04D3903:114b-9: bzhin du ma rig pa'i rkyen can gyi 'du byed
T04D3903:114b-10: rnams kyis kyang bya ba ste /
T04D3903:114b-11: ming dang gzugs las gzhan pa'i skye ba la sogs
T04D3903:114b-12: pa rnams med pa'i phyir de rnams nyid rnam pa
T04D3903:114b-14: de'i phyir skye ba'i rnam par gzhag pa gnyis 'gal
T04D3903:114b-15: ba med do rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di
T04D3903:114b-16: de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum gyi bdag
T04D3903:114b-17: nyid dang lam gsum du rig par bya'o //
T04D3903:114b-18: de la nyon mongs pa ni kun nas nyon mongs
T04D3903:114b-19: pa ste gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis
T04D3903:114b-20: las dang skye ba 'phen par byed la bden pa
T04D3903:114b-21: mthong ba la las yod kyang yang srid 'phen pa
T04D3903:114b-23: nyon mongs pa kun du spyod pas yang srid pa'i sa bon srid par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:114b-24: nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyang yang srid par
T04D3903:114b-25: nying mtshams sbyar bas 'ching bar byed pa'i phyir skye
T04D3903:114b-26: ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yang rgyu mtshan no
T04D3903:114b-27: // de nyid kyi phyir dgra bcom pa la nying
T04D3903:114b-28: mtshams sbyor ba med do nyon mongs pa can gyi
T04D3903:114b-30: las dge ba dang mi dge ba yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ste /
T04D3903:114b-31: de'i tshe nyid na lus dang sems dag ngal ba'i
T04D3903:114b-32: rgyu mtshan yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang phyis kyang
T04D3903:114b-33: rnam par smin pa sbyin par byed pa'i phyir ro
T04D3903:114b-34: // skye ba yang nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad
T04D3903:114b-35: kyi gzhi rten yin pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs
T04D3903:114b-36: // pa'o // rnam pa gnyis kyang ste /
T04D3903:114b-37: dang po gnyis ni rgyu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
T04D3903:114b-38: phyi ma 'bras bu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o ;
T04D3903:114b-39: / ma rig pa dang sred pa dang len pa rnams nyon mongs pa'i lam mo //
T04D3903:114b-40: 'du byed dang srid pa las kyi lam mo //
T04D3903:114b-41: yan lag lhag ma rnams rnam par smin pa'i lam mo zhes pa'o //
T04D3903:114b-42: de 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T04D3903:115a-0: @115a * // thog ma mtha' dang dbus med 'di //
T04D3903:115a-1: mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du ni //
T04D3903:115a-2: phan tshun rgyu mtshan 'khor bar byed //
T04D3903:115a-4: de nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba la thog ma med

T04D3903:115a-6: phyir ro // thog ma dang ldan pa nyid na rgyu med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:115a-7: skye ba rgyu la rag las pa'i phyir rgyu zad
T04D3903:115a-8: pa las tha ma ni rigs te sa bon zad

T04D3903:115a-15: te gser gyi dri ma la sogs pa bzhin /

T04D3903:115a-21: zhes pa la sogs pa'i lung las kyang ngo //

T04D3903:115a-34: thog ma dbus mtha' rnam par spangs //
T04D3903:115a-35: chu shing dbus bzhin snying po med //

T04D3903:115a-37: kun rmongs grong khyer 'jigs rung ba //
T04D3903:115a-38: 'gro ba sgyu ma bzhin du snang //
T04D3903:115a-40: gang zhig bden par rab brjod pa //

T04D3903:115a-42: de las lhag ma gzhan ci zhig / ces so //
T04D3903:115a-44: dngos por khas len yod na ni //
T04D3903:115a-46: lta ba ma rungs yongs su 'dzin //

T04D3903:115b-0: @115b de ni lta ba kun gyi rgyu //
T04D3903:115b-2: de phyir de ni yongs shes na //

T04D3903:115b-4: cis de yongs shes 'gyur zhe na //
T04D3903:115b-5: rten cing 'brel par mthong ba las //

T04D3903:115b-9: bden min bden par 'du shes rnams //
T04D3903:115b-10: yongs su 'dzin dang rtsod sogs kyi //
T04D3903:115b-11: rim pa chags las rab tu 'jug / nyon mongs lag 'gro g-yo can gyis //
T04D3903:115b-12: 'ga' zhig kho na'i gnas rnyed pas //
T04D3903:115b-15: sems ni gnas dang bcas rnams la //

T04D3903:115b-17: gang tshe tha mal gnas pa yang //

T04D3903:115b-20: bden pa'i 'du shes kyis zhen pa //

T04D3903:115b-24: bzung nas ye shes spyan rnams kyis //

T04D3903:115b-27: byis pa rnams ni gzugs la zhen ;

T04D3903:115b-35: / sdug ces pa las chags 'gyur la //
T04D3903:115b-36: de las bzlog las chags bral te //
T04D3903:115b-37: sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin dben par //

T04D3903:115b-42: pa dang mdza' ba dang bral ba dang 'ching ba
T04D3903:115b-44: de ni phongs pa 'di rnams te /
T04D3903:115b-45: nad med pas phongs pa ni rnam pa mang po'i
T04D3903:115b-46: nad dang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang
T04D3903:115b-47: ngal bas so // longs spyod kyis phongs pa ni

T04D3903:116a-2: nye du nyams pa ni de rgud pa dang bral ba las rjes su mya ngan byed pa'o //
T04D3903:116a-3: tshul khrims nyams pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i
T04D3903:116a-4: khams su skyes pa na 'chal pa'i tshul khrims spangs
T04D3903:116a-5: kyang sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang 'gal ba 'dod pa'i

T04D3903:116a-7: // lta ba nyams pa ni 'jig rten pa'i ye

T04D3903:116a-9: pa'i bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa las so //

T04D3903:116a-11: phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi srid par brjod do
T04D3903:116a-12: // de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /

T04D3903:116a-15: de'i pha rol sngon dus kyi srid pa dang /
T04D3903:116a-16: skad cig ma tha ma la 'chi ba'i srid pa'o //
T04D3903:116a-17: gang la pha rol 'chi ba dang skye ba'i srid
T04D3903:116a-18: pa'i 'gro ba dag gi bar du 'byung ba'i phyir
T04D3903:116a-19: bar ma do'i srid pa ste khams gnyis su 'gyur
T04D3903:116a-20: ro // gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas gzhan yongs su bcad pa med de /

T04D3903:116a-24: ched du 'phen pa'i phyir 'gro ba gang du 'gro

T04D3903:116a-26: dus kyi srid pa de dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa

T04D3903:116b-1: ro // pho ni ma'i lto ba g-yas pa la

T04D3903:116b-8: gnas ji lta bas phyis ma ning du 'gyur ro

T04D3903:116b-16: dmyal ba'i bar do'i srid pa ni spyi'u tshugs so //
T04D3903:116b-17: mngal du 'jug pa bzhi rnams te rmongs pa rnams
T04D3903:116b-18: ni mngal du 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang 'byung

T04D3903:116b-23: sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang 'byung ba yang ste bzhi pa'o //

T04D3903:116b-31: bu'o // mngal skyes ni sems can gang mngal nas skyes pa rnams te /

T04D3903:120b-25: yi dags kyi dbye bas 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu'o //
T04D3903:120b-26: de la 'dod pa skye ba gsum rnams te /
T04D3903:120b-27: 'dod pa ji ltar bskyed pa longs spyod pa las mi rnams dang lha'i ris bzhi rnams dang /
T04D3903:120b-28: 'phrul dga' ba rnams rang gis sprul zhing sprul nas
T04D3903:120b-29: 'dod pa rnams longs spyod pa dang gzhan 'phrul dbang
T04D3903:120b-30: byed pa rnams gzhan gyi sprul pa'i 'dod pa rnams
T04D3903:120b-31: la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa'o //
T04D3903:120b-32: 'dir sa dang 'brel par gnas pa rgyal chen bzhi'i
T04D3903:120b-33: ris dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams mi bzhin
T04D3903:120b-35: 'thab bral la sogs pa rnams grangs ji lta bar
T04D3903:120b-36: 'khyud pa dang lag pa bcangs pa dang dgod pa
T04D3903:120b-38: 'on kyang lha rnams la khu ba med pa'i phyir
T04D3903:120b-39: rlung btang bas yongs su gdung ba dang bral lo
T04D3903:120b-40: // bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thams
T04D3903:120b-41: cad kyang gnyis kyis gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa ste
T04D3903:121a-1: pas 'khyud pa la sogs par gdags par gsungs so zhes so //
T04D3903:121a-2: ji tsam ji tsam du yul shas che ba de tsam du 'dod chags kyang shas che ba'o //
T04D3903:121a-3: lha'am lha mo gang gis phang par gzhon nu ma
T04D3903:121a-4: byung ba de ni de dag gi bu brgyud de
T04D3903:121a-5: lta'i ris rnams su lo lnga dang drug dang bdun
T04D3903:121a-6: dang brgyad dang dgu pa dang bcu pa lta bur
T04D3903:121a-7: ro // gzugs khams su ni lha rnams lus yongs
T04D3903:121a-8: su rdzogs pa skyes pa dang bud med kyi dbang
T04D3903:121a-9: po dang bral ba gos dang bcas par skye'o //
T04D3903:121a-10: lha de rnams thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i skad du smra'o //
T04D3903:121a-11: de la bsam gtan dang po ni tshangs ris dang /
T04D3903:121a-12: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang tshangs chen po //
T04D3903:121a-13: gnyis pa ni 'od chung dang tshad med 'od dang 'od gsal lo //
T04D3903:121a-14: gsum pa ni dge chung dang tshad med dge dang
T04D3903:121a-15: dge rgyas te 'di rnams kyang bde ba nyams su
T04D3903:121a-16: myong ba'o // bzhi pa ni rab kyi mtha' pa ni btang snyoms nyams su myong ba ste /
T04D3903:121a-17: sprin med dang bsod nams skyes dang 'bras bu che
T04D3903:121a-18: dang mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang gya
T04D3903:121a-19: nom snang dang shin tu mthong ba 'og min no
T04D3903:121a-20: // bsam gtan bzhi ni chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i dbye bas so sor gsum pa'o //
T04D3903:121a-21: bzhi pa ni chen po nyid la chung ngu'i chung du dang /
T04D3903:121a-22: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang shin tu
T04D3903:121a-23: chen po dang mchog tu chen po'i bye brag gis
T04D3903:121a-24: gnas drug ste 'di rnams gnas bcu bdun no //
T04D3903:121a-25: de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang bcas pa ni gzugs kyi khams so //
T04D3903:121a-26: 'bras bu che ba'i phyogs gcig na 'du shes med pa pa'i sems can rnams so //
T04D3903:121a-27: kha cig 'di rnams kyi gnas la sogs pa kho nar 'bras bu che ba'i steng na'o zhes so //
T04D3903:121a-28: mi che ba zhes pa 'dir aa b'i ha zhes
T04D3903:121a-29: pa dang mi 'dod pa zhes pa'ang ming du sems
T04D3903:121a-30: so // mi che ba la sogs pa 'og min gyi bar lnga rnams gtsang ma'i gnas te /
T04D3903:121a-31: gtsang ba ni 'phags pa rnams kho na 'di rnams su skyes nas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:121a-32: gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas med cing btang snyoms
T04D3903:121a-33: nyams su myong ba tshor ba la sogs pa'i phung
T04D3903:121a-34: po bzhi pa / skye ba'i bye brag gi rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3903:121a-35: nam mkha' mtha' ya sa skye mched dang /
T04D3903:121a-36: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
T04D3903:121a-37: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
T04D3903:121b-0: 'du shes med 'du @121b shes med min skye mched ces pa'o //
T04D3903:121b-1: 'di rnams yul gyis byas pa'i steng dang 'og ni med /
T04D3903:121b-2: yul gang du snyoms par 'jug de thob pa rnams
T04D3903:121b-3: shi 'phos pa de nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro
T04D3903:121b-4: // slar yang de nas shi 'phos pa rnams de nyid du srid pa bar ma 'grub pa'o //
T04D3903:121b-5: 'dir 'di la gzugs yod pa ma yin pas gzugs
T04D3903:121b-6: med de de'i dngos po ni gzugs med pa nyid
T04D3903:121b-7: do // gzugs med pa kho na dang gzugs med
T04D3903:121b-8: pa nyid ces pa ni dman pa la dgag pa
T04D3903:121b-9: do // ste / de'i phyir de nas shi 'phos
T04D3903:121b-10: pa rnams kyi gzugs ni gzugs kho na las skye'o
T04D3903:121b-11: do // ste / // gzhan rnams na re sems
T04D3903:121b-12: na re sems kho na las skye ste lus de'i
T04D3903:121b-13: rnam par smin pa rgyus yongs su bsgos pa thob
T04D3903:121b-14: pa 'jug pa las so zhes so //
T04D3903:121b-15: chos mngon pa pa kha cig na re dman pa'i don la dgag sgrar brjod de /
T04D3903:121b-16: gzugs med pa'i khams na gzugs kyang yod /
T04D3903:121b-18: de nas steng nas steng du gnas pa'i gzhal med
T04D3903:121b-19: khang rnams kyang yod ces zer ba nas sa la
T04D3903:121b-20: sogs pa rnams kyi yang tshad dang dbyibs kyi dbye
T04D3903:121b-21: ba'i bar du rgyas par ston no //
T04D3903:121b-22: de'i 'dod pa 'dir ma spros te mang po'i 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:121b-23: bsam gtan la sogs pa dang phyogs gcig pa'i phyir
T04D3903:121b-24: des yang dag par bsdus pa'i nyer bsdogs brgyad rnams
T04D3903:121b-25: te / bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad rnams
T04D3903:121b-26: kyi re re re re'i ste gang gis de la
T04D3903:121b-27: te / 'jug pa'o // bsam gtan dang po'i nyer
T04D3903:121b-28: bsdogs mi lcogs pa med pa yan lag bzhi pa'o
T04D3903:121b-29: te / 'jug pa'o // // bsam gtan dang po
T04D3903:121b-30: nyid rtog pa dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa 'dod
T04D3903:121b-31: pa rnams la btang snyoms kyi tshor ba dang mtshungs
T04D3903:121b-32: par ldan pa rtog pa med la dpyod pa dang
T04D3903:121b-33: bcas pa ni bsam gtan khyad par du 'phags pa
T04D3903:121b-34: nyid kyi phyir de'i 'bras bu tshangs pa chen po'o
T04D3903:121b-36: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams rnams so //
T04D3903:121b-37: de la gtso bor tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin
T04D3903:121b-38: pa dang ldan pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i
T04D3903:121b-39: lha rnams so // ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par
T04D3903:121b-40: smin pa dang ldan pa ni tshangs ris la sogs
T04D3903:121b-41: lha rnams so // pa rnams so // shes rab
T04D3903:121b-42: kyi rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa rnams ni
T04D3903:121b-43: gtsang ma'i gnas rnams te 'phags pa rnams kho na
T04D3903:122a-1: kyang bag med pa'i sa la gnas pa rdzogs pa'i
T04D3903:122a-2: byang chub dang rjes su mthun pa'i gdams ngag gi
T04D3903:122a-3: snod do // bag med pa'i sa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T04D3903:122a-4: 'dod pa'i bde ba'i ro myang ba ste de phal cher 'dod khams kyi lha rnams so //
T04D3903:122a-5: bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myang ba bsam gtan du skyes pa rnams so //
T04D3903:122a-6: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi ro myang ba ni gtsang ma'i gnas pa rnams so //
T04D3903:122a-7: gzugs med pa rnams ni bgrod pa la sogs pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:122a-8: gdul byar ni byams pa yongs su bsgoms shing rdzogs
T04D3903:122a-9: pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa yid la byed pa
T04D3903:122a-10: las te rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snod du 'gyur
T04D3903:122a-11: ba'o zhes pa'o // ci khams gsum pa gcig kho
T04D3903:122a-12: na 'am zhe na khams gsum pa rnams kyi mtha'
T04D3903:122a-13: yod pa ma yin te nam mkha' ji srid du
T04D3903:122a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams ji lta gnas she na /
T04D3903:122a-20: steng dang 'og na yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig
T04D3903:122a-21: pa dang 'chags pa rnams kyi bar dang mtshams med
T04D3903:122a-22: de / 'og min gyi gong na yang 'dod pa'i khams so //
T04D3903:122a-23: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'og na yang 'og min no ;
T04D3903:122a-24: / gang khams gcig las 'dod chags dang bral ba de thams cad las so //
T04D3903:122a-25: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa las kyang ngo //
T04D3903:122a-26: gang bsam gtan dang po la brten nas rdzu 'phrul
T04D3903:122a-27: skyed par byed pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams
T04D3903:122a-28: gang du skye ba der skyed par byed la /
T04D3903:122a-29: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de nyid du nges 'gro'i gzhan du ma yin no //
T04D3903:122a-30: gang lha rnams kyi gnas nyi shu rtsa gsum pa
T04D3903:122a-31: brjod pa de rnams kyi 'og nas steng du ci
T04D3903:122a-33: gnas dang gnas nas 'og tu ji srid pa de
T04D3903:122a-34: srid de dang de las steng du ste thams cad
T04D3903:122a-36: 'o na 'thab bral la sogs pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi tshad ci zhe na /
T04D3903:122a-37: kha cig na re bzhi po rnams ri rab kyi steng ci tsam pa'o zhes so //
T04D3903:122a-38: gzhan rnams na re gong ma nyis 'gyur ro zhes so //
T04D3903:122a-39: kha cig na re bsam gtan dang po ni gling bzhi pa ji srid pa'o //
T04D3903:122b-0: gnyis pa ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams @122b ji tsam pa'o //
T04D3903:122b-1: gsum pa ni stong gnyis pa ji tsam pa'o //
T04D3903:122b-2: bzhi pa ni stong gsum pa ji tsam pa'o //
T04D3903:122b-3: gzhan rnams na re dang po la sogs pa rnams
T04D3903:122b-4: ni stong la sogs pa'i tshad yin la bzhi pa
T04D3903:122b-6: de la gling bzhi dang zla ba dang nyi ma
T04D3903:122b-7: dang 'dod pa na spyod pa drug dang bsam gtan
T04D3903:122b-8: dang po rnams so sor stong ni /
T04D3903:122b-9: stong rnams kyi tshogs pa ste stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T04D3903:122b-10: spyi phud de rnams stong ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T04D3903:122b-11: stong gnyis pa de rnams stong ni stong gsum gyi
T04D3903:122b-12: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams te gling bzhi
T04D3903:122b-13: pa bye ba phrag brgya rnams so //
T04D3903:122b-14: 'di thams cad mnyam du 'jig cing mnyam du 'chags so //
T04D3903:122b-16: 'dir dpag tshad dang ming dang lo rnams nye bar
T04D3903:122b-17: mkho ba'i phyir dang po'i rim gyis brtsam par bya'o
T04D3903:122b-18: // gzugs kyi nges par dbye ba'i mtha' ni rdul phra rab po //
T04D3903:122b-19: ming gi mtha' ni yi ge ste dper na 'og zhes pa lta bu'o //
T04D3903:122b-20: dus kyi mtha' skad cig ma ste skad cig gi
T04D3903:122b-21: tshad ni chos 'gro ba ste ji srid du rdul
T04D3903:122b-22: phra rab nas rdul phra rab gzhan du 'gro ba'o
T04D3903:122b-23: // chos mngon pa pa rnams na re skyes bu
T04D3903:122b-24: stobs dang ldan pas se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi
T04D3903:122b-25: skad cig ma drug cu rtsa lnga 'da'o zhes so
T04D3903:122b-26: // // de la rngul phra rab dang rdul phran
T04D3903:122b-27: dang lcags dang chu dang ri bong dang lug dang
T04D3903:122b-28: glang dang nyi zer gyi rdul dang /
T04D3903:122b-29: sro ma dang shig dang nas dang sor mo'i tshigs
T04D3903:122b-30: zhes pa bcu gnyis ni phyi ma bdun 'gyur te
T04D3903:122b-32: log la byas pa'i sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi khru'o //
T04D3903:122b-34: / gzhu lnga brgya rnams rgyang grags so //
T04D3903:122b-35: rgyang grags brgyad rnams dpag tshad do //
T04D3903:122b-36: skad cig brgya nyi shu rnams de'i skad cig go //
T04D3903:122b-37: de'i skad cig de drug cu thang cig go //
T04D3903:122b-38: thang cig sum cu yud tsam mo //
T04D3903:122b-39: yud tsam sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go //
T04D3903:122b-40: rgyal dang dbo dang sa ga dang chu stod dang
T04D3903:122b-41: khrums dang smin drug rnams kyi nag po'i phyogs la
T04D3903:122b-42: tshes re re chad pa'i phyir nyin zhag nyi shu
T04D3903:122b-43: rtsa dgu dang nyin zhag sum cu ni zla ba'o
T04D3903:122b-44: // zla ba bcu gnyis rnams lo'o //
T04D3903:122b-45: de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams phal cher khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o //
T04D3903:123a-1: ba lang spyod dang byang zhes pa rnams ni khru
T04D3903:123a-2: brgyad dang bcu drug dang sum cu rtsa gnyis pa
T04D3903:123a-3: rim pa ji lta bar lus kyi tshad do //
T04D3903:123a-4: rgyang grags kyi rkang pa gcig dang gnyis dang gsum
T04D3903:123a-5: dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug rnams rgyal chen bzhi'i
T04D3903:123a-6: rigs la sogs lha drug rnams kyi'o //
T04D3903:123a-7: tshangs ris la sogs pa bcu bdun pa rnams kyi
T04D3903:123a-8: lus ni dpag tshad phyed dang gcig dang phyed dang
T04D3903:123a-9: gnyis dang gnyis dang bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug
T04D3903:123a-10: dang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang drug cu rtsa bzhi
T04D3903:123a-11: dang nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya dang phyed
T04D3903:123a-12: dang sum brgya dang lnga brgya dang stong dang /
T04D3903:123a-13: stong phrag gnyis dang bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug rnams so //
T04D3903:123a-14: byang sgra mi snyan dang ba lang spyod dang shar
T04D3903:123a-15: lus 'phags po rnams su tshe ni lo stong dang
T04D3903:123a-16: de'i phyed do // 'dzam bu'i gling du bskal pa
T04D3903:123a-17: dang po'i mi rnams kyi tshad med pa dang bar
T04D3903:123a-18: du ma nges pa dang tha mar lo bcu'o //
T04D3903:123a-19: mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi nyin zhag go //
T04D3903:123a-20: de'i lo lnga brgya rnams tshe'o //
T04D3903:123a-21: steng ma rnams kyi nyin zhag dang tshe phyi ma nyis 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:123a-22: gzugs can rnams kyi yang dpag tshad phyed la sogs
T04D3903:123a-23: pa bzhin bskal pa phyed la sogs pa tshe'i tshad
T04D3903:123a-24: do // gzugs med na bskal pa stong phrag nyi
T04D3903:123a-25: shu dang bzhi bcu dang drug cu brgyad cu rnams
T04D3903:123a-26: do // tshe'o // 'dir bskal pa chen po'i phyed
T04D3903:123a-27: de bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu bskal par byas
T04D3903:123a-28: do // tshe'o // nas / bskal pa de'i phyed
T04D3903:123a-29: la sogs pa gzugs can gsum po rnams kyi tshe'o
T04D3903:123a-30: do // tshe'o // nas / // 'od chud nas brtsams nas ni bskal pa chen pos tshe'o //
T04D3903:123a-31: ngan 'gro ni gang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams
T04D3903:123a-32: kyi tshe tshad de ni dmyal ba chen po yang
T04D3903:123a-33: sos su nyin zhag gcig ste de'i lo lnga brgya
T04D3903:123a-34: rnams tshe'o // sum cu rtsa gsum pa la sogs
T04D3903:123a-35: pa rnams kyi tshe ni thig nag dang bsdus 'joms
T04D3903:123a-37: ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha par nyin zhag gcig
T04D3903:123a-38: ste de yis lo stong la sogs pa rnams tshe'o
T04D3903:123a-39: // rab tu tsha ba ni bar gyi bskal pa phyed tshe'o //
T04D3903:123a-40: mnar med pa'i bar gyi bskal pa'o //
T04D3903:123a-41: dud 'gro rnams kyi ni nges pa med cing mchog
T04D3903:123a-42: tu tshe ring pa'i dud 'gro rnams kyi bar gyi
T04D3903:123a-43: bskal pa ste / dga' bo dang nyer dga' la sogs pa klu rnams kyi'o //
T04D3903:123b-0: mi'i zla ba @123b yi dags rnams kyi nyin zhag ste des lo lnga brgya rnams so //
T04D3903:123b-1: grang ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi chu bur can gyi
T04D3903:123b-2: tshe ni gang ma ga dh'a'i ti la [?] kh'a
T04D3903:123b-3: ri'i nyi shu pa'i sbyang ste sbyang de las lo
T04D3903:123b-4: brgya nas til re phyung bas zad pa'o //
T04D3903:123b-5: gzhan rnams so sor nyi shu 'gyur du 'phel ba'i tshe'o //
T04D3903:123b-6: bar du 'chi ba ni sgra mi snyan ma gtogs pa thams cad na yod do //
T04D3903:123b-7: mnyam du 'jig go zhes gang brjod pa de la
T04D3903:123b-8: 'jig pa gnyis te 'gro ba 'jig pa dang khams
T04D3903:123b-9: 'jig pa'o // yang gnyis te sems can 'jig pa dang snod 'jig pa'o //
T04D3903:123b-10: gang dmyal ba rnams su sems can 'chi 'pho zhing
T04D3903:123b-11: mi skye ba'i dus der 'gyur te de 'jig pa'i
T04D3903:123b-13: rim gyis dmyal ba rnams su sems can gcig kyang ma lus par 'gyur te /
T04D3903:123b-14: gang de'i tshe dmyal ba myong bar nges pa'i las
T04D3903:123b-15: 'dzin pa de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi dmyal
T04D3903:123b-17: de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang yi dvags rnams
T04D3903:123b-18: dang 'dzam bu'i gling dang shar lus 'phags dang ba
T04D3903:123b-19: lang spyod dang sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams dang
T04D3903:123b-20: 'dod pa na spyod pa drug dang bsam gtan dang
T04D3903:123b-22: gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du sems can
T04D3903:123b-23: gcig kyang ma lus par 'gyur ba 'di tsam 'di
T04D3903:123b-24: lta ste sems can 'jig pas 'jig rten 'jig pa'o
T04D3903:123b-25: // de nas snod stong pa 'di nyid nas kun
T04D3903:123b-26: nas sems can rnams kyi de 'phen pa'i las yongs
T04D3903:123b-27: su zad nas lhas char ma phab pa dang nyi
T04D3903:123b-28: ma dang po shar bas sa bon gyi grong dang
T04D3903:123b-29: 'byung ba'i grong dang chu mig dang chu phran rnams
T04D3903:123b-30: // skam mo // nyi ma gnyis shar bas chu bo thams cad skam mo //
T04D3903:123b-31: gsum pa chu po chen po bzhi dang ma dros
T04D3903:123b-32: pa la sogs pa'i mtsho phran chen po rnams skam
T04D3903:123b-33: mo // bzhi pas rga mtsho chen po dpag tshad brgya'i bar du skam mo //
T04D3903:123b-34: lnga pas dpag tshad nyis brgya la sogs pa'o //
T04D3903:123b-35: drug pas chu'i thigs pa shin tu che chung ba
T04D3903:123b-36: yang mi lus te sa chen po dang ri rab
T04D3903:123b-38: nyi ma bdun pa shar bas stong gsum gyi stong
T04D3903:123b-39: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs te ji ltar
T04D3903:123b-40: thal bar yang mi shes par bsregs nas rang nyid
T04D3903:123b-41: kyang zhi'o zhes pa nyi ma bdun gyi mes 'jig
T04D3903:123b-42: pas bsam gtan dang bo'i bar bsreg go //
T04D3903:124a-1: bzhin du char pa'i chu ba tshva can gyis bsam gtan gnyis pa myags par byed do //
T04D3903:124a-2: rnam par bskyod pa'i rlung chen po'i rlung gis 'jig pas bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par 'thor ro //
T04D3903:124a-3: bsam gtan bzhi pa na 'jig pa med do //
T04D3903:124a-4: 'o na de rtag gam zhe na ma yin te
T04D3903:124a-5: gang gi phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa ni sa gzhi
T04D3903:124a-6: gcig tu 'brel pa med kyi 'o na ci zhe
T04D3903:124a-7: na / gnas gzhan rnam par chad pa ste skar ma bzhin no //
T04D3903:124a-8: de na sems can gang dang gang skye ba'am 'chi
T04D3903:124a-9: 'pho ba ni gzhal med khang dang bcas par yin
T04D3903:124a-10: pa'i phyir 'di rtag pa nyid med do //
T04D3903:124a-11: 'dir bar ma chad par me yis 'jig pa lan bdun no //
T04D3903:124a-13: de ltar chu yis bdun song ba na yang mes bdun no //
T04D3903:124a-14: phyis rlung gis 'jig pa gcig tu 'gyur la /
T04D3903:124a-15: de rnams ni mes 'jig pa lnga bcu rtsa drug
T04D3903:124a-16: dang chus bdun dang rlung gis gcig ste 'di rnams
T04D3903:124a-17: su 'gyur ro // de ltar dmyal bar sems can
T04D3903:124a-18: rnams 'chi 'pho ba nas bzung ste ji srid snod
T04D3903:124a-19: kyi 'jig rten rnams zad pa'i bar gyi dus 'di
T04D3903:124a-20: 'jig pa'i bskal pa ste bar gyi bskal pa nyi
T04D3903:124a-21: su 'gyur ro // shu rnams so // de'i rjes
T04D3903:124a-22: su 'jig rten gyi khams zhig pa 'di stong pa
T04D3903:124a-23: nam mkha' tsam du bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu
T04D3903:124a-24: su 'gyur ro // shu rnams so // gnas so
T04D3903:124a-25: // de nas slar yang sems can rnams kyi las
T04D3903:124a-26: kyi dbang gis nam mkha' las rlung dal bu rnams
T04D3903:124a-27: su 'gyur ro // shu rnams so // gnas so
T04D3903:124a-28: // g-yo'o // de nas ji skad brjod pa rlung
T04D3903:124a-29: gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa thams cad skye'o //
T04D3903:124a-30: 'di tsam 'di ni snod 'chags pas 'jig rten du 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:124a-31: de nas sems can gzhan zhig 'od gsal ba'i lha
T04D3903:124a-32: rnams las shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang
T04D3903:124a-33: stong par skye'o // sems can gzhan rnams kyang de
T04D3903:124a-34: nas shi 'phos te tshangs pa mdun na 'don du'o
T04D3903:124a-35: stong par skye'o // // de nas tshangs ris dang
T04D3903:124a-36: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams su ste rim gyis byang
T04D3903:124a-37: sgra mi snyan dang ba lang spyod dang shar lus
T04D3903:124a-38: 'phags dang 'dzam bu'i gling dang yi dags dang dud
T04D3903:124a-39: 'gro dang dmyal ba rnams kyi bar du skye'o //
T04D3903:124a-40: 'di ni chos nyid yin te gang phyis zhig pa de la mngon la 'chags pa'o //
T04D3903:124a-41: gang gi tshe dmyal ba rnams sems can gcig skyes par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
T04D3903:124b-0: gang 'jig rten 'di bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags pa @124b yin no ;
T04D3903:124b-1: / chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas
T04D3903:124b-2: par 'gyur ba de ni nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur
T04D3903:124b-3: ro // 'dir yang bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams
T04D3903:124b-4: ni gzugs na spyod pa bzhin du yid kyi rang
T04D3903:124b-5: bzhin dang par nga 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro
T04D3903:124b-6: ba dga' ba'i zas can rnams te /
T04D3903:124b-7: de rnams sa'i dri bsnams nas ro myong shing zos pas /
T04D3903:124b-8: de rnams kyi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang lci
T04D3903:124b-9: ba nyid zhugs shing 'od ni nub par gyur te
T04D3903:124b-10: / de nas mun pa byung ba na nyi ma dang zla ba dag byung ngo //
T04D3903:124b-11: sa'i ro dang sa'i zhag dang myu gu'i tshal rim
T04D3903:124b-12: gyis skyes pa rnams chags pa las nub par gyur
T04D3903:124b-13: to // ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras bu skyes
T04D3903:124b-14: pa de zos pa na gci ba dang bshang ba'i
T04D3903:124b-15: lam pho dang mo'i dbang po dang bcas pa byung
T04D3903:124b-16: shing dbyibs kyang tha dad pa byung ste /
T04D3903:124b-17: sngon goms pa'i dbang las tshul bzhin ma yin pa
T04D3903:124b-18: yid la byed pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rgya chen
T04D3903:124b-19: po gang las log par zhugs par gyur pa'o //
T04D3903:124b-20: le lo las sogs 'jog byas shing bdag tu 'dzin
T04D3903:124b-21: pa skyes pa na 'bras s'a lu brngas pa slar
T04D3903:124b-23: de na zhing rnams bgos nas rang gi rnams la
T04D3903:124b-24: kun nas 'dzin pa byas te pha rol gyi la
T04D3903:124b-25: brkus so // de nas bsrung ba'i don du skyes
T04D3903:124b-26: bu khyad par can cig byung ba la drug cha
T04D3903:124b-27: brkus so // bstabs te / zhing rnams kyi bdag
T04D3903:124b-28: po nyid kyi phyir rgyal rigs zhes don dang mthun
T04D3903:124b-29: brkus so // bstabs te / pa'i ming ngo //
T04D3903:124b-30: mang pos bkur ba nyid kyi phyir dang skye dgu
T04D3903:124b-31: rnams dga' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir mang pos
T04D3903:124b-32: bkur ba dang rgyal po zhes so //
T04D3903:124b-33: khyim rnams las yid phyir phyogs pa rnams ni bram ze zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo ;
T04D3903:124b-34: / rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig gis chad
T04D3903:124b-35: pas bcad pa'i chom rkun pa rnams na re bdag
T04D3903:124b-36: gis 'di lta bu ma bgyis so zhes brdzun du
T04D3903:124b-38: de ltar 'jig rten chags bzhin pa rnams mi rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa ste /
T04D3903:124b-39: las kyi lam rnams 'phel bar gyur pa na rim gyis thung ba nyid de /
T04D3903:124b-40: mthar tshe lo bcu pa chos ma yin pa /
T04D3903:124b-41: chags pa mi bzad pas zil gyis gnon pa log pa'i chos kyis dkris pa rnams la /
T04D3903:124b-42: gnod sems mthar thug ste shing la sogs pa rnams mtshon char 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:125a-0: de rnams sems can gzhan gsod par @125a * //
T04D3903:125a-1: byed pa'i phyir mtshon gyis te srog gcod pa nyi ma bdun 'byung ngo //
T04D3903:125a-2: slar yang skyon de rnams nyid kyis mi ma yin
T04D3903:125a-3: pa rnams yams nad spro bar byed pa gang las
T04D3903:125a-4: mi de rnams nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes
T04D3903:125a-5: pa nad zla ba bdun dang nyi ma bdun 'byung
T04D3903:125a-6: ngo // slar yang skyon de rnams nyid kyis char mi 'bab cing mu ge 'byung ste /
T04D3903:125a-7: mi rnams bkres pa dang nyam chung bas gab nas 'chi la /
T04D3903:125a-8: gzhan rnams kyang rus gong dkar po rnams bskol nas 'thung zhing /
T04D3903:125a-9: thur ma'i rtse mos khyim rnams su zang zing 'god par byed de /
T04D3903:125a-10: de ring khyim bdag gsol ba'o sang khyim [?] bdag
T04D3903:125a-11: mo'o zhes pa'i 'di lta bu la sogs pa dang
T04D3903:125a-12: / 'bru'i gnas kyi bug pa rnams nas thur mas
T04D3903:125a-13: 'bru ba dang 'bras bu rnams chung ba chu mang
T04D3903:125a-14: po la bskol nas 'thung ngo zhes pa mu ge
T04D3903:125a-15: lo dang zla ba dang zhag bdun rnams 'byung ngo
T04D3903:125a-16: / // de'i tshe yang gling gnyis dag tu gnod
T04D3903:125a-17: sems lhag pa ma thob par 'gyur zhing kha dog
T04D3903:125a-18: ngan pa dang nyam chung ba dag dang /
T04D3903:125a-19: bkres pa dang skom pa dag kyang ngo zhes pa
T04D3903:125a-20: 'di ni chags pa rnams gnas pa'i bar gyi bskal
T04D3903:125a-21: pa dang po'o // tshe lo bcu pa de rnams
T04D3903:125a-22: las rim gyis 'phel bar gyur pas tshe lo brgyad
T04D3903:125a-23: khrir 'gyur zhing slar yang 'gribs pas tshe lo bcu
T04D3903:125a-24: par gyur pa 'di ni bar gyi bskal pa gnyis
T04D3903:125a-25: pa dang po'o // pa'o // de bzhin du bco brgyad kyi bar du'o //
T04D3903:125a-26: nyi shu pa ni yar skye ba kho na ste
T04D3903:125a-27: mar 'bri ba med la tshe lo bcu pa las
T04D3903:125a-28: lo brgyad khri ji srid par ro //
T04D3903:125a-29: bar gyi bskal pa gzhan rnams kyi 'phel ba dang
T04D3903:125a-30: 'grib pa'i dus ji srid pa de srid par gyi
T04D3903:125a-31: bskal pa dang po'i 'grib pa'i dus dang tha ma'i
T04D3903:125a-32: 'phel ba'i dus kyang ngo zhes pas thams cad dus
T04D3903:125a-33: mnyam pa'o // de la bar gyi skal pa gcig gis snod rnams 'chags so //
T04D3903:125a-34: bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgus sdod pa po byed do //
T04D3903:125a-35: 'jig rten chags pa bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas so //
T04D3903:125a-36: gcig gis snod rnams 'jig go bcu dgus stong par 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:125a-37: 'jig rten zhig pa ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi
T04D3903:125a-38: shu gnas so zhes pa brgyad cu ni bskal pa
T04D3903:125a-39: chen po ste / bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa phung po lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T04D3903:125a-40: bskal pa 'ga' zhig ni de lta bu ma yin te /
T04D3903:125b-0: smon lam dang dge ba'i @125b rtsa ba'i dbang gis shin tu ring pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:125b-1: dper na bskal pa skar ma lta bu ste de'i
T04D3903:125b-2: 'grib pa'i dus nyid las ji skad brjod pa'i bar
T04D3903:125b-3: gyi bskal pa'i tshad kyi bar gyi bskal pa stong
T04D3903:125b-4: phrag nyi shu yod pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:125b-5: de ltar bzang po la sogs pa bskal pa chen
T04D3903:125b-6: po grangs kyi gnas gzhan drug cur son par thob
T04D3903:125b-7: pa ni grangs med pa zhes brjod do //
T04D3903:125b-8: de nas bzlas nas slar yang bgrang bar bya ste
T04D3903:125b-9: de lta bu grangs med pa gsum zhes brjod do
T04D3903:125b-10: // de lta bu'i bskal pa grangs med pa gsum la sangs rgyas nyid 'byung ngo //
T04D3903:125b-11: de ltar bskal pa grangs med pa dang pos tshogs
T04D3903:125b-12: kyis nas brtsams nas sa dang po'i bar rdzogs par
T04D3903:125b-13: byed do // gnyis pas ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa sa drug go //
T04D3903:125b-14: gsum pas ni mi g-yo ba'i sa nas brtsams nas
T04D3903:125b-15: sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar ro zhes mdo las so
T04D3903:125b-16: // gzhan rnams na re gsum du chos mthun pa'i
T04D3903:125b-17: phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum zhes brjod kyi
T04D3903:125b-18: don dam par ni ma yin no //
T04D3903:125b-19: de ltar ni tshogs kyis rdzogs par byed pa la bskal pa grangs med pa gcig 'da'o //
T04D3903:125b-20: de'i de ma thag par mos par byed pa'i sa
T04D3903:125b-21: rdzogs par byed pa la bskal pa grangs med pa
T04D3903:125b-22: gnyis so // de'i rjes su rab tu dga' ba'i
T04D3903:125b-23: sa nas bzung ste chos kyi sprin gyi bar so
T04D3903:125b-24: sor bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gsum rnams kyis
T04D3903:125b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rdzogs nas /
T04D3903:125b-26: sangs rgyas kyis [?] kun du 'od thob par byed
T04D3903:125b-27: do zhes pa de ltar bskal pa grangs med pa
T04D3903:125b-28: sum cu rtsa gsum gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob po
T04D3903:125b-29: zhe'o // sangs rgyas nam 'byung zhe na /
T04D3903:125b-30: skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri pa 'grib pa nas
T04D3903:125b-31: brtsams nas mi rnams tshe lo brgya par 'gyur ba'i
T04D3903:125b-33: sngar ni ma yin te sems can yid 'byung ba dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:125b-34: 'phyi bar yang ma yin te de'i tshe dang bskal
T04D3903:125b-35: pa dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba dang sems
T04D3903:125b-36: can gyi snyigs ma lnga shin tu lhag par gyur
T04D3903:125b-37: pa'i phyir ro // gnyis kyis srog dang yo byad
T04D3903:125b-38: rgud par byed la gnyis kyis dge ba'i phyogs rgud
T04D3903:125b-39: par byed cing gcig gis bdag gi dngos po rgud
T04D3903:125b-40: pa ste gzugs tshad dang nad med pa dang stobs
T04D3903:125b-41: dang blo dang dran pa dang brtson 'grus dang brtan
T04D3903:126a-2: / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni 'phel ba dang 'grib pa la'ang 'byung ngo //
T04D3903:126a-3: 'khor los sgyur ba rnams ni mi rnams kyi tshe
T04D3903:126a-4: lo dpag tu med pa nas brgyad khri pa'i bar
T04D3903:126a-5: la ste / 'og tu ma yin la skye gnas
T04D3903:126a-6: su 'am yang na chu skyes kyi snying por rdzus
T04D3903:126a-7: la ste / te skye ba'o // de rnams kyang
T04D3903:126a-8: bar snang la 'ongs ba'i gser dang dngul dang zangs
T04D3903:126a-9: dang lcags kyi 'khor lo can gling bzhi dang gsum
T04D3903:126a-10: dang gnyis dang gcig gi bdag po /
T04D3903:126a-11: 'khor lo dang glang po dang rta dang nor bu
T04D3903:126a-12: dang bud med dang khyim bdag dang blon po'i rang
T04D3903:126a-13: bzhin gyi rin po che bdun dang ldan pa /
T04D3903:126a-14: phas bsu rang 'gro g-yul bshams dang //
T04D3903:126a-15: mtshon brtsams pas rgyal gnod pa med pa ste /
T04D3903:126a-16: mtshon gyis kyang rgyal bar byed cing gnod pa med la /
T04D3903:126a-17: rgyal nas sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god par byed do //
T04D3903:126a-18: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu dus
T04D3903:126a-19: gcig la 'khor los sgyur ba gnyis 'byung ba med
T04D3903:126a-20: de / 'gran zla med pa'i las byas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bzhin no //
T04D3903:126a-21: 'o na gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis dag
T04D3903:126a-22: lhan cig tu mi 'byung ba ci'i phyir zhe na
T04D3903:126a-23: / sku de lta bu tshogs pas gdul bar bya ba'i skye bo mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:126a-24: gus pa dang rings pa'i don du yang ste sangs
T04D3903:126a-25: rgyas gcig la shin tu gus par 'gyur te 'di
T04D3903:126a-26: 'dra ba rnyed par dka'o zhes sems shing /
T04D3903:126a-27: 'di gshegs pa'am yongs su mya ngan las 'das na
T04D3903:126a-28: mgon med par 'gyur du 'ong zhes bstan pa sgrub
T04D3903:126a-29: pa la shin tu rings par byed do //
T04D3903:126a-30: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan rnams na ni sangs rgyas rnams yod pa nyid de /
T04D3903:126a-31: mang po rnams mnyam du tshogs la 'jug pa mthong
T04D3903:126a-32: ba'i phyir dang gcig tu mang po rnams cig car
T04D3903:126a-33: 'byung ba mi rung ba de 'byung ba la gegs
T04D3903:126a-34: ci yang med pas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan rnams
T04D3903:126a-36: sangs rgyas kyi sku mang pos gdul bar bya ba dang /
T04D3903:126a-37: sems can gyi don srid na ni 'jig rten gyi
T04D3903:126a-38: khams gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa mang po rnams
T04D3903:126a-39: cig car 'byung ba 'gal ba med de ye shes
T04D3903:126a-40: kyi nus pa thogs pa med pa nyid na'ang cig
T04D3903:126a-41: car yang sems can gyi don la 'jug pa'i phyir
T04D3903:126a-42: te / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ser sna dang
T04D3903:126b-0: phrag dog la sogs @126b pa'i dri ma dang bral
T04D3903:126b-1: ba dang rgyu mnyam por 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir
T04D3903:126b-2: te / ro // kha cig na re dus gcig
T04D3903:126b-3: tu de bzhin gshegs pa du ma med de gcig
T04D3903:126b-4: kho nas sems can gyi don bya ba thams cad
T04D3903:126b-6: rtag tu sangs rgyas gcig nyid de de kho nas
T04D3903:126b-7: sku tshe mtha' yas par byin gyis rlob par nus
T04D3903:126b-8: pa'i phyir ro zhes cis mi 'dod /
T04D3903:126b-9: rgyu'i stobs las gzhan rnams kyang 'byung ngo zhe na /
T04D3903:126b-10: de ltar na rgyu'i stobs nyid las 'jig rten gyi
T04D3903:126b-11: khams mtha' yas pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa
T04D3903:126b-12: mtha' yas pa cig car 'gyur bas 'gal ba ci
T04D3903:126b-13: yod rim gyis ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu
T04D3903:126b-14: yang de rnams 'byung ba gnas pa kho na'o //
T04D3903:126b-15: byung ba de rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:126b-16: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dag gis yod pa kho na'o //
T04D3903:126b-17: bsod nams dang mi ldan pa rnams la snang bar
T04D3903:126b-18: mi 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig yin gyi bsod nams chung
T04D3903:126b-19: ba'am che ba ji lta bar yang dag par dmigs
T04D3903:126b-20: so // 'o na 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dag
T04D3903:126b-21: 'jig rten gyi khams ci tsam du 'dod ce na
T04D3903:126b-22: so // stong gsum mo // gzhan rnams na re gling bzhi pa'o zhes so //
T04D3903:126b-23: bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi khang pa nyid du
T04D3903:126b-24: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni sprul pa'i
T04D3903:126b-25: skus stong gsum gyi nang du gtogs pa'i gling bzhi
T04D3903:126b-26: pa rnams thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba
T04D3903:126b-27: dang 'chi 'pho ba dang mi rnams su skye ba
T04D3903:126b-28: yongs su 'dzin pa la sogs pa kun du ston
T04D3903:126b-30: bud med kyis ni 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang
T04D3903:126b-31: brgya byin nyid la sogs pa thob pa med de
T04D3903:126b-32: bdag po gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:126b-33: bud med la bud med rin po che la sogs
T04D3903:126b-34: pa longs spyod pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro
T04D3903:126b-35: // rang byang chub dang bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
T04D3903:126b-36: go rims bzhin du de bse ru lta bur 'dre ba med pa dang /
T04D3903:126b-37: sa gsum gyi ston pa nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:126b-38: de ni skye bo g-yon can thams cad kyis bgrod par bya ba dang /
T04D3903:126b-39: shes rab chung ba nyid las slob dpon med par
T04D3903:126b-40: mngon par byang chub par mi rung bar kun du
T04D3903:126b-41: spyod pa gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:126b-42: sngags kyi tshul du ni thabs kyi khyad par gyis
T04D3903:126b-43: bud med kyis kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub
T04D3903:127a-0: rtogs so zhes gsungs so zhes zhar @127a * //
T04D3903:127a-2: khams gsum pa 'di yang sems can dang snod kyi
T04D3903:127a-3: 'jig rten gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis kyang
T04D3903:127a-4: ste phung po dang skye mched dang khams kyi rang
T04D3903:127a-5: bzhin no // de la phung po rnam lnga ste
T04D3903:127a-6: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
T04D3903:127a-7: rnams dang rnam par shes pa'o //
T04D3903:127a-8: de la mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce
T04D3903:127a-9: dang lus te dbang po rnams dang gzugs dang sgra
T04D3903:127a-10: dang dri dang ro dang reg bya ste /
T04D3903:127a-11: yul rnams dang bcu gzugs kyi phung po'o //
T04D3903:127a-12: gzhan na re rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'ang ngo zhes so //
T04D3903:127a-13: de yang rnam pa gnyis te 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams so //
T04D3903:127a-14: de la 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni sa
T04D3903:127a-15: dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams te reg
T04D3903:127a-17: lhag ma'i reg bya ni 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
T04D3903:127a-18: mig la sogs pa bcu rnams 'byung ba las gyur
T04D3903:127a-19: pa kho na ste 'byung ba rnams la yod pa'i
T04D3903:127a-20: phyir ro // dper na rtsva dang shing la sogs
T04D3903:127a-21: pa rgyur byas nas yod pa khyim dang bud shing
T04D3903:127a-22: rgyur byas nas me bzhin te /
T04D3903:127a-23: de bzhin du 'byung ba rnams la brten nas mig
T04D3903:127a-24: la sogs pa nye bar skye ba ni rgyur byas
T04D3903:127a-26: de nyid kyi phyir gang gi tshe 'byung ba chen
T04D3903:127a-27: po rnams gzugs brnyan bzhin rang bzhin med pa de'i
T04D3903:127a-28: tshe de'i rgyu can 'byung ba las gyur pa mig
T04D3903:127a-29: dang gzugs la sogs pa rang bzhin med pa nyid
T04D3903:127a-30: du bde blag tu rtogs so //
T04D3903:127a-31: gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams su dbang po las phyi
T04D3903:127a-32: rol pa ni rdul phra rab kyi rdzas brgyad par
T04D3903:127a-33: skye'o // de la rdzas brgyad rnams ni 'di lta
T04D3903:127a-34: ste 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang gzugs dang dri
T04D3903:127a-35: dang ro dang reg bya rnams so //
T04D3903:127a-36: nang gi bdag nyid lus kyi dbang po can ni rdzas dgu pa'o //
T04D3903:127a-37: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po can ni dbang po gzhan ldan te rdzas bcu pa'o //
T04D3903:127a-38: sgra dang bcas pa ni slar yang 'di rnams rdul
T04D3903:127a-39: phra rab kyi rdzas dgu dang bcu pa dang bcu
T04D3903:127a-40: gcig par skye'o // de la rdzas brgyad pa'i rdul
T04D3903:127a-41: phra rab la rdzas brgyad po de rnams se 'bru'i
T04D3903:127a-42: sa bon ltar rang bzhin so sor rnam par gnas
T04D3903:127a-44: 'o na ci zhe na btung ba la sogs pa
T04D3903:127a-45: la ko la dang ku lad tha dad bu ram
T04D3903:127a-46: dang bse yab la sogs pa'i khu ba bzhin 'dres
T04D3903:127a-47: par gyur nas rnam par gnas so //
T04D3903:127b-0: de la @127b rdul phra rab la re re'ang rdzas
T04D3903:127b-1: bdun bdun las tha dad par ma grub pa nyid
T04D3903:127b-2: kyi phyir rang bzhin grub pa med de /
T04D3903:127b-3: phan tshun ltos pa nyid kyis skye ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:127b-4: rnam pa thams cad du med pa yang ma yin
T04D3903:127b-5: te re re'ang rdzas bdun bdun rnams rgyur byas nas
T04D3903:127b-6: nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:127b-7: rigs pa 'di rdzas bcu dang bcu gcig gi rdul phra rab rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
T04D3903:127b-8: de ltar dbang po dang yul rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu'o //
T04D3903:127b-9: de las skyes pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba
T04D3903:127b-10: yang ste gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'i rten dang dmigs
T04D3903:127b-11: pa las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:127b-12: gzhan yang ji ltar 'byung ba chen po rnams phan
T04D3903:127b-13: tshun ltos nas skye ba nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin
T04D3903:127b-14: grub pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang sems
T04D3903:127b-15: las byung ba yang ste phan tshun gyi stobs las
T04D3903:127b-16: bskyed pas grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:127b-17: rang bzhin pa rnams ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid la shin tu mi 'jug go //
T04D3903:127b-18: de bzhin du mtshon cha dang mtshan nyid la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T04D3903:127b-19: de las ni mkhrang ba nyid dang mkhregs pa nyid
T04D3903:127b-20: dang sra ba nyid de 'dzin pa'i las can no
T04D3903:127b-21: // chu'i khams ni gsher ba nyid dang snum pa nyid de sdud pa'i las can no //
T04D3903:127b-22: me ni dro ba nyid de smin pa nyid dang skems pa'i las can no //
T04D3903:127b-23: rlung ni yang zhing g-yo ba nyid de 'phel ba dang 'gro bar byed pa'i las can no //
T04D3903:127b-24: 'di ltar 'phel ba ni cha shas lhag po bskyed pa'o //
T04D3903:127b-25: 'byung ba chen po 'di rnams kyi yang gcig gang na yod pa de na lhag ma rnams te /
T04D3903:127b-26: gang gi phyir rdo la sogs pa sa'i rdzas la
T04D3903:127b-27: sdud pa la sogs pa'i las mthong ba las chu
T04D3903:127b-28: dang me dang rlung rnams yod pa nyid du rjes
T04D3903:127b-29: su dpag go // chu la gru 'dzin pa dang
T04D3903:127b-30: dro ba dang 'bab pa mthong ba'i phyir sa dang
T04D3903:127b-32: me 'bar ba la bstan pa dang gong bur 'dril
T04D3903:127b-33: ba dang g-yo ba mthong ba'i phyir sa dang chu
T04D3903:127b-35: rlung la 'dzin pa dang grang ba dang dro ba'i
T04D3903:127b-36: reg pa mthong ba'i las sa dang chu dang me
T04D3903:127b-37: rnams so // nam mkha' ni chen po nyid du
T04D3903:127b-38: yod mod 'byung ba nyid ni ma yin te 'dus
T04D3903:127b-39: ma byas pa nyid kyis na thun mong dang thun
T04D3903:127b-40: mong ma yin pa'i las kyi khyad par bskyed pa
T04D3903:127b-41: nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes pas nam mkha' 'byung
T04D3903:127b-42: ba chen po ma yin no //
T04D3903:128a-0: mig gi dbang po ni mig gi zlum @128a * //
T04D3903:128a-1: skor na mig 'bras kyi nang na gnas pa mi
T04D3903:128a-2: mthong ba rgun 'brum gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam pa
T04D3903:128a-3: zi ra'i me tog dang 'dra bar gnas pa shin
T04D3903:128a-4: tu dang ba'i pags pas g-yogs pa'o //
T04D3903:128a-5: rna ba'i dbang po ni gro ga gcus pa lta bu rna ba'i nang na gnas pa'o //
T04D3903:128a-6: sna'i dbang po ni dril bu'i nang gi lce lta bu'o //
T04D3903:128a-7: lce'i dbang po ni zla ba phyed pa lta bu'o //
T04D3903:128a-8: lus kyi dbang po ni lus lta bur gnas so //
T04D3903:128a-9: lnga po 'di rnams rang gi don dmigs pa la
T04D3903:128a-10: dbang byed pa nyid kyi phyir dbang po rnams so
T04D3903:128a-11: // gzugs kyi skye mched ni kha dog dang dbyibs shes pa rnam pa gnyis so //
T04D3903:128a-12: kha dog ni sngon po dang ser po dang dmar
T04D3903:128a-13: po dang dkar po dang sprin dang du ba dang
T04D3903:128a-14: rdul dang khug rna dang grib ma dang nyi 'od
T04D3903:128a-15: dang snang ba dang chun pa'o //
T04D3903:128a-16: dbyibs ni ring po dang thung du dang lham pa
T04D3903:128a-17: dang zlum po dang mthon po dang dma' ba dang
T04D3903:128a-18: / dbyibs mnyam pa dang dbyibs mi mnyam pa'o //
T04D3903:128a-20: / snang ba ni zla ba dang skar ma dang
T04D3903:128a-21: me dang sman dang nor bu rnams kyi 'od do
T04D3903:128a-22: // sgra ni zin pa dang ma zin pa dang gnyis ka'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu can no //
T04D3903:128a-23: zin pa ni sems dang bcas pa'o //
T04D3903:128a-24: ma zin pa ni sen mo dang skra la sogs pa gang gcad pa la nad med pa'o //
T04D3903:128a-26: / ro ni rnam pa drug ste mngar ba dang
T04D3903:128a-27: sgyur ba dang lan tshva dang tsha ba dang kha
T04D3903:128a-28: ba dang bska ba'i bye brag gis so //
T04D3903:128a-29: reg bya ni bcu gcig gi bdag nyid de 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams dang /
T04D3903:128a-36: lto ba'i nang gi gang lus kyi dbang pos reg
T04D3903:128a-37: par bya ba de bkres pa ste bza' ba mngon
T04D3903:128a-39: skom pa ni btung ba mngon par 'dod pa ste rgyu las 'bras bu btags pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:128a-40: chu dang me'i khams shas che ba'i 'byung ba 'dus na 'jam pa nyid do //
T04D3903:128a-41: sa dang rlung shas chen rtsub pa nyid do //
T04D3903:128a-42: sa dang chu shas che na lci ba nyid do //
T04D3903:128a-43: me dang rlung shas che na yang ba nyid do //
T04D3903:128a-44: chu dang rlung shas che na grang ba'o //
T04D3903:128a-45: rlung shas che na bkres so //
T04D3903:128a-46: me dang rlung shas che na skom pa'o zhes pa dbang po lnga'i yul rnams so //
T04D3903:128b-0: de la mig la sogs pa lnga rnams @128b ni
T04D3903:128b-1: rang gi 'bras bu rnam par shes pa las rjes
T04D3903:128b-2: su dpag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir yid kyi
T04D3903:128b-3: rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba
T04D3903:128b-4: kho na'o // gzugs la sogs pa lnga rnams ni
T04D3903:128b-5: mig la sogs pa lnga'i rnam par shes pa rnams
T04D3903:128b-6: kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'o //
T04D3903:128b-7: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni dngos por
T04D3903:128b-8: yod pa ma yin no zhes sngar bsgrubs zin to
T04D3903:128b-9: // de'i phyir bcu po nyid gzugs su rung /
T04D3903:128b-10: gang rnams gang du gnod par bya ba dang thogs
T04D3903:128b-11: par bya ba'o zhes pas thogs pa dang bcas pa'i
T04D3903:128b-12: gzugs rnams so // de rnams kyi phung po ni gzugs kyi phung por bshad do //
T04D3903:128b-13: tshim par bya ba dang yongs su gdung bar byed
T04D3903:128b-14: pa dang de gnyis las rnam par grol ba'i yul
T04D3903:128b-15: gyi rang gi ngo bo mngon sum du bya bas
T04D3903:128b-16: yul nyams su myong ba rnam par shes pa'i nyams
T04D3903:128b-17: su myong ba rig pa ni tshor ba zhes brjod
T04D3903:128b-18: do // de la bye brag smra ba rnams na
T04D3903:128b-19: re sems ni gtso bo yin la sems las byung
T04D3903:128b-21: de rnams ni sems kyi 'di rnams sam sems la
T04D3903:128b-22: yod pa rnams yin pas sems kyi bya ba'i rang
T04D3903:128b-23: bzhin te tha dad du grub bo //
T04D3903:128b-24: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i dus su ni
T04D3903:128b-25: shes rab sems las byung ba cha shas kyang gsal
T04D3903:128b-26: la / la la la lar chos gtso bo ste /
T04D3903:128b-27: dper na mngon par yid ches pa'i dus na dad
T04D3903:128b-28: pa la sogs pa zag pa med pa'i phung po
T04D3903:128b-29: lnga'i tshogs pa lta bu'o zhes so //
T04D3903:128b-30: rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams na re sems kyi
T04D3903:128b-31: bya ba'i rang bzhin sems kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad
T04D3903:128b-32: par sems las byung ba ste sems las tha dad
T04D3903:128b-33: pa ma yin no zhes so //
T04D3903:128b-34: dbu ma pa rnams na re kun rdzob tu ma
T04D3903:128b-35: brtags na nyams dga' ba nyid kyi phyir ji lta
T04D3903:128b-36: ba de lta ste kha cig tu de nyid dang
T04D3903:128b-37: 'ga' zhig tu gzhan nyid lta bu tha snyad byed
T04D3903:128b-38: la don dam par ni de nyid dang gzhan nyid
T04D3903:128b-40: tshor ba de yang lus kyi dang sems kyi'o //
T04D3903:128b-41: slar yang rnam pa gsum ste bdag dang sdug bsngal
T04D3903:128b-42: dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma
T04D3903:128b-43: yin pa'o // slar yang rnam pa lnga ste bde
T04D3903:128b-44: ba dang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang
T04D3903:128b-45: btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams so //
T04D3903:128b-46: de la gzugs can gyi dbang po la brten pa'i
T04D3903:128b-47: rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang
T04D3903:129a-0: / @129a * // bsam gtan gsum pa na yid kyi yang ste sim pa'i tshor ba ni bde ba'i dbang po'o //
T04D3903:129a-1: gzugs can gyi dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang
T04D3903:129a-2: mtshungs par ldan pa sim pa ma yin pa'i tshor
T04D3903:129a-3: ba ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po'o //
T04D3903:129a-4: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan
T04D3903:129a-5: pa tshim pa'i tshor ba ni bde ba'i dbang po'o
T04D3903:129a-6: // yid nyid tshim pa ma yin pa ni yid mi bde ba'i dbang po'o //
T04D3903:129a-7: thams cad kyi nyid sim pa yang ma yin sim
T04D3903:129a-8: pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba
T04D3903:129a-9: ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o //
T04D3903:129a-10: gang gi phyir sems kyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal
T04D3903:129a-11: phal cher rnam par rtog pa las skyes shing lus
T04D3903:129a-13: yul gyi dbang las dgra bcom pa rnams la yang skye ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:129a-14: slar yang rnam pa drug ste mig gi 'dus te
T04D3903:129a-15: reg pa las byung ba nas yid kyi 'dus te
T04D3903:129a-16: reg pa las byung ba ji srid pa'i bar ro
T04D3903:129a-17: zhes pa tshor ba'i phung po brjod zin to //
T04D3903:129a-18: 'dir bum pa dang snam bu dang gzugs la sogs
T04D3903:129a-19: pa 'dus byas rnams la 'dus byas su thun mong
T04D3903:129a-20: ba nyid na'ang so so rang gi rgyu dang rkyen
T04D3903:129a-21: rnams la khyad par yod do //
T04D3903:129a-22: de'i khyad par las kyang lto ldir ba la sogs pa'i phan tshun khyad par yod do //
T04D3903:129a-23: khyad par de nyid mtshan ma zhes brjod de das
T04D3903:129a-24: don rnams khyad par du rjes su dpag par bya
T04D3903:129a-26: bum pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan ma de sems
T04D3903:129a-27: las byung ba'i chos gang gis 'dzin pa dang 'du
T04D3903:129a-28: shes pa dang yongs su gcod par byed pa de
T04D3903:129a-29: ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid 'du shes zhes
T04D3903:129a-30: brjod do // 'di la bye brag tu smra ba
T04D3903:129a-31: rnams na re mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i ming dang
T04D3903:129a-32: lhan cig don gcig la 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni
T04D3903:129a-33: ming gi don gsal bar byed cing 'du shes kyis
T04D3903:129a-35: de ni ming dang mtshan ma dang don gyi brdas shes pa rnams kyi gsal ba ste /
T04D3903:129a-36: de rnams dag las ming nges par byed cing ming las kyang don no //
T04D3903:129a-37: de nyid kyi phyir ngag ming la 'jug cing ming gis don gsal bar byed do //
T04D3903:129a-38: brda la ma byad ba ni mi gsal ba'i 'du
T04D3903:129a-39: shes kyis ming gis don rtogs par mi byed la
T04D3903:129a-40: / ming gis don rtogs su 'jug par yang mi byed do zhes zer ro //
T04D3903:129a-41: de yang gzhan du rnam par dpyad zin to //
T04D3903:129b-0: phyi rol du'am yid @129b la'ang rung ste gang du'ang sgra dang 'dres med la //
T04D3903:129b-1: slar yang yi ge'i rnam pa dang 'dres don gyi rnam pa cung zad spro //
T04D3903:129b-2: mi bden bdag nyid du gnas gang yang blo nyid kyis zhen pa //
T04D3903:129b-3: de dag phyi rol dang ni ngag la nges par
T04D3903:129b-4: 'dzin te de phyir rnam par rtog par gzhag /
T04D3903:129b-5: ces so // 'du shes de yang rnam pa drug ste /
T04D3903:129b-6: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan
T04D3903:129b-7: pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs
T04D3903:129b-8: par ldan pa'i par ro zhes pa 'du shes kyi
T04D3903:129b-9: phung po'o // 'du byed kyi phung po ni sems byung ste /
T04D3903:129b-10: de las tshor ba dang 'du shes dag byung ste
T04D3903:129b-11: rtsod pa'i rtsa ba nyid dang 'khor ba'i rgyu nyid
T04D3903:129b-12: kyi phyir phung po logs su byas so //
T04D3903:129b-13: rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni gnyis te 'dod pa la
T04D3903:129b-14: lhag par chags pa dang lta ba la lhag par
T04D3903:129b-15: chags pa'o // de dag gi gtso bo'i rgyu ni
T04D3903:129b-16: go rims bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dag
T04D3903:129b-17: chags pa'o // go // 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa
T04D3903:129b-18: yang de dag ste tshor ba la chags pa dang
T04D3903:129b-19: 'du shes phyin ci log par 'khor ba'i phyir ro
T04D3903:129b-20: chags pa'o // go // // de las gzhan pa'i
T04D3903:129b-21: sems las byung ba rnams ni sems pa dang reg
T04D3903:129b-22: pa dang yid la byed pa dang 'dun pa dang
T04D3903:129b-23: mos pa dang dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran
T04D3903:129b-24: pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rtog
T04D3903:129b-25: pa dang dpyod pa dang bag yod pa dang bag
T04D3903:129b-26: chags pa'o // go // // med pa dang / yid 'byung ba dang /
T04D3903:129b-28: shin tu sbyangs pa dang shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin pa dang /
T04D3903:129b-29: rnam par 'tsho ba dang rnam par mi 'tsho ba dang /
T04D3903:129b-30: ngo tsha dang khrel yod pa dang btang snyoms dang
T04D3903:129b-31: rnam par grol ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
T04D3903:129b-32: dang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang lung du
T04D3903:129b-33: ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba rnams dang /
T04D3903:129b-34: kun du sbyor ba rnams dang 'ching ba rnams dang /
T04D3903:129b-35: phra rgyas rnams dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang kun nas dkris pa rnams dang /
T04D3903:129b-36: zag pa rnams dang chu bo rnams dang sbyor ba
T04D3903:129b-37: rnams dang nye bar len pa rnams dang mdud pa
T04D3903:129b-38: rnams dang sgrib pa rnams dang shes pa rnams dang
T04D3903:129b-39: bzod pa rnams te 'du byed rnams so //
T04D3903:129b-40: de la sems pa ni sems mngon par 'du byed pa yid kyi las te /
T04D3903:129b-41: sems bya ba dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin thob pas
T04D3903:129b-42: de dang de la 'jug par byed pa'i las can
T04D3903:130a-0: de yang rnam pa gsum ste dge ba dang mi dge ba dang @130a * //
T04D3903:130a-2: yang mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pas drug go //
T04D3903:130a-3: reg pa ni pha dang ma dang bur gzhag pa

T04D3903:151b-5: khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha

T04D3903:151b-16: pa rnams kyis nges par bsten par bya'o //

T04D3903:151b-18: gcig kho na dang chos thams cad don dam par
T04D3903:151b-19: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du grub po //

T04D3903:151b-21: de kho na stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med

T04D3903:151b-23: // thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan las byang chub kyi sems kyi snang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o /

T04D3903:152a-38: med pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis nye bar

T04D3903:152b-2: sgro 'dogs pa bzlog pas mi rtag pa dang sdug
T04D3903:152b-3: bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam
T04D3903:152b-4: pa rnams kyi bsgom par bya ba'i de kho na

T04D3903:152b-12: 'gyur ba'i dngos po'i rgyu can dang dbang phyug la
T04D3903:152b-13: sogs pa'i rgyu can nyid kyi phyir blo dang ldan
T04D3903:152b-14: pa'i rgyu can no zhes pa de'i gnyen por rgyu
T04D3903:152b-15: dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang
T04D3903:152b-16: rkyen zhes pa'i ldog pa bzhi ste de rnams kyi
T04D3903:152b-17: bsgom par bya ba ni kun 'byung gi bden pa

T04D3903:152b-20: dang bsam gtan gyi bde ba kho na gya nom

T04D3903:152b-22: zhes pa'i gnyen por 'gog pa dang zhi ba dang
T04D3903:152b-23: gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba zhes pa
T04D3903:152b-24: ldog pa bzhi ste de rnams kyi bsgom par bya
T04D3903:152b-25: ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes par tha snyad
T04D3903:152b-26: du bya ste sngon po la sogs pa las gzhan
T04D3903:152b-27: pa'i 'gog pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:152b-28: de bzhin du bdag yod pa'i phyir bdag med pa'i
T04D3903:152b-29: mtshan nyid can gyi lam med pa dang 'di lam
T04D3903:152b-30: ngan pa dang lam gzhan yang yod pa dang slar

T04D3903:152b-41: bas mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams
T04D3903:152b-42: kyis rnam pa bcu drug tu yang ngo //
T04D3903:152b-44: skye ba sdug bsngal lo rga ba ni sdug bsngal
T04D3903:152b-45: lo zhes pa la sogs pas 'du byed kyi sdug
T04D3903:152b-46: bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang rnam par

T04D3903:152b-48: pa ste 'bras bur gyur pa'i nye bar len pa'i
T04D3903:153a-1: gyur pa ni kun 'byung gi bden pa'o //
T04D3903:153a-2: sred pa dang las yongs su zad pa las gang
T04D3903:153a-3: sdug bsngal shin tu skye ba med pa'i mya ngan
T04D3903:153a-4: las 'das pa ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'o //
T04D3903:153a-5: de thob pa'i thabs ni lam gyi bden pa'o //
T04D3903:153a-6: 'di rnams kyi rim pa yang ji ltar mngon par rtogs pa ste /
T04D3903:153a-7: de ltar ni dang po rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs na sdug bsngal la rtog go //
T04D3903:153a-8: phyi nas 'di'i rgyu ci zhes kun 'byung la'o //
T04D3903:153a-10: 'di'i lam ci zhes lam la ste /
T04D3903:153a-11: nang mthong na de'i gzhi dang zad pa dang sman tshol ba bzhin no //

T04D3903:153a-13: khrims sa dang 'dra ba la nges par brten no
T04D3903:153a-14: zhes rtogs nas so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang
T04D3903:153a-15: dag par blangs pas tshul khrims la gnas par gyur
T04D3903:153a-16: pa sgom pa la sbyor ba'i dus na dam pa
T04D3903:153a-17: ma yin pa dang 'dres pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T04D3903:153a-19: de la 'dod chags la spyod pas dang por ting
T04D3903:153a-20: nge 'dzin gyi don du mi sdug pa sgom par
T04D3903:153a-21: byed do // 'dod chags kyang rnam pa dgur bcom ldan 'das ma chen mor bstan te /
T04D3903:153a-22: 'di lta ste dbyibs la chags pa dang 'khrig pa'i dngos po la chags pa dang /
T04D3903:153a-23: tsandan la sogs pa'i dris bskyed pa'i lus la chags pa dang /
T04D3903:153a-24: rgyan gyis bskyed pa'i lus mdzes pa la chags pa dang /
T04D3903:153a-25: lus kyi kha dog la chags pa dang /
T04D3903:153a-26: sha rgyas pa la chags pa dang /
T04D3903:153a-27: yan lag dang nying lag gi sgeg pa la chags pa dang /
T04D3903:153a-28: so'i mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa la chags pa dang /
T04D3903:153a-29: kha dog dang dbyibs la chags pa'o zhes so //
T04D3903:153a-30: de'i gnyen por grangs ji lta bar mi sdug pa rnam pa dgu sgom pa ste /
T04D3903:153a-31: dper na spos pa bzhin du rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /
T04D3903:153a-32: yan lag so sor gyur pa nyid kyis 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /
T04D3903:153a-33: dri nga zhing rnag gi rang bzhin nyid kyis na rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /
T04D3903:153a-34: pags pa bshus pa ltar rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang ;
T04D3903:153a-35: rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /
T04D3903:153a-36: mi gtsang ba'i phung po'i 'du shes dang so sor
T04D3903:153a-37: ring du gyur pa nyid kyis rnam par 'thor ba'i
T04D3903:153a-38: 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang /
T04D3903:153a-39: rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes so zhes pa'o //
T04D3903:153a-40: rnam par rtog pa la dpyod pas ni dbugs rngub pa dang /
T04D3903:153b-0: 'byung ba rjes su dran @153b pa goms par byed do //
T04D3903:153b-1: dbugs rngub pa ni dbugs sdud pa ste 'jug pa'i rlung ngo //
T04D3903:153b-2: dbugs 'byung ba ni dbugs spro ba ste phyir 'gro ba'i rlung ngo //
T04D3903:153b-3: de la dmigs pa'i shes rab ni dbugs rngub pa
T04D3903:153b-4: dang 'byung ba rjes su dran pa ste dran pa'i
T04D3903:153b-5: rgyu nyid kyi phyir dran par brjod do //
T04D3903:153b-6: de la lus dang sems dag brlan nas dbugs rngub
T04D3903:153b-7: pa dang 'byung ba tsam la sems gtad de dbugs
T04D3903:153b-8: 'byung ba dang dbugs rngub pa dag so sor gcig
T04D3903:153b-9: dang gnyis dang / ji srid bcu'i bar du rnam par g-yeng ba med par bgrang bar byed de /

T04D3903:153b-11: 'di ni rlung 'ba' zhig kho na ma yin gyi
T04D3903:153b-12: de rnams ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang de
