T04D3903:165a-34: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dang rnyog pa
T04D3903:165a-35: mtha' dag dang bral ba nyid dang de las gzhan
T04D3903:165a-36: pa'i ye shes khyad par can gyi rgyu nyid kyis
T04D3903:165a-37: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no
T04D3903:165a-38: // tha dad pa mtha' dag mchog tu 'dzin pa
T04D3903:165a-39: med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir mnyam pa nyid
T04D3903:165a-40: kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T04D3903:165a-41: phyin ci log ma lus pa dang bral ba'i ngo
T04D3903:165a-42: bo nyid kyi phyir so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
T04D3903:165a-44: 'gro ba ma lus pa la phan pa sgrub pa'i
T04D3903:165a-45: ngo bo nyid kyi phyir bya ba sgrub pa'i ye
T04D3903:165a-47: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa
T04D3903:165a-48: dang bral ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam
T04D3903:165a-49: par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T04D3903:165a-50: dmigs pa las ldog pas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:165a-51: mtshan ma mtha' dag las bzlog pas mtshan ma med pa'i bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:165b-0: @165b log pa'i smon lam las ldog pas smon pa med pa'i bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:165b-1: phyin ci log gi 'du byed las bzlog pas mngon
T04D3903:165b-2: par 'du byed pa med pa'i bdag nyid do zhes
T04D3903:165b-3: rnam par thar pa sgo bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
T04D3903:165b-4: de bzhin du de kho na mig la sogs par
T04D3903:165b-5: dmigs pa las ldog pas nang stong pa nyid kyi
T04D3903:165b-6: rang bzhin no // gzugs la sogs par dmigs pa
T04D3903:165b-7: las ldog pas phyi stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin
T04D3903:165b-8: rang bzhin no // no // phyi nang gi rten
T04D3903:165b-9: du dmigs pa las ldog pas phyi nang stong pa
T04D3903:165b-11: dbang po rnams kyi rten ni sems kyis zin pa'i
T04D3903:165b-12: phyi nang dang phyi rol yang dbang pos bsdus pa
T04D3903:165b-13: ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:165b-14: stong pa nyid du dmigs pa las ldog pas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:165b-15: snod kyi 'jig rten du lhag par zhen pa las
T04D3903:165b-16: ldog pas chen po stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid
T04D3903:165b-17: do // don dam par dmigs pa las ldog pas don dam pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:165b-18: 'dus byas bsod nams kyi tshogs su dmigs pa las
T04D3903:165b-19: ldog pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid
T04D3903:165b-20: do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid byang chub
T04D3903:165b-21: kyi tshogs su nye bar dmigs pa las ldog pas
T04D3903:165b-22: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do
T04D3903:165b-23: do // // sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba 'debs
T04D3903:165b-24: pa'i mthar dmigs pa las ldog pas mtha' las 'das
T04D3903:165b-25: pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T04D3903:165b-26: thog ma dang tha ma'i mtha' dang 'bral ba'i 'khor
T04D3903:165b-27: bar dmigs pa las ldog pas thog ma dang tha
T04D3903:165b-28: ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do
T04D3903:165b-29: // dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi 'dor bar dmigs
T04D3903:165b-30: pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag
T04D3903:165b-31: // nyid do // chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
T04D3903:165b-32: du dmigs pa las ldog pas rang bzhin stong pa
T04D3903:165b-33: nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ste /
T04D3903:165b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis ma
T04D3903:165b-35: mdzad pa'i phyir chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni rang
T04D3903:165b-36: bzhin no // stobs dang mi 'jigs pa las sogs
T04D3903:165b-37: pa'i ngo ba'i chos kyi skur dmigs pa las ldog
T04D3903:165b-38: pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid
T04D3903:165b-39: bzhin no // do // rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid
T04D3903:165b-40: du dmigs pa las ldog pas rang gi mtshan nyid
T04D3903:165b-41: stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:165b-42: dmigs pa med par dmigs pa las ldog pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:165b-43: phan tshun mi dmigs pa'i phyir dmigs pa med pa ni 'dir dus gsum mo //
T04D3903:165b-44: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa
T04D3903:165b-45: las ldog pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
T04D3903:165b-46: stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:166a-0: @166a * // dngos po med pa yang 'di yin la ngo bo
T04D3903:166a-1: nyid kyang yin pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
T04D3903:166a-2: nyid de sbyor ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid
T04D3903:166a-3: do // de ci ltar dngos po med pa yin zhe na /
T04D3903:166a-4: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:166a-5: dngos por dmigs pa las ldog pas dngos po stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid de /
T04D3903:166a-6: skye bas na dngos po ste phung po lnga rnams so //
T04D3903:166a-7: dngos po med par dmigs pa las ldog pas dngos
T04D3903:166a-8: po med pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid de
T04D3903:166a-9: / skye ba med pas dngos po med pa ste nam mkha'o //
T04D3903:166a-10: rang gi ngo bor dmigs pa las ldog pas rang
T04D3903:166a-11: gi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do
T04D3903:166a-12: // chos rnams kyi rang bzhin phyin ci ma log
T04D3903:166a-13: par ma bcos pa ni rang gi ngo bo ste
T04D3903:166a-15: pha rol gyi ngo bor dmigs pa las ldog pas
T04D3903:166a-16: pha rol gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi bdag
T04D3903:166a-17: nyid de / mchog nyid kyi phyir 'di pha rol
T04D3903:166a-18: yang yin la gzhan rnams kyis ma byas pa nyid
T04D3903:166a-19: kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yang ngo bo yin
T04D3903:166a-20: pas pha rol gyi ngo bo ste de bzhin nyid
T04D3903:166a-21: do zhes pas 'di ni stong pa nyid nyi shu
T04D3903:166a-22: rnams kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:166a-23: de bzhin du ser sna dang tshul khrims 'chal pa
T04D3903:166a-24: dang mi bzod pa dang le lo dang rnam par
T04D3903:166a-25: g-yeng ba dang 'chal pa'i shes rab dang thabs ma
T04D3903:166a-26: yin pa dang log pa'i smon lam dang stobs med
T04D3903:166a-27: pa nyid dang mi shes pa las ldog pas sbyin
T04D3903:166a-28: pa dang tshul khrams [*khrims?] dang bzod pa dang brtson
T04D3903:166a-29: 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab dang thabs dang
T04D3903:166a-30: smon lam dang stobs dang ye shes kyi pha rol
T04D3903:166a-31: tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:166a-32: dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin
T04D3903:166a-33: gyi rang bzhin no zhes pas bsod nams kyi bdag
T04D3903:166a-34: nyid do // 'di'i rang bzhin kho na'i ting nge
T04D3903:166a-35: 'dzin rnams gnas skabs kyi khyad par la bya ba
T04D3903:166a-36: rnams so so so sor byed pa'i phyir dpa' bar
T04D3903:166a-37: 'gro ba dang nam mkha' mdzod ces pa la sogs
T04D3903:166a-38: pa ming sna tshogs pa rnams kyis brjod kyi rang
T04D3903:166a-39: bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T04D3903:166a-40: de ltar ni gang gi dbang gis yo byad thams
T04D3903:166a-41: cad nam mkha' las skye ba de ni nam mkhar
T04D3903:166a-42: ram 'di'i mdzod do zhes pas nam mkha' mdzod kyi
T04D3903:166a-43: ting nge 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa bya ba
T04D3903:166a-44: tha dad pa ste mdo ji lta bar shes par
T04D3903:166a-45: bya'o // sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog
T04D3903:166a-46: pa dang lam gyi bden pa rnams rang bzhin med
T04D3903:166a-47: pa'i phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs
T04D3903:166a-48: pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi
T04D3903:166a-49: ngo bo'i rnam pa rnam par gcod pa las ldog
T04D3903:166b-1: de nyid kyi phyir med pa la sogs pa thams
T04D3903:166b-2: cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i bdag nyid dang
T04D3903:166b-3: 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa lam shes
T04D3903:166b-4: pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i bdag nyid kyang ngo //
T04D3903:166b-5: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
T04D3903:166b-6: gyi rang bzhin nyid kyis dang gnyen po'i lam la
T04D3903:166b-7: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
T04D3903:166b-8: pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang
T04D3903:166b-9: / sprul pa'i lam la rnam par thar pa gsum dang /
T04D3903:166b-10: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i lam la
T04D3903:166b-11: thar pa dang mthun par gnas pa'i rang bzhin la
T04D3903:166b-12: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang zhi
T04D3903:166b-13: bar gnas pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin la 'du shes
T04D3903:166b-14: dang tshor ba 'gog pa dang 'jig rten las 'das
T04D3903:166b-15: pa mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i lam
T04D3903:166b-16: la bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi dang
T04D3903:166b-17: 'gog pa dang mthong ba'i lam la bar chad med
T04D3903:166b-18: pa'i lam bzhi dang sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam la
T04D3903:166b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams so zhes pa
T04D3903:166b-20: rnam pa sum cu rtsa bzhi nyid kyis dang stobs
T04D3903:166b-21: dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par
T04D3903:166b-22: rig pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
T04D3903:166b-23: dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa'i de bzhin
T04D3903:166b-24: nyid dang / chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i
T04D3903:166b-25: rang 'byung dang rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs
T04D3903:166b-26: par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de rnam pa
T04D3903:166b-27: sum cu rtsa dgu nyid kyis na dmigs pa dang
T04D3903:166b-28: ye shes kyi rnam pa'i rang gi ngo bo thams
T04D3903:166b-29: cad shes pa nyid dang lam shes pa nyid dang
T04D3903:166b-30: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'ang rang
T04D3903:166b-31: nyid dang / bzhin no // de nyid kyi phyir
T04D3903:166b-32: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dag nang
T04D3903:166b-33: du 'dus pa'i phyir lam thams cad kyi bdag nyid
T04D3903:166b-34: nyid dang / bzhin no // do // nyan thos
T04D3903:166b-35: dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T04D3903:166b-36: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzungs dang mngon par shes
T04D3903:166b-37: pa la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten
T04D3903:166b-38: las 'das pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:166b-39: tshangs pa la sogs pa nas ba lang rdzi'i bar
T04D3903:166b-40: gyi sems can gyi rgyud la yod pa'i gang cung
T04D3903:166b-41: zad ye shes sam ting nge 'dzin gzhan la phan
T04D3903:166b-42: pa'i thabs su gyur pa de thams cad 'di nyid
T04D3903:166b-43: du ste / de ni thabs thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:166b-44: 'on kyang me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs
T04D3903:166b-45: pa'i chos 'di rnams rim gyis sems bskyed pa nyi
T04D3903:166b-46: shu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di
T04D3903:166b-47: sems bskyed pa 'ga' zhig kho na la bya ba
T04D3903:166b-48: la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi sgo nas ldog pa
T04D3903:167a-0: @167a * // tha dad pas 'ga' zhig kho na rnam par gzhag gi /
T04D3903:167a-1: thams cad du thams cad rnams ma yin no //
T04D3903:167a-2: de ltar re zhig byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par
T04D3903:167a-3: gzhag pa'i gnas skabs na spros pa med pa'i shes
T04D3903:167a-4: rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor gyi
T04D3903:167a-5: bdag nyid ni gnas skabs kyi dbye ba ji lta
T04D3903:167a-6: bar tha dad par ji ltar rigs par bshad pa'i
T04D3903:167a-7: chos kyi rang bzhin du mgon po rnams kyis rnam
T04D3903:167a-8: par gzhag go // de'i rtags ni phal cher /
T04D3903:167a-9: mi sems bzhin du snang med dang //
T04D3903:167a-10: gnyid log bzhin du mi 'phro bar //
T04D3903:167a-11: ngal ba ngal bso bzhin du yang //
T04D3903:167a-12: sems ni bdag med la dmigs nas //
T04D3903:167a-13: mig dag rengs par byed pa dang //
T04D3903:167a-14: mgo bo dud pa nyid dang ni //
T04D3903:167a-15: sems dang sems byung mi g-yo dang //
T04D3903:167a-16: stong nyid mthong ba'i stong pa nyid //
T04D3903:167a-17: gang gi tshe rnal 'byor de las langs pa de'i
T04D3903:167a-18: tshe yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs na
T04D3903:167a-19: mos pas de bzhin nyid kho nar bsgom par bya'o
T04D3903:167a-21: gang rnams rnam par dben pa zhes //
T04D3903:167a-22: yid ni g-yo ba'ang mi g-yo ba //
T04D3903:167a-23: de rnams nyon mongs sbrul 'khrugs pa'i //
T04D3903:167a-24: srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'jigs rung brgal //
T04D3903:167a-26: rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs su yang gsungs pa /
T04D3903:167a-27: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings
T04D3903:167a-28: la gnas pas ni shes bya dang khyad par med
T04D3903:167a-29: pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi chos
T04D3903:167a-30: rnams thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par mthong
T04D3903:167a-31: ngo // de'i rjes la thob pas ni sgyu ma
T04D3903:167a-32: dang smig rgyu dang rmi lam dang mig yor dang
T04D3903:167a-33: brag ca dang gzugs brnyan dang sprul pa dang mtshungs
T04D3903:167a-34: ngo // par mthong ngo // de nas bde ba
T04D3903:167a-35: chen po la gnas pa'i sems dang yangs pa nyid
T04D3903:167a-36: ngo // par mthong ngo // 'thob po // phun
T04D3903:167a-37: sum tshogs pa'i sems chen po yangs pa nyid dang
T04D3903:167a-38: shes rab chen po dang ye shes yangs pa nyid
T04D3903:167a-39: kyang ngo zhes rgya cher ro //
T04D3903:167a-40: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' thabs bstan pa'i dus su yang phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir /
T04D3903:167a-41: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes las sbyor ba dang /
T04D3903:167a-42: 'jug la sgyu ma bzhin du sgom pa ji lta
T04D3903:167a-43: ba bzhin du dngos po'i de kho na nyid la
T04D3903:167a-44: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i shes rab yang dag
T04D3903:167a-45: par 'byung ba kho na'o zhes pa thabs dang shes
T04D3903:167a-46: rab zung du 'brel par 'byung ba'i lam 'byung ba
T04D3903:167a-47: kho na'o // 'di kho na rig pa chen mo
T04D3903:167a-48: mchog gi spyod pa bslab pa bla na med pa
T04D3903:167a-49: kho na'o // yang ste / ji skad du bcom
T04D3903:167a-50: ldan 'das ma yon tan rin po che sdud pa
T04D3903:167a-51: tshigs su bcad par gsungs pa /
T04D3903:167b-0: @167b rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rig sngags che //
T04D3903:167b-1: sems can khams mang mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed //
T04D3903:167b-2: gang dag 'das dang gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon //
T04D3903:167b-3: rig sngags 'di bslabs chos kyi rgyal po bla med 'gyur //
T04D3903:167b-4: gang zhig 'dir brjod sangs rgyas chos rnams mi rtog ste //
T04D3903:167b-5: stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa byang chub zhi mi
T04D3903:167b-6: rtog / rnam par mi rtog rtog bral byin gyi
T04D3903:167b-7: rlabs kyis spyod // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
T04D3903:167b-8: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can ji snyed ma lus pa //
T04D3903:167b-9: de rnams thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
T04D3903:167b-10: lo stong bye ba mang por sbyin pa sbyin byas la //
T04D3903:167b-11: kun kyang 'gro ba'i don rgyur byang chub yongs bsngo yang //
T04D3903:167b-12: gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin la mngon brtson pa //
T04D3903:167b-13: tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjes su mthun byed na //
T04D3903:167b-14: de la sbyin pa'i phung pos bsod nams char mi phod //
T04D3903:167b-15: de phyir g-yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya //
T04D3903:167b-16: shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T04D3903:167b-17: snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med //
T04D3903:167b-18: de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur //
T04D3903:167b-19: rtag tu yul 'khor bsod snyoms don yod yongs su spyod //
T04D3903:167b-20: byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir yun ring 'brel pa yi //
T04D3903:167b-21: lha mi ngan song gsum gyi sems can dgrol ba'i phyir //
T04D3903:167b-22: lam yangs pha rol sems can khams la ston 'dod pas //
T04D3903:167b-23: nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin la brtson par bya //
T04D3903:167b-24: bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod pa //
T04D3903:167b-25: ji snyed kun gyi mchog dang gong na med pa yin //
T04D3903:167b-26: mkhas pa gang zhig bslab kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas //
T04D3903:167b-27: sangs rgyas bslab pa shes rab pha rol phyin 'dir slob //
T04D3903:167b-28: de ltar spyod mkhas rnams la lha tshogs mang po rnams //
T04D3903:167b-29: thal mo sbyar bar byas shing btud nas phyag 'tshal byed //
T04D3903:167b-30: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed pa'ang //
T04D3903:167b-31: yon tan bsngags pa'i phreng ba yongs su sgrogs par mdzad //
T04D3903:167b-32: sems can kun gyi yon tan mchog tu 'gro ba dang //
T04D3903:167b-33: sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu rmad byung mchog reg dang //
T04D3903:167b-34: chos kyi sbyin pa rab mchog dam pa sbyin 'dod gang //
T04D3903:167b-35: phan mdzad rnams kyis gnas mchog 'di la brten par gyis //
T04D3903:167b-37: de ltar 'di ni dbang po rnon po nyid yin
T04D3903:167b-38: pa'i phyir so so skye bo'i gnas skabs na tshogs
T04D3903:167b-39: gnyis rdzogs pa la rtag tu mngon par sbyor bar
T04D3903:168a-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
T04D3903:168a-2: kho na'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs la 'jug
T04D3903:168a-3: go // thabs kyang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha
T04D3903:168a-4: rol tu phyin pa dang tshad med pa dang bsdu
T04D3903:168a-5: ba'i dngos po la sogs pa'i bye brag gis te
T04D3903:168a-6: go // / de ltar kho nar yang 'phags pa
T04D3903:168a-7: blo gros mi zad pa dang mdo sde dkon mchog
T04D3903:168a-8: sprin la sogs pa'i mdo sde rnams su gsungs so
T04D3903:168a-9: go // / // shes rab ni thabs de kho
T04D3903:168a-10: na phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin du yongs
T04D3903:168a-12: gang gi phyir des yang dag pa'i thabs su rnam par phye nas /

T04D3903:209a-33: cha dang mthun pa rnam pa bzhi rnams kyi so

T04D3903:216a-35: pa cung zad kyang med do zhes so //
T04D3903:216a-36: 'phags pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga par yang /
T04D3903:216a-37: gzhung 'grel gyi rnam pa lngar bkrol te /
T04D3903:216a-38: rab tu dga' ba la lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'o //
T04D3903:216a-39: de nas bdun pa ji srid par 'bad pa dang bcas par mtshan ma med par gnas pa'o //
T04D3903:216b-0: brgyad pa la lhun gyis grub par mtshan ma med @216b par gnas pa'o //
T04D3903:216b-1: de nas bcu pa'i thar la spyod pa nges pa la zhugs pa'o //
T04D3903:216b-2: de nas gong du skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o zhes so //
T04D3903:216b-5: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa dang /
T04D3903:216b-6: mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa sa gnyis pa
T04D3903:216b-7: nas bzung nas drug pa'i bar dang 'jig rten las
T04D3903:216b-8: 'das pa'i drug pa la bar dang bcas par mtshan
T04D3903:216b-9: ma med par gnas pa dang /
T04D3903:216b-10: bdun pa la mtshan ma med par mtha' gcig tu gnas pa dang /
T04D3903:216b-11: brgyad pa nas bzung nas mtshan ma med par lhun gyis grub pa ste /
T04D3903:216b-13: mtshan ma med par gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa rnam pa drug nyid do //
T04D3903:216b-14: de la mtshan ma la spyod pa nyid ni zhi
T04D3903:216b-15: gnas la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gsum la mkhas pa'i
T04D3903:216b-16: phyir ro // de'i phyir mdo sde'i rgyan du /
T04D3903:216b-17: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa pa nyid na yang
T04D3903:216b-18: sa lnga pa ji srid bar 'bad pa dang bcas
T04D3903:216b-19: par gnas pa'o // drug pa dang bdun pa dag
T04D3903:216b-20: mtshan ma med pa yang ngo zhes 'bad pa dang
T04D3903:216b-21: bcas shing mtshan ma med par gnas pa nyid du'ang
T04D3903:216b-22: mngon par dgongs pa kho nar bsgrub par bya ba
T04D3903:216b-23: la sogs pa lnga rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T04D3903:216b-24: sems bskyed pa'i gnas skabs su ni rnam pa bzhi
T04D3903:216b-25: nyid du ste dri ma med pa la sogs pa'i
T04D3903:216b-26: sa rnams kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa nyid
T04D3903:216b-27: du so sor rtogs pa'i don du'o //
T04D3903:216b-28: 'o na brgyad pa nas bzung nas skye ba gcig gis thogs pa nyid du sngar gsungs la /
T04D3903:216b-29: 'ga' zhig tu ni bcu par dang de'i steng du yang ngo zhes pa ci ltar zhe na /
T04D3903:216b-30: ji ltar spyod pa la 'jug pa ni sngon rol
T04D3903:216b-31: du nges pa med par yin la brgyad pa nas
T04D3903:216b-32: bzung nas nges pa nyid na yang bcu pa la
T04D3903:216b-33: nges pa mthar thug pas nges pa nyid du gsungs
T04D3903:216b-34: pa de ltar skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni
T04D3903:216b-35: brgyad pa dang dgu pa dag dang bcu pa dang
T04D3903:216b-36: steng du rim pa ji lta bar nges pa med
T04D3903:216b-37: pa dang / des pa dang nges pa mthar thug pa rnams kyis rnam par gzhag go //
T04D3903:216b-38: gzhan yang gdul bya'i ngor mnyam pa med pa'i snying
T04D3903:216b-39: rje'i rang bzhin gyi sku can rnams kyi chos rnam
T04D3903:216b-40: par gzhag pa mngon par dgongs pa rnam pa sna
T04D3903:216b-42: de la 'gal ba med pa kho na 'bad pas btsal bar bya'o //
T04D3903:216b-43: de la gal te yod na thams cad legs par gnas so zhes pa 'di gzhag ste /
T04D3903:217a-2: bar chad med pa'i lam gyis de ma thag pa
T04D3903:217a-3: rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi rang bzhin rnam pa
T04D3903:217a-4: bdun cu rtsa gnyis po nyon mongs pa dang shes
T04D3903:217a-5: bya'i sgrib pa ma lus pa spangs pa las shin
T04D3903:217a-6: du ba'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo sems bskyed
T04D3903:217a-7: pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dang /
T04D3903:217a-8: nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang dngos gzhi dang mjug gnyis
T04D3903:217a-9: dag ni kun du bzang po zhes bya ba ming
T04D3903:217a-10: gzhan du kun du 'od sangs rgyas kyis dngos kyi
T04D3903:217a-11: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid /
T04D3903:217a-12: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs chos kyi sku mngon par rtogs pa brgyad pa'o //
T04D3903:217a-13: de rtogs pa las bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa'i
T04D3903:217a-14: 'bras bu la gnas pa mi slob pa ste 'khor
T04D3903:217a-15: ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid
T04D3903:217a-16: kyi bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:217a-17: 'di tsam du bslab par bya ba ni /
T04D3903:217a-18: gang 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par
T04D3903:217a-19: byang ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag spangs pa'i ched
T04D3903:217a-20: du yin na de gnyis ka mnyam pa nyid du
T04D3903:217a-21: rtogs pa ni mi slob par 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:217a-22: chos kyi sku de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3903:217a-23: sku gsum rnams dang mdzad pa'o //
T04D3903:217a-24: sku ni lus te sangs rgyas rnams kyi lus gsum rnams ni sku gsum rnams so //
T04D3903:217a-25: bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag tu gsungs pa ni /
T04D3903:217a-26: rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i zag pa
T04D3903:217a-27: med pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin
T04D3903:217a-28: pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T04D3903:217a-29: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su rig par
T04D3903:217a-30: bya'o // gzhan yang chos thams cad po de rnams
T04D3903:217a-31: kho na rtogs pa las bla na med pa yang
T04D3903:217a-32: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
T04D3903:217a-33: par sangs rgyas nas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams
T04D3903:217a-34: dang dpe byad brgyad cu rnams kyis brgyan pa'i sku
T04D3903:217a-35: can de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
T04D3903:217a-36: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'
T04D3903:217a-37: rnams la theg pa chen po'i chos dam pa /
T04D3903:217a-38: bla na med pa'i rol pa dang dga' ba dang
T04D3903:217a-39: mchog tu dga' ba dang bde ba longs spyod pa'i
T04D3903:217a-40: ched du ston par byed do //
T04D3903:217a-41: gzhan yang chos thams cad po de rnams de kho
T04D3903:217a-42: na rtogs pa las bla na med pa yang dag
T04D3903:217a-43: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T04D3903:217a-44: rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
T04D3903:217b-0: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @217b ni phyogs bcu
T04D3903:217b-1: mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su /
T04D3903:217b-2: dus thams cad du sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i sprin
T04D3903:217b-3: gyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad do zhes
T04D3903:217b-4: so // mdo sde de dang de rnams su yang sku gsum rnams kho na rgyas par bstan to //
T04D3903:217b-5: mdo sde rgyan du yang gsungs pa /
T04D3903:217b-6: sku gsum rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi //
T04D3903:217b-7: sku bsdus par ni shes bya ste //
T04D3903:217b-8: sku gsum rnams kyis rang bzhin gyi //
T04D3903:217b-9: don 'di rten dang bcas par bstan //
T04D3903:217b-11: 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang /
T04D3903:217b-12: gang zhig gcig min du ma'ang ma yin rang dang
T04D3903:217b-13: gzhan la phan pa phun tshogs chen po'i gzhir gyur
T04D3903:217b-14: pa // zhes pa la sogs pa sku gsum kho na bstod do //
T04D3903:217b-15: 'phags pa rnam grol sde'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T04D3903:217b-16: chos kyi sku ni rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste /
T04D3903:217b-17: ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T04D3903:217b-18: sprul pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa rgya cher gsal bar mdzad do //
T04D3903:217b-19: de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi
T04D3903:217b-20: phyogs la sogs pa rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i gnyis
T04D3903:217b-21: su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ni chos
T04D3903:217b-22: kyi sku ste bzhi pa'o zhes gang du yang rnam
T04D3903:217b-24: rnam par gzhag pa de ni seng ge bzang po'i rang dbang las te spang bar bya'o //
T04D3903:217b-25: 'o na slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis sangs rgyas bcom
T04D3903:217b-26: ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rnam pa gsum ste chos
T04D3903:217b-27: dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'o //
T04D3903:217b-28: de la chos kyi sku rnam pa gnyis te 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas so //
T04D3903:217b-29: de la gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni de
T04D3903:217b-30: bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa las byung ba ste
T04D3903:217b-31: / de kho na don dam par bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T04D3903:217b-32: gang 'dus byas pa'i chos kyi sku de ni sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin te /
T04D3903:217b-33: gang yongs su dag pa'i 'og min gyi gnas su
T04D3903:217b-34: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o zhes chos kyi
T04D3903:217b-35: sku rnam pa gnyis nyid kyi sa na sku bzhi
T04D3903:217b-36: rnams su rnam par gzhag go zhe na /
T04D3903:217b-37: ma yin te rnam pa gsum ste zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:217b-38: chos nyid kyi sku'i nang du chos kyi sku 'dus
T04D3903:217b-39: byas pa bsdus pa kho na brjod par 'dod pas
T04D3903:217b-40: tshul kyogs [*kyog] pa yin gyi sku bzhi pa nyid
T04D3903:217b-42: ji ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba ltar ro //
T04D3903:218a-0: de'i phyir gsum kho na mdzad pa'i 'khor dang bcas pas chos kyi sku rnam @218a * //
T04D3903:218a-1: pa bzhir mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan du gsungs so //
T04D3903:218a-2: de la dang po ni ngo bo'i rang bzhin yin la /
T04D3903:218a-3: ngo bo kho na ngo bo nyid de bi na
T04D3903:218a-4: ya la sogs pa rnams las tha ka'o zhes pa
T04D3903:218a-5: rang gi don la tha ka'o //
T04D3903:218a-6: de ltar ni byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i
T04D3903:218a-7: chos rnams kyi ngo bo skye ba med pa ma
T04D3903:218a-8: bcos pa 'dus ma byas pa 'jig rten las 'das
T04D3903:218a-9: pa'i lam gyis thob par bya ba spros pa'i sgro
T04D3903:218a-10: 'dogs pa mtha' dag ldog pa rang bzhin med pa
T04D3903:218a-11: nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku ste /
T04D3903:218a-12: ngo bo'i rkyen phyis pas bstan pa'i phyir chos nyid kyi sku yin pas chos kyi sku yang ngo //
T04D3903:218a-13: 'dir rnam par rtog pa thams cad nges par 'da'o
T04D3903:218a-14: zhes mya ngan las 'das pa dang rang gi don
T04D3903:218a-16: gzugs sku gnyis kyi rten nyid kyis skal pa ji
T04D3903:218a-17: lta bar phan pa sna tshogs pa'i mdzad pa rgya
T04D3903:218a-18: che ba nyid kyi phyir khyab pa'o //
T04D3903:218a-19: de'i tshe gang rnams kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku
T04D3903:218a-20: yin pa glo bur ba'i dri ma dang bral ba
T04D3903:218a-22: gnas gyur pas yongs su gyur pa /
T04D3903:218a-23: 'jig rten las 'das pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo
T04D3903:218a-24: bo rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa spros
T04D3903:218a-25: pa dang bral bar rtogs pa'i bdag nyid byang chub
T04D3903:218a-26: kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de
T04D3903:218a-27: rnams sku cis bsdus she na /
T04D3903:218a-28: ngo bo nyid kho nas te /
T04D3903:218a-29: bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa ma lus pas
T04D3903:218a-30: dben pas rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi bdag nyid
T04D3903:218a-31: can gyi chos nyid tsam yin pa nyid kyi phyir
T04D3903:218a-32: la / de rnams kyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa
T04D3903:218a-33: ni de rnams kyi rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi rjes su
T04D3903:218a-36: gang phyir dben pa dben gyur las //
T04D3903:218a-37: tha mi dad pa nyid du 'dod //
T04D3903:218a-40: de nyid khyod ni stong par bzhed //
T04D3903:218a-41: ces pa'i rigs pas chos dang chos nyid la tha dad med pa'i phyir /
T04D3903:218a-42: chos de rnams kyang kun rdzob tu yod pa rnams so //
T04D3903:218a-43: de nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can gyi
T04D3903:218a-44: chos de rnams rtogs pas khong du chud pa yang
T04D3903:218a-45: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kho na'i so so
T04D3903:218a-46: rang gis rig par bya ba ni ngo bo nyid
T04D3903:218a-47: kyi sku'o // de bzhin du dbu ma la 'jug par /
T04D3903:218a-48: skye med de bzhin nyid do gang tshe blo yang
T04D3903:218a-49: skye ba dang bral ba de'i tshe de yis de
T04D3903:218a-50: bzhin nyid rtogs bzhin te de'i rnam par bsten pa'i
T04D3903:218b-0: phyir / @218b ji ltar sems ni gang gi rnam par 'byung ba de ni des na yul /
T04D3903:218b-1: yongs su shes ltar de'i tha snyad nye bar blangs
T04D3903:218b-2: nas rig par gyur pa'o zhes slob dpon zla ba
T04D3903:218b-4: rgyal po'i rin po che'i phreng ba'i rnam par bshad
T04D3903:218b-5: par yang chos nyid kho na'i sku ni chos kyi
T04D3903:218b-6: sku ste / de yang chos thams cad kyi lus
T04D3903:218b-7: nyid kyis te 'gro ba thams cad de bzhin nyid
T04D3903:218b-8: kyi rang bzhin las ma 'das pa'i phyir dang /
T04D3903:218b-9: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi rten nyid kyis na sku'o //
T04D3903:218b-10: rten gyi dngos po yang de'i 'jug pa thob pas blta bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T04D3903:218b-11: de ltar na rten chos nyid dang chos rnams ni
T04D3903:218b-12: kun rdzob tu de las byung ba rnams dang de'i
T04D3903:218b-13: bdag nyid kyis so zhes pas ni chos rnams kyi
T04D3903:218b-14: sku gang yin pa ni chos kyi sku'o zhes sku
T04D3903:218b-15: bzhi pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la
T04D3903:218b-16: nges par bstan pa med do //
T04D3903:218b-17: sngags kyi tshul las ni gdul bya'i khyad par gyi
T04D3903:218b-18: ngor chos nyid log pa bzhin du rnam par gzhag
T04D3903:218b-20: dngos por na der yang log par gyur pa med do //
T04D3903:218b-21: de nyid kyi phyir 'ga' zhig tu chos kyi sku'i sgras ngo bo nyid skus brjod par bya la /
T04D3903:218b-22: 'ga' zhig tu ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i sgras chos kyi sku'o //
T04D3903:218b-23: kha cig tu yang sku gnyis kyi rang bzhin chos
T04D3903:218b-24: dang chos nyid zung ni de'i bdag nyid kyis 'brel
T04D3903:218b-25: pa'i phyir dang / stong pa nyid dang snying rje
T04D3903:218b-26: dbyer med pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis 'brel
T04D3903:218b-27: pa zhes zung 'jug dang zung 'jug gi sku dang
T04D3903:218b-28: ngo bo nyid kyi skur yang ngo //
T04D3903:218b-29: gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg par gsungs
T04D3903:218b-30: pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni der longs spyod
T04D3903:218b-31: rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i skur yang brjod par
T04D3903:218b-32: bya ste / sngon goms pa'i tshogs kyi 'phen pas
T04D3903:218b-33: ngo bo nyid kyi skus sprul pa nyid kyi phyir
T04D3903:218b-34: bya ste / ro // 'ba' zhig pa'i longs spyod
T04D3903:218b-35: rdzogs pa'i sku ni der bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
T04D3903:218b-36: bya ste / ro // kho na'o // gang yang 'dir sprul pa'i sku de ni der yang ngo //
T04D3903:218b-37: gang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis chos kyi sku'i rang
T04D3903:218b-38: bzhin yang ldog pa'i khyad par tha dad pa las
T04D3903:218b-40: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T04D3903:218b-41: zhes pa la sogs pa sku lnga pa yang gsungs la /
T04D3903:218b-42: de ni de la mos pa rnams kyis bdag cag
T04D3903:218b-43: gis byas pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa man ngag snye
T04D3903:219a-1: med pa'i gzhung 'grel du gsal bar shes par bya ste /
T04D3903:219a-2: 'dir brtsam pa'i 'brel pa med pas chog go //
T04D3903:219a-3: de'i phyir skabs su ma bab cing mi 'thad pa
T04D3903:219a-4: phyogs gzhan nas gsungs pa'i sku bzhi rnam par gzhag
T04D3903:219a-5: pa ni seng ge bzang po'i'o zhes gnas so //
T04D3903:219a-6: gnyis pa ni gang ston pa rang nyid kyis bstan
T04D3903:219a-7: pa las mchog tu kha na ma tho ba med
T04D3903:219a-8: pa theg pa chen po'i chos la rdzogs par longs
T04D3903:219a-9: spyod pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong
T04D3903:219a-10: bar 'gyur zhing / nyan pa po sa bcu'i dbang
T04D3903:219a-11: phyug rnams la'ang zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos
T04D3903:219a-12: bar 'gyur zhing / ston pa'o // de de ltar longs spyod de /
T04D3903:219a-13: yang dag par longs spyod pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'am /
T04D3903:219a-14: yang na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'dus nas longs spyod pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'o //
T04D3903:219a-15: de'i ched du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T04D3903:219a-16: longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid kyi sku dang longs spyod
T04D3903:219a-17: rdzogs pa'i ched du ba'i sku ni longs spyod pa'i
T04D3903:219a-18: sku yang ste / mtshan dang dpe byad mchog tu 'bar ba rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa /
T04D3903:219a-19: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa mdzad pa yang ngo //
T04D3903:219a-20: yang na zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos bstan
T04D3903:219a-21: pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams longs spyod ste yongs
T04D3903:219a-22: su skyong bar byed pa'am longs spyod du 'jug pa
T04D3903:219a-23: dang / de rnams kyis 'di de dang de'i brjod
T04D3903:219a-24: par bya ba yang nyams su myong ba las yang
T04D3903:219a-25: dag par longs spyad par bya'o zhes pa longs spyod
T04D3903:219a-26: dang / rdzogs pa'i sku'o // gang slob dpon zla ba grags pas gsungs pa /
T04D3903:219a-27: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs sku ni //
T04D3903:219a-28: mtshan dang dpe byad rab 'bar zhing //
T04D3903:219a-29: skye bo rnams la sna tshogs gzugs //
T04D3903:219a-30: rang mos dbang gis 'dzin par byed //
T04D3903:219a-31: bsod nams tshogs ni dpag med las //
T04D3903:219a-32: 'byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i sras //
T04D3903:219a-33: sa bcu la ni gnas rnams kyi //
T04D3903:219a-34: de lta bu yi skur gzigs so //
T04D3903:219a-35: 'di de chos rdzogs longs spyod las //
T04D3903:219a-36: rgyal sras rnams kyis spyad bya'o //
T04D3903:219a-37: chos rnams rang bzhin kho na la //
T04D3903:219a-38: gnas pa'i blo la sangs rgyas brjod //
T04D3903:219a-39: 'og min gzhal yas khang du ni //
T04D3903:219a-40: de nyid mngon sum bya bar bzhed //
T04D3903:219a-41: rnam par rtog med sangs rgyas kyi //
T04D3903:219a-42: gzugs kyi sku rnams yang dag 'byung //
T04D3903:219a-43: sprul pa'i sku rnams byang chub pa //
T04D3903:219a-44: sa yi steng du ston par byed //
T04D3903:219b-1: / slob dpon tsandra go mis kyang gsungs pa /
T04D3903:219b-2: de bzhin nyid ni chos sku'o 'di //
T04D3903:219b-3: rnam rtog rnams kyi spyod yul min //
T04D3903:219b-4: sems can kun dang don kun gyi //
T04D3903:219b-5: rang bzhin de ni gnyis med pa'o //
T04D3903:219b-6: sna tshogs gzugs can sku rnams dang //
T04D3903:219b-7: 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid ngo bor //

T04D3903:219b-9: rgya mtsho ru ni chu bo bzhin //

T04D3903:219b-14: 'jig rten rnams su lhun grub par //
T04D3903:219b-15: rtag tu de yis nus pa rnams //
T04D3903:219b-16: nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams bzhin du //
T04D3903:219b-17: mtha' yas pa yi don rnams mdzad //
T04D3903:219b-18: dmus long lta bu bdag gzhag pa //
T04D3903:219b-19: rang gi bsod nams kyis bskyed pa'i //
T04D3903:219b-20: mig can kun gyi gcig pu ste //
T04D3903:219b-21: cig car nyi ma bzhin du mthong //
T04D3903:219b-22: de'i chos bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis len //
T04D3903:219b-23: 'on pa lta bu bdag gzhag pa'i //

T04D3903:219b-35: srid bar dus ji lta ba dang bsam pa ji

T04D3903:219b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la sogs pa'i

T04D3903:220a-0: gsung dag sprul pa de ltar sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi @220a * //
T04D3903:220a-2: de'i nye bar len pa med pa'i phyir dang /

T04D3903:220a-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni
T04D3903:220a-6: sprul pa ste rab tu sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las
T04D3903:220a-7: can no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T04D3903:220a-9: 'on kyang nye bar len pa yod na ste /
T04D3903:220a-10: lha'i byin rlabs kyis rmi lam mthong ba bzhin dang /
T04D3903:220a-11: brjod pas ngag gi don rig pa bzhin no //
T04D3903:220a-12: 'o na gang sprul pa de rnams ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sku yin /
T04D3903:220a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i phyir ro zhe na
T04D3903:220a-14: ni de'i tshe sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa glang
T04D3903:220a-15: po che la sogs pa rnams sgyu ma mkhan gyi

T04D3903:220a-21: bya ba byed pa'i phyir de rnams kyang de'i sku
T04D3903:220a-22: rnams so zhes pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
T04D3903:220a-23: sprul pa'i sku'o // sku gsum po de rnams kyang rtag pa rnams te /
T04D3903:220a-24: de la ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni rang bzhin rtag pa nyid kyis rtag pa ste /
T04D3903:220a-25: thos ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:220a-26: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni ma nyams pa'i rtag

T04D3903:220a-28: kyang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:220a-29: de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i chos kyi phung po yang ngo //
T04D3903:220a-30: sprul pa'i sku ni rgyun rtag pa nyid kyis rtag
T04D3903:220a-31: pa ste mi snang bar gyur nas yang dang yang
T04D3903:220a-32: du yul tha dad par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:220a-33: de bzhin du mdzad pa yang rtag pa nyid do //
T04D3903:220a-34: de ltar chos kyi sku ni bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi don dam pa pa'i lus so //
T04D3903:220a-35: de skad du yang gsungs pa /

T04D3903:220a-37: yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgos
T04D3903:220a-38: so zhes so // 'dir yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni rnam par dag par byung ba'o //

T04D3903:220a-40: chos nyid ces pa yang spyir gsungs te /

T04D3903:220a-43: don du'o // gang de la rag las pa sangs

T04D3903:220b-0: sogs pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul @220b
T04D3903:220b-1: pa'i sku zhes gsum po de ni kun rdzob pa'i

T04D3903:220b-3: pa ste don dam par rang bzhin med pa'i chos
T04D3903:220b-4: kyi dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo grangs ji lta

T04D3903:220b-10: longs spyod rdzogs pa ci ltar yin te /
T04D3903:220b-11: gang gi phyir de ni dpag tu med cing shin

T04D3903:220b-13: 'khrungs pa 'og min gyi sa la zhugs pa ste

T04D3903:220b-16: phyir te de de la rag las pa kho nar

T04D3903:220b-30: gtso bor nus pa la de'i ngor bsod nams kyi

T04D3903:220b-42: 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku //
T04D3903:220b-43: chos nyid sangs rgyas blta bar bya //
T04D3903:220b-44: chos nyid rnam par shes bya'ang min //

T04D3903:221a-1: kyi sku mthong ba tsam mam dbyangs rjes su thos

T04D3903:221a-3: mthong ngo shes so zhes sems pa de rnams log

T04D3903:221a-10: de ni de mthong ba dang rjes su mthun pa

T04D3903:221a-12: kyis bdag mthong bar gyur kyang gang gi tshe mthong

T04D3903:221a-42: gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams ni sprul pa la

T04D3903:221b-0: dang @221b ro gcig pa g-yo ba med pa rnams

T04D3903:221b-3: gcig nyid dang gzhan nyid dang bral ba bdag gnyis
T04D3903:221b-4: ka med par rab tu mi gnas pa'o //

T04D3903:225b-8: cing yongs su bsams pa'i don rnams ring po mi
T04D3903:225b-9: thogs pa nyid du phun sum tshogs par byed do
T04D3903:225b-10: zhes / byang chub sems bskyed pa len pa dang
T04D3903:225b-11: sbyin pa la sogs pa dge ba'i tshogs nye bar
T04D3903:225b-12: sogs par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' ni dang

T04D3903:225b-14: zhes / // de'i yon tan yang rnam pa gnyis te /

T04D3903:225b-16: de la thob par bya ba'i yon tan ni mthong
T04D3903:225b-17: ba'i chos la thob pa dang brgyud pas thob pa'o
T04D3903:225b-18: // de la gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu

T04D3903:225b-20: sna tshogs las brgyan par byas nas lha dang mi'i

T04D3903:225b-22: pa rnams skad cig so sor ster bas sangs rgyas

T04D3903:225b-26: gzhan gang zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag
T04D3903:225b-27: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bzhin pa

T04D3903:225b-29: mos pas sems skyed par byed pa de 'dis ni
T04D3903:225b-30: sngar gyi sbyin pa po de las bsod nams khyad
T04D3903:225b-31: par du 'phags pa thob po zhes bsod nams kyi
T04D3903:225b-32: mchog nyid thob pa ni mthong ba'i chos la thob
T04D3903:225b-35: bsod nams dag ni skye ba gcig po de la brten pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:225b-36: de ltar mos pa 'phel bas bsags bzhin pa'i bsod
T04D3903:225b-37: nams kyi chu bos sdig pa'i dri ma bkrus shing
T04D3903:225b-38: / sdig pa las byung ba'i ngan 'gro gsum rnams dang /
T04D3903:225b-39: gzhan don la 'bab pa nyid kyi phyir /
T04D3903:225b-40: bde 'gro dang zag pa med pa dman pa'i chos
T04D3903:225b-41: kyi ba sngags pa smra ba'i sdig pa'i grogs po
T04D3903:225b-42: rnams ring du byed la mu stegs pa dang bdud
T04D3903:225b-43: la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang zil gyis mnan par
T04D3903:225b-44: bya ba ma yin pa dang /
T04D3903:225b-45: 'jig rten gsum gyis bkur bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang /
T04D3903:226a-0: byang chub sems dpa' dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid thob la tshogs yongs su rdzogs @226a * //
T04D3903:226a-2: sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtogs par byed do zhes pa
T04D3903:226a-3: mdor bsdus pa las brgyud pas thob pa'i yon tan

T04D3903:226a-5: 'dun pa la sogs pa'i sems bskyed pa nyid shu
T04D3903:226a-6: rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das ma
T04D3903:226a-7: chen mo dag tu gsungs la /
T04D3903:226a-8: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo dag gis ni /
T04D3903:226a-9: de rnams la rim pa ji lta bar mi zad pa brgyad cu rnams gsungs so //
T04D3903:226a-11: sems dang po bskyed pa dang /
T04D3903:226a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams dang /
T04D3903:226a-16: tshad med pa bzhi rnams dang /
T04D3903:226a-17: mngon par shes pa lnga rnams dang /
T04D3903:226a-18: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams dang /
T04D3903:226a-19: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang /
T04D3903:226a-21: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag dang /
T04D3903:226a-22: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang /
T04D3903:226a-27: chos kyi sdom bzhi rnams dang /
T04D3903:226a-28: bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam nyid dang /
T04D3903:226a-29: thabs la mkhas pa nyid kyis mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:226a-30: 'dir sbyor ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dag rim
T04D3903:226a-31: pa bzlog nas bstan pa ni gnyis ka la 'byung
T04D3903:226a-33: de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa thogs med kyis smon pa brgyud pas ni sbyor bar gsungs so //
T04D3903:226a-34: sems bskyed pa bco lnga par yang /
T04D3903:226a-35: bcom ldan 'das ma bar ma 'phags pas nye bar
T04D3903:226a-36: bzhag pas mngon par shes pa rnams rtogs par byas
T04D3903:226a-37: pa ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:226a-38: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste /
T04D3903:226a-39: mdo la lar chos kha cig gnas skabs 'ga' zhig
T04D3903:226a-40: la bstan pa 'gal ba med do zhes pa skyon
T04D3903:226a-42: sems bskyed pa de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'
T04D3903:226a-43: rab tu dang ba skyed par byed pa'i dper brjod
T04D3903:226a-44: pa rnams kyis rgyas par bya'o //
T04D3903:226a-45: de la sems bskyed pa dang po ni ched du
T04D3903:226a-46: bya ba dang bcas pa'i byang chub la 'dun pa'i
T04D3903:226a-47: mtshan nyid can mi zad pas na sa dang mtshungs
T04D3903:226a-48: pa ste / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang
T04D3903:226a-49: de'i tshogs rab tu skye ba'i gzhir gyur pa nyid
T04D3903:226a-50: pa ste / kyi phyir ro // dkon mchog brtsegs
T04D3903:226b-0: pa'i mdor don gyis gsungs @226b pa yang byang chub
T04D3903:226b-1: sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste
T04D3903:226b-2: pa ste / kyi phyir ro // / thog ma
T04D3903:226b-3: dang bar dang tha ma rnams su sems can rnams
T04D3903:226b-4: kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par sgrub pa'i rten
T04D3903:226b-5: du gyur pa nyid kyis na /
T04D3903:226b-6: phan pa dang gnod pa byed pa thams cad la mthar thug pa med pa'i sems dang /
T04D3903:226b-7: sa dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur gyi ji ltar yang btang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sa la brten nas /
T04D3903:226b-8: skyes bu'i byed pa des sems can rnams der nye
T04D3903:226b-9: bar 'tsho bar byed pa de lta bu byang chub
T04D3903:226b-10: sems dpa' ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa'o
T04D3903:226b-11: // 'di nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' ni
T04D3903:226b-12: skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad rnams
T04D3903:226b-13: la nyin dang mtshan du mngon du phyogs par byed
T04D3903:226b-14: // do // de rnams kyang sems can thams cad
T04D3903:226b-15: kyi sdug bsngal thams cad sel nus par nam zhig
T04D3903:226b-17: dbul zhing skyo ba'i sems can rnams 'byor pa chen
T04D3903:226b-18: po la nges par sbyor bar nam zhig 'gyur snyam
T04D3903:226b-19: pa dang / rang gi lus sha khrag dang bcas
T04D3903:226b-20: pas sems can gyi don gang gi tshe byed par
T04D3903:226b-22: dus shin tu ring bar dmyal bar gnas pas kyang
T04D3903:226b-23: sems can rnams la phan pa kho na nam zhig
T04D3903:226b-25: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'byor pas 'jig rten thams
T04D3903:226b-26: cad kyi yid la re ba yang dag par rdzogs
T04D3903:226b-27: par nam mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /
T04D3903:226b-28: sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems can thams cad 'khor
T04D3903:226b-29: ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las nam gyi tshe 'don
T04D3903:226b-31: sems can la phan pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i skye ba dang /
T04D3903:226b-32: sems can gyi don la rab tu sbyar ba dang
T04D3903:226b-33: bral ba'i sems dang gzhan gyi don la ro gcig
T04D3903:226b-34: pa ma yin pa'i bya ba dang /
T04D3903:226b-35: skye bo thams cad dga' bar mi byed pa'i ngag dang /
T04D3903:226b-36: gzhan gyi don dang bral ba'i gson pa dang /
T04D3903:226b-37: gzhan la phan pa dang stobs chung ba'i lus dang /
T04D3903:226b-38: gzhan la phan par byed pa la mi dga' ba'i blo dang /
T04D3903:226b-39: sems can la phan pa'i bya ba mi byed pa'i rdzas nor dang /
T04D3903:226b-40: 'gro ba'i don du spyod pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dang /
T04D3903:226b-41: gzhan 'tshog pas dga' ba rnams skye ba dang /
T04D3903:226b-42: skye bar ma gyur cig ces pa dang srog chags
T04D3903:226b-43: thams cad kyi sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bdag
T04D3903:227a-0: la gyur cig / bdag gi legs par spyad @227a
T04D3903:227a-1: * // pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu sems cad
T04D3903:227a-2: thams cad la gyur cig ces pa skyes bu chen
T04D3903:227a-3: po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad rnams so //
T04D3903:227a-4: 'di'i rjes su bsngags pa ji skad du dkon mchog brtsegs par /
T04D3903:227a-6: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i
T04D3903:227a-7: mngal du gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang
T04D3903:227a-8: ldan pa chags nas zhag bdun lon par gyur na
T04D3903:227a-9: / 'byung ba chen po mer mer por gyur pa
T04D3903:227a-10: dbang po yongs su ma smin pa de la der
T04D3903:227a-11: lha rnams shin tu stobs dang ldan par dga' ba
T04D3903:227a-12: bskyed kyi gzhon nu mgyogs pa dang stobs dang shugs
T04D3903:227a-13: dang mthu thob pa cher skyes pa de rnams la
T04D3903:227a-14: ni ma yin pa kho na'o //
T04D3903:227a-16: da ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs mi 'chad pa'i ched du gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:227a-17: de bzhin du sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang po yongs su ma smin pa /
T04D3903:227a-18: nyon mongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po nur nur por gyur pa /

T04D3903:227a-21: rnams shin tu stobs dang ldan par dga' ba bskyed

T04D3903:227a-23: la bsam gtan pa de rnams la ni ma yin
T04D3903:227a-24: kyi / pa kho na'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T04D3903:227a-25: de ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad pa'i ched du gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
T04D3903:227a-27: bya ka la ping ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i spubs na gnas pa mig ma bye ba yang /
T04D3903:227a-29: zab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pas bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
T04D3903:227a-30: 'od srungs de bzhin du sems dang po bskyed pa'i
T04D3903:227a-31: byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs
T04D3903:227a-32: na gnas pa las las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun
T04D3903:227a-33: pa dang rab rib kyi dra bas mig khebs pa
T04D3903:227a-35: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyor ba dang /
T04D3903:227a-37: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
T04D3903:227a-39: ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la sman gang yod pa de rnams nga yir bya ba med /
T04D3903:227a-41: rnam par rtog pa med de /
T04D3903:227a-42: nad gang la btang ba de zhi bar byed do //
T04D3903:227a-43: 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang
T04D3903:227b-0: ye @227b shes kyi sman yang dag par sgrub pa
T04D3903:227b-1: de thams cad rnam par rtog pa med par yang
T04D3903:227b-2: dag par sgrub cing sems can thams cad la sems
T04D3903:227b-3: mnyam pas de rnams gso ba la yang rab tu
T04D3903:227b-6: ji ltar zla ba gsar ba la phyag 'tshal ba
T04D3903:227b-7: de ltar zla ba gang ba la ma yin no
T04D3903:227b-8: // 'od srungs de bzhin du nga la shin tu
T04D3903:227b-9: stobs dang ldan par dad pa de rnams kyis byang
T04D3903:227b-10: chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya'i de bzhin gshegs
T04D3903:227b-13: byang chub sems dpa' byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin la /
T04D3903:227b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad do zhes so //
T04D3903:227b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i sar yang /
T04D3903:227b-16: 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po
T04D3903:227b-17: bskyed pa brtan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phan yon dag
T04D3903:227b-18: ste / sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can thams
T04D3903:227b-19: cad kyi yon gnas su gyur par 'gyur ba dang
T04D3903:227b-20: ste / / bla mar gyur pa dang bsod nams
T04D3903:227b-21: kyi zhing dang skye dgu rnams kyi pha rol 'dra
T04D3903:227b-22: ba dang gnod pa med pa'i bsod nams yongs su
T04D3903:227b-24: de la ni gnod pa med pa'i bsod nams te /
T04D3903:227b-25: gang gis bsrungs ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyid log
T04D3903:227b-26: gam myos par gyur pa la yang sbrul lam gnod
T04D3903:227b-27: sbyin nam mi ma yin pa gnyug mar gnas pa
T04D3903:227b-28: rnams kyis tho 'tshams par mi byed do //
T04D3903:227b-29: tshe brjes na'ang bsod nams des gnod pa nyung ba dang /
T04D3903:227b-30: nad med pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba nas /
T04D3903:227b-31: dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /
T04D3903:227b-32: sems nyams pa med pa'i bar du'o //
T04D3903:227b-33: de las gzhan pa'i lag tu song ba rnams ma grub pa /
T04D3903:227b-34: sems can rnams kyi yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang /
T04D3903:227b-35: zad 'go ba nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams dang /
T04D3903:227b-36: rig sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang de'i lag tu son pa rnams 'grub na /
T04D3903:227b-37: grub pa rnams slar smra ci dgos /
T04D3903:227b-38: zhing gang na gnas pa der 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang /
T04D3903:227b-40: mi ma yin pas byas pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba rnams kyang /
T04D3903:227b-41: ma byung ba rnams mi 'byung la byung ba rnams kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:227b-42: gal te sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
T04D3903:227b-43: dpa' de brgya la sems can dmyal ba rnams su
T04D3903:228a-0: ngan 'gro'i sar skyes kyang de tshad chen pos @228a
T04D3903:228a-1: * // shin tu myur bar grol la /
T04D3903:228a-2: dmyal ba pa rnams las shin tu chung ba'i sdug bsngal myong zhing /
T04D3903:228a-3: ches shin tu skyo ba'ang skye'o //
T04D3903:228a-4: sems can de rnams la yang snying rje'i sems nyid do //
T04D3903:228a-5: de ltar gnod pa med pa'i bsod nams yongs su
T04D3903:228a-6: 'dzin pa pos de lta bu'i cha dang mthun pa'i
T04D3903:228a-7: phan yon mang po rnams thob po zhes gsungs so
T04D3903:228a-8: // bsam pa dang ldan pa ni gser bzang po
T04D3903:228a-9: lta bu ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis
T04D3903:228a-10: bsdus pa'i phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam pa ni
T04D3903:228a-11: phyi ma dang de'i dus dag tu rnam par 'gyur
T04D3903:228a-12: ba mi bstan pa'i phyir te /
T04D3903:228a-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi bsam pa ni bsam pa'o //
T04D3903:228a-14: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T04D3903:228a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i bsam pa dang /
T04D3903:228a-16: zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i bsam pa dang /
T04D3903:228a-17: sems can bde ba'i bsam pa'o //
T04D3903:228a-18: de la dang po yang ba dang lci ba dang rnam pa gnyis te /
T04D3903:228a-19: phyogs bcu rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T04D3903:228a-20: du gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdul bya nye
T04D3903:228a-21: ba med pa nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das pa
T04D3903:228a-22: bstan pa / gzhan rnams kyis mi mthong ba'o zhes
T04D3903:228a-23: 'das pa rnams dang gang yang gdul bya nye ba
T04D3903:228a-24: rnams kyis mthong bzhin ba nyid kyis na bzhugs pa
T04D3903:228a-25: rnams dang gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
T04D3903:228a-26: pa don rdzogs par byas pa /
T04D3903:228a-27: myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa zhes pa ma byon pa rnams te /
T04D3903:228a-28: de rnams bdag gis bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod par bya'o zhes pa ni yang ba ste /
T04D3903:228a-29: de rnams kyi ched du sku gzugs rnams dang mchod
T04D3903:228a-30: rten rnams dang nam mkha' la yang mchod pa byed
T04D3903:228a-31: pa'i phyir ro // byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa
T04D3903:228a-32: la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa
T04D3903:228a-33: ni sgrub pa'i mchod pa ste /
T04D3903:228a-34: de yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i bsam pa ni lci ba'o //
T04D3903:228a-35: gnyis pa ni bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtho
T04D3903:228a-36: dma' dang sdong du ma dang tsher ma dang gseg
T04D3903:228a-37: ma dang gyo mo dang bong pa dang gcan gzan
T04D3903:228a-38: dang sbrul dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang chu
T04D3903:228a-39: dang nad kyi dgon pa dang bral ba nyid kyi
T04D3903:228a-40: phyir rnam par dag cing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa
T04D3903:228a-41: nyid bal ltar 'jam pa yangs pa dang /
T04D3903:228b-0: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa la sogs @228b pa dang ldan pa /
T04D3903:228b-1: ngan 'gro'i sa dang bral ba shal dang aindra n'i la dang /
T04D3903:228b-2: beed'urya la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur cig ces pa'o //
T04D3903:228b-3: gsum pa ni zhing der gang khams dang 'gro ba
T04D3903:228b-4: dang skye gnas dang rigs kyis bsdus pa'i sems can
T04D3903:228b-5: ji snyed pa thams cad ngan 'gro ba rnams kyang
T04D3903:228b-6: lha dang mi'i bde ba rab tu gyur pa ngan
T04D3903:228b-7: 'gro can ma yin pa'i bde bas rtag tu bde

T04D3903:228b-9: bral ba dang / de rnams yo byad gang dang
T04D3903:228b-10: gang gis bde ba 'di dang 'di 'dra ba mngon
T04D3903:228b-11: par 'dod pa'i yo byad de dang de rnams la
T04D3903:228b-12: bdag gi dge ba'i las yongs su smin pa las
T04D3903:228b-14: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rjes su mthun
T04D3903:228b-15: par yang gyur cig / de ltar de rnams sangs
T04D3903:228b-16: rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis yongs su smin pa dang

T04D3903:228b-20: ldan pa ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi zla ba gsar

T04D3903:231b-28: bcom ldan 'das ma dag tu rgya cher shes par
T04D3903:231b-29: bya'o // phyi mo'i yi ge rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
T04D3903:231b-30: rnam grangs gzhan ni gang bzod pa skye ba'i ched
T04D3903:231b-31: du gsungs pa'i sngags kyi tshig / tad ya th'a
T04D3903:231b-32: / ai ti mi ti ki ti ni kshana ti pa d'a ni sb'a h'a /
T04D3903:231b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa de rnams don dam par
T04D3903:231b-34: rang bzhin med par sgom par byed cing de'i rjes
T04D3903:231b-35: su 'brang bas chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid
T04D3903:231b-36: du yang dag par rjes su lta ba las don
T04D3903:231b-37: dam pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i phyir de kho
T04D3903:231b-38: na nyid kyi ye shes kyi skye ba dang rjes
T04D3903:231b-39: su mthun pa'i bzod pa skye'o zhes pa'o //
T04D3903:231b-40: de la mos pas spyod pa'i sar bzod pa'i gzungs 'thob la /
T04D3903:231b-41: gzhan gsum rnams ni sa rab tu dga' ba nas bzung nas so //
T04D3903:231b-42: 'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la
T04D3903:231b-43: dbang ba nyid kyis sngags kyi ye ge rnams byin
T04D3903:231b-44: gyis rlob ste / sngags kyi yi ge 'di rnams
T04D3903:231b-45: cho ga 'di lta bu sems can thams cad kyi
T04D3903:232a-1: nye bar 'tshe ba dang nad 'go ba dang /
T04D3903:232a-2: 'khrug pa thams cad zhi ba'i ched du dang /
T04D3903:232a-3: sdig pa thams cad dang ngan 'gro thams cad zad
T04D3903:232a-4: pa'i ched du grub par gyur cig ces de ltar
T04D3903:232a-5: byin gyis brlabs pa de rnams cho ga'i khyad par
T04D3903:232a-7: de byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes ni sngags kyi gzungs so //
T04D3903:232a-8: gzungs de'i dmigs pa'i dngos po nyid kyis na yi ge de rnams kyang gzungs kyi sgras brjod do //
T04D3903:232a-9: gzhan yang ma na shes pa la'o //
T04D3903:232a-10: tree nya skyong ba la'o zhes pa ye shes dang
T04D3903:232a-11: snying rje ni sngags kyi sgras brjod par bya la
T04D3903:232a-12: / de dag gis rgyu mthun pa nyid kyi phyir yi ge de rnams kyang sngags su brjod do ;
T04D3903:232a-13: / ma rig pa spong bar byed pa nyid kyi
T04D3903:232a-14: phyir dang rig pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir de
T04D3903:232a-16: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi brten pa'i gnas nyid kyi phyir tshig rnams te /
T04D3903:232a-17: des na gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gnas rnams dang
T04D3903:232a-18: rig sngags kyi tshig rnams so zhes pa yang ming
T04D3903:232a-19: ngo // de la sa dang po la khyad par
T04D3903:232a-20: can gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes pa'i gzungs 'thob
T04D3903:232a-21: ngo // ste / de'i dbang las mchog tu gyur
T04D3903:232a-22: pa'i chos rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro
T04D3903:232a-23: ngo // ste / // gnyis pa la sogs pa'i
T04D3903:232a-24: sa dgu rnams la rim pa ji lta bar gong
T04D3903:232a-25: nas gong du rab mchog tu gyur pas /
T04D3903:232a-27: legs par rab tu gnas pa dang /
T04D3903:232a-30: ye shes dkyil 'khor gyi sgron ma dang /
T04D3903:232a-32: rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
T04D3903:232a-34: mi zad pa'i za ma tog go //
T04D3903:232a-35: de bzhin du yang so so la gzungs re re
T04D3903:232a-36: sngon du 'gro ba'i gzungs stong phrag grangs med cing
T04D3903:232a-37: dpag tu med pa du ma rnams so sor 'thob
T04D3903:232a-38: po // gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T04D3903:232a-39: na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa la sogs
T04D3903:232a-40: pas yongs su gzung bas na /
T04D3903:232a-41: bar chad bya ba'i ched du rab tu 'bad pa'i
T04D3903:232a-42: bdud kyi nus pa 'joms pa la sogs pa'i yon
T04D3903:232a-43: tan rnams rgyas pa dang bcas pas mdo rnams su
T04D3903:232a-44: brtson 'grus can rnams kyis shes par bya'o //
T04D3903:232a-45: de ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' bshes gnyen dam pas legs par yongs su bzung nas /
T04D3903:232a-46: dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par bsags pa /
T04D3903:232a-48: snying rje chen po la brten pa 'di /
T04D3903:232b-0: 'gro ba thams @232b cad yongs su bskyab pa'i ched
T04D3903:232b-1: dang rnam pa thams cad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T04D3903:232b-2: ye shes thob pa'i ched du dang /
T04D3903:232b-3: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba'i ched du /
T04D3903:232b-4: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing nam mkha'i khams kyi
T04D3903:232b-5: mthar thug pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems
T04D3903:232b-6: lnga pa skyed par byed do //
T04D3903:232b-7: sems bskyed pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
T04D3903:232b-8: phyin pa dang ldan pa gter chen po lta bu
T04D3903:232b-9: ste / zang zing gi longs spyod rnams kyis sems
T04D3903:232b-10: can dpag tu med pa tshim par byed pa'i phyir
T04D3903:232b-11: dang mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:232b-12: gang skyes pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' byis
T04D3903:232b-13: pa so so'i skye bo dang nyan thos dang rang
T04D3903:232b-14: sangs rgyas kyis thams cad las 'das par 'gyur ro
T04D3903:232b-15: // byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs par 'gyur /
T04D3903:232b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur /
T04D3903:232b-17: srid pa bar ma las khu ba la bzhin du
T04D3903:232b-18: mthong ba'i lam la nges pa ji srid par 'gyur
T04D3903:232b-19: ro // rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dpung gnyen can
T04D3903:232b-20: no zhes pa 'di'i mthong ba'i lam sa dang po'o
T04D3903:232b-21: ro // // gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
T04D3903:232b-22: rnams kyi snying rje la sogs pas yongs su gzung
T04D3903:232b-23: ba'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes kho na char
T04D3903:232b-24: rnam par phye ba ni sa'i ming 'thob ste /
T04D3903:232b-25: yon tan gyi rten du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:232b-26: de yang gong nas gong du yon tan gyi grangs
T04D3903:232b-27: dang mthu phul du byung ba thob cing sbyin pa
T04D3903:232b-28: la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhag pa
T04D3903:232b-29: dang / rnam par smin pa rab mchog tu gyur pa'i bye brag las /
T04D3903:232b-40: kun du 'od ces pa rnam pa bcu gcig tu rnam par gzhag gi /
T04D3903:232b-41: 'di'i rang gi ngo bo phul du byung bas byas
T04D3903:232b-42: pa'i tha dad pa brjod par bya ba'am mnyan par
T04D3903:232b-44: ji skad du 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /
T04D3903:232b-45: de ni bsam dang sems kyi lam rnams spangs //
T04D3903:232b-46: ye shes mngon sgrub thub pa'i dbang pos mkhyen //
T04D3903:232b-47: phung po skye mched khams kyis phye ma yin //
T04D3903:232b-48: sems kyis rtogs min yid kyis bsam ma yin //
T04D3903:232b-49: ji ltar bar snang bya rjes mkhas rnams kyis //
T04D3903:232b-50: smra bar mi nus mthong bar nyer 'gro min //
T04D3903:232b-51: de ltar rgyal ba'i sras kyis sa kun kyang //
T04D3903:232b-52: brjod mi nus na mnyan par ga la nus //
T04D3903:233a-1: ba'i bya'i rkang rjes ni brjod par mi nus shing blta bar yang ma yin te /
T04D3903:233a-2: nam mkha'i phyogs ni de'i rkang rjes bzhin du yongs
T04D3903:233a-3: su bcad bya'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi
T04D3903:233a-4: phyir ro // de la de rnam par 'god par mi byed pa yang ma yin no //
T04D3903:233a-5: de bzhin du bya'i rkang rjes lta bu'i ming dang
T04D3903:233a-6: tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams kyi gnas su gyur
T04D3903:233a-7: pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang
T04D3903:233a-8: / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rtogs pa'i ye shes
T04D3903:233a-9: kyis bsdus pa rnams kyang sgra ji bzhin pa'i rang
T04D3903:233a-10: bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir brjod par mi
T04D3903:233a-11: nus la mnyan par yang ma yin mod //
T04D3903:233a-12: de rnams de la rnam par 'god pa dbye ba
T04D3903:233a-13: kun rdzob tu mi bya ba yang ma yin no
T04D3903:233a-14: // de la mngal gyi gnas skabs dang 'dra bar
T04D3903:233a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa bcu'i gnas skabs
T04D3903:233a-17: sa 'di rnams sgrib pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:233a-18: btsas pa'i gnas skabs dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs te /
T04D3903:233a-19: 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa nye bar bzung nas
T04D3903:233a-20: shes bya thams cad kyi spyod yul so sor nyams
T04D3903:233a-22: bcas pa ni lus kyi dbang po thams cad kyi
T04D3903:233a-23: spyod yul so sor nyams su myong ba bzhin no
T04D3903:233a-24: // de la mngal gyi gnas skabs bcu ni //
T04D3903:233a-25: bu ba'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04D3903:233a-26: nur nur po'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04D3903:233a-27: ltar ltar po'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04D3903:233a-29: lus dang rjes su mthun pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04D3903:233a-30: rang bzhin dang rjes su mthun pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04D3903:233a-31: las dang bcas pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04D3903:233a-32: yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs kyang rnam pa gsum ste /
T04D3903:233a-33: dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T04D3903:233a-34: mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T04D3903:233a-35: chu zheng yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T04D3903:233a-36: de rnams dang rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i
T04D3903:233a-37: sa rnams chos mthun par nye bar mtshon par bya'o
T04D3903:233a-38: // gang gi phyir 'dir dang por rang gzhan gyi
T04D3903:233a-39: don sgrub par byed pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T04D3903:233a-40: lam thob pa las byang chub sems dpa' rab tu
T04D3903:233a-41: dga' ba de'i phyir 'di rab tu dga' ba ste
T04D3903:233a-42: // dang po'o // gzhan yang rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bya ba ni sems tshim pa dang /
T04D3903:233a-44: rangs pa yid la byed pa'o //
T04D3903:233a-45: de yang rnam pa dgu ste /
T04D3903:233b-0: dang bas @233b rab tu dga' ba nyid ni dkon mchog rnams la'o //
T04D3903:233b-1: dga' bas rab tu dga' ba ni dmigs pa la dga' zhing tshim pa nyid kyis so //
T04D3903:233b-2: gong du son pas mchog tu dga' ba ni bdag
T04D3903:233b-3: nyid rtogs pa'i khyad par mthong bar byed pa nyid
T04D3903:233b-4: kyis so // mgu bas mchog tu dga' ba ni
T04D3903:233b-5: rang gi lus dang sems rjes su 'dzin pa rgyas
T04D3903:233b-7: rlabs kyis mchog tu dga' ba ni rang gi lus
T04D3903:233b-8: dang sems rjes su 'dzin pas khyab pa nyid kyis
T04D3903:233b-9: so // spro bas mchog tu dga' ba ni byang chub nye bar mthong ba las so //
T04D3903:233b-10: mi 'khrugs pas mchog tu dga' ba ni rang gi
T04D3903:233b-11: rgyud yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched du 'brel
T04D3903:233b-12: pa'i gtam gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus su 'khrug pa
T04D3903:233b-14: rnam par 'tshe ba med pas mchog tu dga' ba
T04D3903:233b-15: ni gzhan yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched du
T04D3903:233b-16: sems can sdud pa'i dus su snying rje dang des
T04D3903:233b-18: khro ba med pas mchog tu dga' ba ni de
T04D3903:233b-19: las log par zhugs pa'i dus su bzod pas so
T04D3903:233b-20: // rab tu dga' ba'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/
T04D3903:233b-21: 'phags pas bcu par gsungs pa'i smon lam chen po bcu rnams dang /
T04D3903:233b-22: 'bad pa chen po rnams mngon par sgrub bo //
T04D3903:233b-24: sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro
T04D3903:233b-25: bya ba'i ched du rnam pa thams cad mchog tu
T04D3903:233b-26: ldan pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag
T04D3903:233b-27: pa / chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba /
T04D3903:233b-28: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa /
T04D3903:233b-29: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa bgrangs pa dang /
T04D3903:233b-30: sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs ba thams cad du rgyun
T04D3903:233b-31: mi 'chad par mchod pa chen po dang rim gro'i
T04D3903:233b-32: ched du / smon lam chen po dang po mngon par sgrub pa'o //
T04D3903:233b-33: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
T04D3903:233b-34: gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i
T04D3903:233b-35: ched dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i ched dang /
T04D3903:233b-36: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T04D3903:233b-37: bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i ched du gnyis pa'o
T04D3903:233b-38: // de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad du /
T04D3903:233b-39: dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thog mar mdzad nas /
T04D3903:233b-44: nang gi grong du bzhugs pa dang /
T04D3903:234a-1: snying por yang dag par gshegs pa dang /
T04D3903:234a-3: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T04D3903:234a-5: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba dang /
T04D3903:234a-6: mya ngan las 'das pa chen por 'pho ba'i ched du gsum pa'o //
T04D3903:234a-7: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams
T04D3903:234a-8: cad de pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par
T04D3903:234a-9: bsdus pa / sa yongs su spyod pa yan lag
T04D3903:234a-10: dang nye ba'i yan lag dang bcas pa'i lam gyi
T04D3903:234a-11: gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa rab tu sbyin
T04D3903:234a-12: pas bstan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i
T04D3903:234a-14: de bzhin du khams dang 'gro ba dang /
T04D3903:234a-15: skye gnas dang ris su gtogs pa'i ming dang gzugs
T04D3903:234a-16: kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams
T04D3903:234a-17: ma lus pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched
T04D3903:234a-18: dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzung pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234a-19: 'gro ba bgrangs pa thams cad rnam par gcad pa
T04D3903:234a-20: dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i
T04D3903:234a-22: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rgya che ba dang /
T04D3903:234a-28: steng g-yogs med cing gzhi phyal ba dang /
T04D3903:234a-30: rnam par dbye ba mig 'phrul lta bu dang /
T04D3903:234a-31: phyogs bcu tshad med pa ma lus pa 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba ste /
T04D3903:234a-32: ye shes kyis khong du chud cing mngon sum du gyur par bya ba'i ched du drug pa'o //
T04D3903:234a-33: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad zhing gcig dang /
T04D3903:234a-34: zhing gcig zhing thams cad du mnyam par rgyu so sor sbyong ba dang /
T04D3903:234a-35: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams 'od dang bkod pa'i rgyan gyis so sor brgyan pa dang /
T04D3903:234a-36: nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal bas yongs su dag pa'i lam dang ldan pa dang /
T04D3903:234a-37: sems can ye shes tshad med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi yongs su gang ba dang /
T04D3903:234a-38: sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
T04D3903:234a-39: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta bar
T04D3903:234a-40: yang dag par bstan cing tshim par bya ba'i ched
T04D3903:234a-41: du bdun pa'o // de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang
T04D3903:234a-42: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa dang
T04D3903:234a-43: du bdun pa'o // / sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ched dang /
T04D3903:234a-44: 'gran zla med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234a-45: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas dang byang
T04D3903:234b-0: chub sems dpa' thams @234b cad dang 'grogs shing mi
T04D3903:234b-2: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji ltar 'dod par bstan pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-3: rang gi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ye shes kyis khong du chud pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-4: ma nyams shing rjes su 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa 'thob pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-6: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du so sor snang ba 'thob pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-7: skye ba thams cad du rang gi lus rjes su 'gro bar bya ba'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-8: theg pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnam par mi spyad pa'i ched du brgyad pa'o //
T04D3903:234b-10: de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la
T04D3903:234b-11: yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
T04D3903:234b-13: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las don yod pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-14: mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos nges pa nyid kyi ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-15: sgra brjod ma thag tu mthu dang ye shes khong du chud pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-16: mthong ma thag tu sems can rab tu dang ba
T04D3903:234b-17: thob cing nyon mongs pa ldog par bya ba'i ched
T04D3903:234b-18: dang / sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu'i lus thob pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-19: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam pa'i lus thob pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-20: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyod pa spyad pa'i ched du dgu pa'o //
T04D3903:234b-21: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
T04D3903:234b-22: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T04D3903:234b-23: chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ched dang
T04D3903:234b-24: / byis pa'i lam gcig las ma 'das par byis
T04D3903:234b-25: pa'i lam thams cad du skye bar 'byung ba dang
T04D3903:234b-27: nang gi grong du bzhugs pa dang ;
T04D3903:234b-30: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /
T04D3903:234b-32: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T04D3903:234b-34: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba dang /
T04D3903:234b-35: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po nye bar bstan pa'i ched dang /
T04D3903:234b-36: sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po mthu dang ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i ched du /
T04D3903:234b-37: chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba nam mkha'i khams
T04D3903:234b-38: kyi mthas gtugs pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa
T04D3903:234b-39: / bskal pa bgrangs pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs

T04D3903:241a-6: de lta na yang bsgom pa'i lam gyis spang bar
T04D3903:241a-7: bya ba'i dri ma rnams kyis na cher gsal ba
T04D3903:241a-8: med pa nyid kyi phyir dang ;
T04D3903:241a-9: shin du ring bar khyab pa mchog tu gyur pa
T04D3903:241a-10: med pa nyid kyi phyir de'i tshe kho na sangs
T04D3903:241a-11: rgyas nyid du thal ba med do //
T04D3903:241a-12: de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi gter
T04D3903:241a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de ni phal cher 'dzam bu'i
T04D3903:241a-14: gling gi dbang phyug tu 'gyur zhing /
T04D3903:241a-15: dbang phyug chen po dbang rab tu thob la /
T04D3903:241a-16: chos rjes su bsrung zhing gtong ba chen po rtsom pa rnams kyis tshim pa med pa'o //
T04D3903:241a-17: las gang cung zad rtsom pa de sbyin pa'am snyan par smra ba'am /
T04D3903:241a-18: don spyod pa'am don mthun pa nyid kyis te skye ba thams cad du'o //
T04D3903:241a-19: de la sbyin pa ni phyi dang nang gi zang zing sbyin pa ste /
T04D3903:241a-20: des gdul bya rnams chos sgrub par rung bar bskyed pa'i snod du 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:241a-21: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ni snyan par smra ba'o //
T04D3903:241a-22: don spyod pa ni chos la yang dag par 'god pa'o //
T04D3903:241a-23: don mthun pa ni gang la pha rol yang dag
T04D3903:241a-24: par bkod pa de la rang yang rjes su 'jug
T04D3903:241a-25: pa'o zhes pa bzhi sems can bsdu ba'i thabs rnams
T04D3903:241a-26: so // bsdu ba de yang mos pa spyod pa'i sar phal cher don med pa'o //
T04D3903:241a-27: sa bdun rnams la phal cher don yod pa'o //
T04D3903:241a-28: brgyad pa la sogs pa'i sa rnams la rnam pa
T04D3903:241a-29: thams cad du don yod pa ste sems can gyi
T04D3903:241a-30: don lhun gyis grub par gdon mi za bar phun
T04D3903:241a-32: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba ni rnam
T04D3903:241a-33: pa bzhi ste las kyi dbang gis ni mos pa
T04D3903:241a-34: spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ste /
T04D3903:241a-35: las kyi dbang gis mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su skye ba'o //
T04D3903:241a-36: smon lam gyi dbang gis ni sa la bzhugs pa
T04D3903:241a-37: rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don
T04D3903:241a-38: du skye ba la dbang pa nyid kyis dud 'gro
T04D3903:241a-39: la sogs pa dman pa'i gnas su skye ba gang
T04D3903:241a-40: yin pa'o // ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis ni
T04D3903:241a-41: bsam gtan rnams bzlog nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye
T04D3903:241a-43: dbang 'byor pa'i dbang gis ni sprul pa rnams kyis
T04D3903:241a-44: dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs par skye ba kun
T04D3903:241b-0: du ston pa gang yin pa'o @241b zhes pa'o ;
T04D3903:241b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje ni //
T04D3903:241b-3: srid par gnas pa'i rgyu yin te //
T04D3903:241b-4: de ni gnas pa byed kyang blo //
T04D3903:241b-5: zhen pa rjes su sems ma yin //
T04D3903:241b-7: der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la chags pa med par spyod cing /
T04D3903:241b-8: 'dod pa la yongs su longs spyod pa rnam pa
T04D3903:241b-9: mang por ston par byed kyang de la chags pa
T04D3903:241b-10: med do // 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i
T04D3903:241b-11: yo byad thams cad sogs par byed cing de la
T04D3903:241b-12: yang zhen pa med par 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:241b-13: bdag dang bdag gi bar 'dzin pa sngon ma can
T04D3903:241b-14: nyid kyis na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs
T04D3903:241b-15: pa thams cad ni rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal
T04D3903:241b-16: gyi rgyu kho nar 'gyur la chos thams cad sgyu
T04D3903:241b-17: ma ltar bsgom pas ni sems can gdul ba rgyur
T04D3903:241b-18: byas nas nyon mongs pa la dbang ba nyid thob
T04D3903:241b-19: pas bsam pa'i khyad par las sgyu ma'i skyes bu
T04D3903:241b-20: bzhin du 'dod pa yongs su longs spyod pa /
T04D3903:241b-21: rgyal ba'i sras po rnams la skyon byed pa ma yin pas so //
T04D3903:241b-23: mdo sde rgyan la sogs pa rnams su gsungs pa /
T04D3903:241b-24: byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams //

T04D3903:241b-26: 'gyur zhing skye ba thams cad du //
T04D3903:241b-27: sems can don ni rab tu byed //
T04D3903:241b-28: thabs chen ldan pa rnams la ni //
T04D3903:241b-29: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
T04D3903:241b-30: 'khor ba'ang zhi ba'i bdag nyid du'o //
T04D3903:241b-31: de phyir rgyal sras bsam mi khyab //
T04D3903:241b-33: yang na 'di 'dod na khyim dang chung ma dang longs spyod thams cad dang /
T04D3903:241b-34: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyang spangs nas de
T04D3903:241b-35: bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo
T04D3903:241b-36: // ji ltar yang 'di 'di la 'di ltar rab
T04D3903:241b-37: tu 'byung ba de bzhin du sa gong ma rnams
T04D3903:241b-38: // la yang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'byung ba yang thog ma kho nar /

T04D3903:241b-40: pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyon de snyed pas yongs
T04D3903:241b-42: yongs su gzung ba de'i don du zhing las dang
T04D3903:241b-43: nyo tshong dang rgyal po'i skyes bu byed pa la
T04D3903:241b-44: sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas sa yongs su dkrugs pa'i
T04D3903:241b-46: mtha' gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa lu gu rgyud du spyod par nus so //
T04D3903:241b-47: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur te /
T04D3903:242a-0: dge ba gang dang gang kho na rtsom pa de dang @242a * //
T04D3903:242a-1: de mthar phyin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //

T04D3903:242a-3: thams cad du tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ro
T04D3903:242a-4: // byang chub sems dpa'i khyim pa ni de lta
T04D3903:242a-5: ma yin no zhes pa de lta bu dang mthun
T04D3903:242a-6: pa'i chos rnams kyis khyim pa dang rab tu byung
T04D3903:242a-7: ba dag gi khyad par ro zhes byang chub sems

T04D3903:242a-10: sngar gyi sems bskyed pa'i yon tan can dang mngon
T04D3903:242a-11: par shes pa la sogs pa rnams ni 'di la
T04D3903:242a-12: cher 'bar ba dang ring du khyab pa'o //

T04D3903:242a-15: 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /

T04D3903:242a-22: pa rnams kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
T04D3903:242a-23: phrag stong rnams ji snyed pa de snyed du yang
T04D3903:242a-24: bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no zhes so //
T04D3903:242a-25: de bzhin du sa so so la chos kyi sprin gyi bar la gsungs so //
T04D3903:242a-26: de la spyan ni rnam pa lnga'o //
T04D3903:242a-27: dbyangs ni sprul pa'i gsung ngo //
T04D3903:242a-29: byin gyis brlabs pa ni gang gis pha rol byin gyis rlob pa'o //
T04D3903:242a-30: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la brten nas
T04D3903:242a-31: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthu'i bya ba'i
T04D3903:242a-32: don sgrub pa'o // shes rab kyi spyan gyis bsdus
T04D3903:242a-33: pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la brten nas chos ston pa
T04D3903:242a-34: mngon par 'du byed pa rnams so //

T04D3903:242a-36: de la sems bskyed pa drug pa tshul khrims kyi
T04D3903:242a-37: pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni ro
T04D3903:242a-38: han [?] la sogs pa'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas
T04D3903:242a-39: lta bu ste / yon tan rin po che thams cad de las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //

T04D3903:242a-42: ma dang bral ba de'i phyir dri ma med pa'o
T04D3903:242a-43: // dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'di'i lhag cing shin du dag par 'gyur te /

T04D3903:242b-0: @242b 'gyur ro // sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang

T04D3903:242b-3: bdun dang ldan pa stobs bcu ru 'gyur ro //

T04D3903:242b-6: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams kyang 'di la snang bar 'gyur te /

T04D3903:242b-15: 'jig rten gyi khams stong g-yo bar byed do //
T04D3903:242b-17: zhing stong du yang byed do //
T04D3903:242b-19: sems can stong yongs su smin par byed do //
T04D3903:242b-20: bskal pa stong du gnas shing /
T04D3903:242b-21: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug go //
T04D3903:242b-22: chos kyi sgo stong rnam par 'byed pa'o //
T04D3903:242b-23: lus stong ston par byed do //
T04D3903:242b-24: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong ston par byed do //
T04D3903:242b-25: snang ba la sogs pa rnams kyi grangs ma nges
T04D3903:242b-26: pa dang nges pa 'di dag kyang sems bskyed pa
T04D3903:242b-27: gong ma gong ma rnams la yang rig par bya'o
T04D3903:242b-28: // de bzhin du spyan dang mngon par shes pa

T04D3903:242b-30: rnams 'di dang phyi mar yang thams cad du rjes
T04D3903:242b-31: su 'jug cing rab tu gyur pa shin du dang
T04D3903:242b-32: ches la sogs pa tha dad pa yang ngo //
T04D3903:242b-33: sems bskyed pa bdun pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu
T04D3903:242b-34: phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rgya mtsho chen po
T04D3903:242b-35: lta bu ste / mi 'dod pa thog tu bab pa thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:242b-36: sa 'od byed pa yang ste gang gi phyir 'di
T04D3903:242b-37: la ting nge 'dzin ma nyams pa la brten pa
T04D3903:242b-38: chos kyi snang ba chen po byed pas so //
T04D3903:242b-39: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' shin tu so sor rtogs
T04D3903:242b-40: pa'i shes pa can te phyir yang tshad med pa

T04D3903:242b-43: chos smra ba la dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:243a-1: gi dngos po gang de la mi sbyin pa de cung zad kyang med pa dang /
T04D3903:243a-2: bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba gang nyams su
T04D3903:243a-3: mi len pa de cung zad kyang med pa dang
T04D3903:243a-4: / lus kyi gnod pa gang mi len pa de cung zad kyang med do //

T04D3903:243a-7: skye ba dang 'jig rten pa'i rnam par dag pa

T04D3903:243a-36: dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rig nas bsam

T04D3903:243a-43: par nga rgyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi dbang du

T04D3903:247b-8: lta bar de rnams la chos ston to //

T04D3903:247b-18: dang rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba rnams
