T04D3903:262a-39: yongs su shes par bya ba nyid dang yongs su shes pa nyid ces pa rnam pa gsum dang /
T04D3903:262a-40: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i de'i rang bzhin dang spong
T04D3903:262a-41: bar bya ba nyid dang spangs pa nyid ces pa
T04D3903:262a-42: gsum dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa'i de'i rang bzhin
T04D3903:262a-43: dang mngon du bya ba nyid dang mngon du byas
T04D3903:262a-44: pa nyid ces pa gsum dang /
T04D3903:262b-0: lam gyi bden pa'i @262b de'i rang bzhin dang bsgom
T04D3903:262b-1: par bya ba dang bsgom pa nyid ces pa gsum
T04D3903:262b-2: ste / de'i phyir de ni rnam pa bcu gnyis so //
T04D3903:262b-3: yang na 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'o //
T04D3903:262b-5: yongs su shes so zhes pa lan gsum du bskor ba'o //
T04D3903:262b-6: so so la sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang rnam par
T04D3903:262b-7: mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang yang dag pa'i don
T04D3903:262b-8: can nyid kyi phyir rig pa dang mi slob pa'i
T04D3903:262b-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi blo
T04D3903:262b-10: 'byung ba'i phyir zhes pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rnams
T04D3903:262b-11: so // de ltar bden pa so so la ste
T04D3903:262b-12: gsum dang bcu gnyis su chos mthun pa nyid kyi
T04D3903:262b-13: so // phyir / lam gsum dang rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
T04D3903:262b-14: chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bstan pa las so //
T04D3903:262b-15: 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod pa stong phrag
T04D3903:262b-16: brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi spyod pa re re'i
T04D3903:262b-17: gnyen po gzhung ji snyed kyis yongs su rdzogs pa
T04D3903:262b-18: de snyed kyi gzhung gi phung po ni chos kyi
T04D3903:262b-19: phung po'o zhes pa chos kyi phung po stong phrag
T04D3903:262b-20: rnams so // ci'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gshegs she na /
T04D3903:262b-21: le lo can rnams myur ba'i don du'o //
T04D3903:262b-22: bcom ldan 'das sh'a kya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos yun ji srid du gnas par 'gyur zhe na /
T04D3903:262b-23: lnga brgya pa tha ma ji srid par ro //
T04D3903:262b-24: brgya phrag lnga rnams 'dus pa ni lnga brgya pa'o //
T04D3903:262b-25: tha ma ni lnga brgya pa lnga pa ste /
T04D3903:262b-26: lnga brgya pa lngar dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur
T04D3903:262b-27: ro zhes pa'i gsung las te dam pa'i chos sgrub
T04D3903:262b-28: pa nyams pa'o zhes kha cig go //
T04D3903:262b-29: gzhan rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos
T04D3903:262b-30: gnas pa'i dus ni lo stong phrag lnga rnams te
T04D3903:262b-31: / de rnams brgya phrag lnga lnga rnams kyis phyed
T04D3903:262b-32: mar byas pa ni lnga brgya pa bcu rnams su
T04D3903:262b-34: sngon la re zhig rtogs pa'i dus dang sgrub pa'i dus dang lung gi dus zhes pa gsum mo //
T04D3903:262b-35: slar yang so sor rnam pa gsum ste /
T04D3903:262b-36: dgra bcom pa dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /
T04D3903:262b-37: lhag mthong dang ting nge 'dzin dang tshul khrims dang chos mngon pa dang /
T04D3903:262b-38: mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i sde snod kyi dus te /
T04D3903:262b-39: dgu po rnam grangs ji lta bar lnga brgya pa dgu rnams la'o //
T04D3903:262b-40: bcu pa'i dus ni rtags tsam ste /
T04D3903:263a-3: ye shes lnga po rnams kyang sngar ni mdor bsdus pas rnam par gzhag la /
T04D3903:263a-5: de la dang po ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu
T04D3903:263a-6: rnam par dag pa dang bdag nyid gcig pa'i ye
T04D3903:263a-7: shes so // de yang chos kyi rnam grangs mtha'
T04D3903:263a-8: dag thos pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa las
T04D3903:263a-9: shes so // / sa ma lus pa sgom pa'i
T04D3903:263a-10: rgyu can rtag tu sems can thams cad la phan
T04D3903:263a-11: pa dang bde ba bskyed pa'i ched du nye bar
T04D3903:263a-12: gnas pa ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang
T04D3903:263a-13: tshad med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rjes
T04D3903:263a-15: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad las grol ba ni /
T04D3903:263a-16: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
T04D3903:263a-17: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T04D3903:263a-18: phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T04D3903:263a-19: 'phags pa'i chos thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu dang /
T04D3903:263a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
T04D3903:263a-21: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin la /
T04D3903:263a-22: chos kyi dbyings kyang de bzhin nyid yin zhing /
T04D3903:263a-23: de yang chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin na /
T04D3903:263a-24: chos kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams te so so rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir /
T04D3903:263a-25: de'i rjes su son pa'i chos kyi dbyings ci ltar tha dad pa ma yin te /
T04D3903:263a-26: tha dad pa de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:263a-27: tha dad par gyur na yang ji ltar spyi'i mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
T04D3903:263a-28: dper na nam mkha' dngos po med pa bum pa
T04D3903:263a-29: dang snam bu la sogs pa tha dad pa thams
T04D3903:263a-30: cad kyi rjes su son kyang tha dad pa ma
T04D3903:263a-31: yin par rtogs par bya ste /
T04D3903:263a-32: bum pa'i nam mkha' dang snam bu'i nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa ni tha snyad tsam mo //
T04D3903:263a-33: de bzhin du chos nyid de'i bdag nyid kyis gzugs
T04D3903:263a-34: la sogs pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi rjes
T04D3903:263a-35: su son yang tha dad pa ma yin te /
T04D3903:263a-36: spros pa ma lus pa las ldog pa ni chos
T04D3903:263a-37: thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro
T04D3903:263a-38: // gzugs kyi stong pa nyid nas ji srid du
T04D3903:263a-39: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ces pa la
T04D3903:263a-40: sogs pa ni khyad par gzhan spangs pas tha snyad
T04D3903:263a-41: // tsam mo // khyad par gzhan mi spong ba
T04D3903:263a-42: ni rab 'byor gzugs stong pa'o nas rnam par shes
T04D3903:263a-43: pa stong pa'o zhes pa'i bar kyang ngo //
T04D3903:263b-1: de ni stong pa nyid du brjod //
T04D3903:263b-2: de ni brten nas brtags pa'o //
T04D3903:263b-3: dbu ma yi ni lam nyid do //
T04D3903:263b-5: gang phyir dben pa dben gyur las //
T04D3903:263b-6: tha mi dad pa nyid du 'dod //
T04D3903:263b-7: ces pa'i rigs pa las so //
T04D3903:263b-8: don dam par ni chos kyi dbyings 'dir rang gi
T04D3903:263b-9: ngo bo spong ba'am ngo bo gzhan nye bar len
T04D3903:263b-12: ldog pa rang bzhin med nyid phyir //
T04D3903:263b-13: tha dad tha dad med rtag min //
T04D3903:263b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T04D3903:263b-16: nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes brjod de /
T04D3903:263b-17: nam mkha' ni brjod du med pa'o //
T04D3903:263b-18: de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces
T04D3903:263b-19: brjod de stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa'o
T04D3903:263b-20: zhes so // chos bstan pa don med par thal ba yang ma yin te /

T04D3903:263b-22: brgyud par phrin gyi yi ge mthong bas don rtogs
T04D3903:263b-23: pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T04D3903:263b-24: thugs rje chen po'i rgyu mthun pa gang brjod du
T04D3903:263b-25: med pa'i don brjod pas gsal bar byed pa de
T04D3903:263b-26: 'di nam mkha' la tshon gyi ri mo 'god pa
T04D3903:263b-27: bzhin du shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //
T04D3903:263b-29: blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste skyes bu 'ga'
T04D3903:263b-30: zhig kho na nam mkha' gzugs med pa bstan du

T04D3903:263b-32: ma yin pa 'di tshon sna tshogs pas bkra bar
T04D3903:263b-33: byed do // ji srid du blo gros rgya mtsho
T04D3903:263b-34: de bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams shin
T04D3903:263b-35: tu dka' ba mdzad pa ste /

T04D3903:263b-37: byang chub nas brjod pas sems can pha rol rnams

T04D3903:263b-42: can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su

T04D3903:263b-49: / // 'on kyang glo bur ba'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par gzhag par mi bya'o //

T04D3903:264a-11: kyi phyir ro // de gsungs pa /

T04D3903:264a-20: nye bar bcom pa rnams la rang bzhin gyis yongs

T04D3903:264a-46: / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi
T04D3903:264a-47: dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin yin na de
T04D3903:264a-48: ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul can

T04D3903:264b-4: skabs ster bar byed cing rnam par rtog par yang
T04D3903:264b-6: dper na zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgron ma
T04D3903:264b-7: la sogs pa rnams kyi 'od zer rnams de la
T04D3903:264b-8: 'bad rtsol med par skyes nas gzugs la sogs pa
T04D3903:264b-9: rnams rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang /
T04D3903:264b-10: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnams kyang 'bad rtsol dang
T04D3903:264b-11: bral bar sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba
T04D3903:264b-12: bzhin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du
T04D3903:264b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag

T04D3903:264b-22: sgrub pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams thams cad la nam mkha'
T04D3903:264b-23: bzhin du go skabs 'byin par byed do //
T04D3903:264b-24: mi zad pa nyid kyis rgya che ba nyid kyi
T04D3903:264b-25: phyir dang thogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog
T04D3903:264b-26: pa med pa las kyang sngon gyi mngon par 'du
T04D3903:264b-27: byed pa'i dbang las de'i bdag nyid rkyen gyis skye
T04D3903:264b-28: ba'i phyir ro // 'di kho na yang de bzhin
T04D3903:264b-29: gshegs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bsam gyis mi khyab
T04D3903:264b-31: gang mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis yongs su

T04D3903:264b-33: byin gyis rlob pa dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi

T04D3903:264b-35: par rtog pa med pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa
T04D3903:264b-36: nyid dang / sprul pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
T04D3903:264b-37: gal te yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'di ni bya ba'o //
T04D3903:264b-38: 'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med mod /
T04D3903:264b-39: de lta na yang sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang las rab tu nges par bzung nas /

T04D3903:264b-42: ji skad du 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos nges par bstan par gsungs pa /
T04D3903:265a-2: 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
T04D3903:265a-3: gand'i'i sgra de'i rna bar nye bar ltung ba yang
T04D3903:265a-4: ma yin la rnam par rtog par byed pa yang
T04D3903:265a-5: ma yin te / 'on kyang ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04D3903:265a-6: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa de yang ye
T04D3903:265a-7: shes dang sprul pa thams cad kyis sems can gyi
T04D3903:265a-8: bya ba sgrub pa la dbyer med par 'jug gi

T04D3903:265a-12: pa zhes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig
T04D3903:265a-13: bla dags so zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T04D3903:265a-14: lha'i bu chos thams cad skye ba med pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste /
T04D3903:265a-15: de lta na thob pa med do //
T04D3903:265a-16: mngon par rtogs pa med do zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04D3903:265a-17: gzugs la sogs pa don dam par de bzhin nyid
T04D3903:265a-18: kyi ngo bo can rnams la yang skye ba la

T04D3903:265a-29: med pa dang skye ba la sogs par thal lo
T04D3903:265a-30: zhe na / de lta ma yin te /
T04D3903:265a-31: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni don dam par
T04D3903:265a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa ste chos kyi dbyings kyang sems

T04D3903:278a-15: so zhes so // de ltar na yang dbang po'i

T04D3903:278a-19: de rnams kyi zad pa gang yin pa dang /
T04D3903:278a-20: lam gang gis zad pa de gnyis ka yang zag pa zang pa ste /

T04D3903:278a-27: zag pa zad pa la mi 'jigs pa nyid dang /

T04D3903:278a-32: de gnyis ni rang don no //

T04D3903:278a-35: 'di gnyis ni gzhan gyi don te pha rol po rnams la de 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:278a-36: de rnams la mi 'jigs pa nyid de //
T04D3903:278a-37: de dam bca' ba so sor 'god pa rnams la'o //

T04D3903:278a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis ni chos so //
T04D3903:278b-0: de'i brjod par bya ba mtha' dag ni don @278b no ;
T04D3903:278b-1: / de rnams kho na'i ming gi phyogs gcig la

T04D3903:278b-5: 'bras bu'i chos thams cad ni don no //
T04D3903:278b-6: 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi

T04D3903:278b-8: ; / de rnams so so yang dag par rig
T04D3903:278b-9: pa ni rim pa ji lta bar chos so so

T04D3903:278b-12: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T04D3903:278b-13: chos la sogs pa rnams pha rol po rnams la

T04D3903:278b-17: par rig pa yang ngo zhes pa spobs pa so

T04D3903:278b-21: de rnams kyang ji skad du 'khrul pa dang /
T04D3903:278b-22: ca co dang dran pa nyams pa med pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:278b-23: thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /

T04D3903:279a-0: de nas gsum ni dus gsum rnams la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes rnams @279a * //

T04D3903:279a-3: ji ltar dgra bcom pa grong la sogs par bsod
T04D3903:279a-4: snyoms kyi ched du rgyu ba rnams glang po che
T04D3903:279a-5: dang rta gtum po dang ba lang dang khyi dang
T04D3903:279a-6: tsher ma dang sbrul la sogs pa rnams kyis gnod

T04D3903:279a-9: 'di 'dra ba'i 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la thams cad kyis thams cad du mi mnga'o //
T04D3903:279a-10: 'phags pa gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po'i mdor yang gsungs pa /
T04D3903:279a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku'i phrin las 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba ;
T04D3903:279a-12: rab tu dang ba bskyed pa'i spyod lam can /
T04D3903:279a-13: spyod lam bzhis grong dang grong khyer du 'jug pa

T04D3903:279a-16: dri yid du 'ong ba can gyi padma rnams 'byung ngo //
T04D3903:279a-17: gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs dag bzhag pa
T04D3903:279a-18: der gang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i
T04D3903:279a-19: sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi 'od
T04D3903:279a-20: kyis reg pa de rnams zhag bdun du mchog tu
T04D3903:279a-21: bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T04D3903:279a-22: shi 'phos nas kyang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:279a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la na bza' sor bzhi'i

T04D3903:279a-25: rlung gis kyang g-yo bar byed ma nus so //
T04D3903:279a-26: sku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sems can rnams bde bar byed do //
T04D3903:279a-27: des na de bzhin gshegs pa la sku 'khrul pa med par brjod par bya'o zhes te /
T04D3903:279a-28: rtag pa kho nar yang dag par gzigs nas mdzad pa'i ngang can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:279a-29: ca co mi mnga'o zhes pa ste /
T04D3903:279a-30: ji ltar dgra bcom pa rnams 'brog dgon par lam nor bas sgra mthon po 'don par 'gyur ba'am /
T04D3903:279a-31: bag chags kyi dbang las gad mo cher god pa
T04D3903:279a-32: de lta bu sangs rgyas la mi mnga' ste rtag
T04D3903:279a-33: tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //

T04D3903:279a-38: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:279b-0: thugs mnyam par ma @279b bzhag pa mi mnga'o zhes
T04D3903:279b-1: pa ste ji ltar dgra bcom pa snyoms par zhugs

T04D3903:279b-3: mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:279b-4: tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du gzhag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:279b-5: tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes mi mnga'o zhes pa ste /

T04D3903:279b-21: de'i phyir de la 'dun pa la sogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T04D3903:279b-22: de'i phyir nge rnams de rnams las ma thob pa'i
T04D3903:279b-23: yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa rnams so

T04D3903:279b-26: de la 'dun pa la sogs pa rnams gzungs kyi
T04D3903:279b-27: dbang phyug rgyal po'i mdor so sor rtog par mdzad
T04D3903:279b-28: pa ni byams pa dang snying rje dang chos ston
T04D3903:279b-29: pa dang sems can gdul ba dang yongs su smin

T04D3903:280a-3: // dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ste /

T04D3903:280a-9: gang dang ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyam pa nas /

T04D3903:280a-11: pa nyid kyi phyir nyams pa med cing yongs su

T04D3903:280a-26: shes dang / ye shes dang / / mkhyen pa

T04D3903:280b-27: chos ston pa ji snyed pa rnams dang /

T04D3903:281a-23: rjes su brjod pa yang ci ltar na stong pa nyid gzigs pa la yin te /
T04D3903:281a-24: de so sor snang ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T04D3903:281a-25: ma yin te 'jig rten pa'i blo kho nas rjes su brjod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:281a-26: 'jig rten pa'i blo ni de lta bu ste /
T04D3903:281a-27: thog ma med pa'i ma rig pa goms pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:281a-28: 'o na gal te bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten
T04D3903:281a-29: pa'i blo yin na ji ltar de kho na nyid
T04D3903:281a-31: ma yin te sngon gyi 'phen pas ston pa srid pa'i phyir te 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin no //
T04D3903:281a-32: de'i phyir rnam pa du mar ston pa ni 'jig rten gzhug pa'i ched du 'gal ba med de /

T04D3903:281a-36: bstan pa la gzhug pa'i don du mi skrag pa'i
T04D3903:281a-37: ched du gzugs la sogs pa yod pa nyid du
T04D3903:281a-39: mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa ni don gzhan

T04D3903:281b-3: sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs pa der gyur to zhes
T04D3903:281b-4: pa'o // mnyam pa nyid la 'dir ldem por dgongs
T04D3903:281b-5: pa ste chos kyi sku khyad par med pa nyid
T04D3903:281b-6: pa'o // kyi phyir ro // chos la brnyas pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni /
T04D3903:281b-7: gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs
T04D3903:281b-8: rgyas 'di snyed la bsnyen bkur byas nas theg pa
T04D3903:281b-9: chen po khong du chud par gyur to zhes pa'o
T04D3903:281b-10: // le lo'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni /
T04D3903:281b-11: gang rnams bde ba can du smon lam byed par
T04D3903:281b-12: 'gyur ba de rnams der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes
T04D3903:281b-13: pa dang sangs rgyas dri med zla 'od kyi mtshan
T04D3903:281b-14: gzung ba 'di tsam gyis bla na med pa yang
T04D3903:281b-15: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur
T04D3903:281b-17: dus gzhan du zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T04D3903:281b-18: cung zad tsam gyis chog pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa
T04D3903:281b-19: ni 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge
T04D3903:281b-20: ba gang yin pa de nyid bsngags par mdzad la
T04D3903:281b-22: cung zad tsam gyis chog pa'i gang zag gi bsam pa la dgongs pas so //
T04D3903:281b-23: 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs
T04D3903:281b-24: pa ni gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas
T04D3903:281b-25: kyi zhing gi 'byor pa bsngags par mdzad pa'o //
T04D3903:281b-26: nga rgyal la spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni /
T04D3903:281b-27: gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas 'ga' zhig
T04D3903:281b-28: gi phun sum tshogs pa lhag par bsngags par mdzad
T04D3903:281b-29: pa'o // 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni /
T04D3903:281b-30: gang rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T04D3903:281b-31: la gnod pa byed pa de rnams thams cad mtho
T04D3903:281b-32: ris su nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o
T04D3903:281b-33: // re zhig tsam ma nges pa'i byang chub sems
T04D3903:281b-34: dpa' rnams theg pa chen po las 'byed pa'i sgrib
T04D3903:281b-35: pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni nyan thos chen po
T04D3903:281b-36: rnams sangs rgyas nyid du ston pa dang /
T04D3903:281b-37: theg pa gcig tu ston pa yang ngo //
T04D3903:281b-38: bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa ni rjod byed zab pa nyid la blta bar bya ste /
T04D3903:281b-40: snying po med la snying por shes //
T04D3903:281b-41: phyin ci log la shin tu gnas //
T04D3903:281b-42: nyon mongs kyis kyang rab nyon mongs //
T04D3903:281b-43: byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur //
T04D3903:282a-2: 'di ni 'dir ldem por dgongs pa ste /
T04D3903:282a-3: snying po med pa rnam par g-yeng ba med pa la gang rnams kyi snying po'i blo can dang /
T04D3903:282a-4: rtag pa dang bde ba dang gtsang ba dang bdag
T04D3903:282a-5: tu 'dzin pa las bzlog pas mi rtag pa la
T04D3903:282a-6: sogs pa'i phyin ci log la shin tu gnas pa
T04D3903:282a-7: yongs su ma nyams pa dang /
T04D3903:282a-8: nyon mongs pa ste dka' ba spyod pa'i rtsol ba'i
T04D3903:282a-9: ngal bas shin tu yongs su nyon mongs pa'o zhes
T04D3903:282a-10: pa'o // dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu rnams kyang
T04D3903:282a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdor ji skad du
T04D3903:282a-13: de la gsung gi gnyen po ni sems can gyi
T04D3903:282a-14: khams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ston par byed pa'i
T04D3903:282a-15: phyir ro // 'jam pa ni mthong ba'i chos kho
T04D3903:282a-16: na la bde ba la reg par byed pa nyid
T04D3903:282a-17: phyir ro // kyi phyir ro // yid du 'ong ba ni don bzang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-18: yid du 'thad pa ni yi ge bzang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-19: dag pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa'i rjes la thob pa'i phyir ro ;
T04D3903:282a-20: / dri ma med pa nyid ni nyon mongs pa'i
T04D3903:282a-21: bag la nyal dang bag chags thams cad dang bral
T04D3903:282a-23: gsal ba ni tshig dang yi ge so sor grags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-24: snyan cing 'jebs pa ni mu stegs can blo gros
T04D3903:282a-25: ngan pa can thams cad kyi lta ba 'joms pa'i
T04D3903:282a-26: stobs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-27: mnyan par 'os pa ni sgrub pas nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-28: mi tshugs pa ni pha rol gyi smra ba po
T04D3903:282a-29: thams cad kyis gcad par bya ba ma yin pa
T04D3903:282a-31: snyan pa ni dga' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-32: dul ba ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-33: mi rtsub pa ni bslab pa bca' ba'i bde ba'i thabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-34: mi brlang ba ni de las 'das pa na yang
T04D3903:282a-35: dag par nges par 'byung ba nye bar ston pa
T04D3903:282a-37: rab tu dul ba ni theg pa gsum gyis 'dul ba nye bar ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-38: rna bar snyan pa ni rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen po nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-39: lus tshim par byed pa ni ting nge 'dzin skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282a-40: sems tshim par byed pa ni lhag mthong gi rab
T04D3903:282a-41: tu dga' ba skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir
T04D3903:282a-42: ro // snying dga' bar byed pa ni the tshom gcod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-0: dga' ba dang bde ba bskyed pa ni @282b log par nges pa sel ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-1: yongs su gdung ba med pa ni sgrub pa po 'gyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-2: kun du shes par bya ba ni thos pa las
T04D3903:282b-3: byung ba'i shes pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rten nyid
T04D3903:282b-4: kyi phyir ro // rnam par rig par bya ba
T04D3903:282b-5: ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pa phun sum
T04D3903:282b-6: tshogs pa'i rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-7: rnam par gsal ba ni slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud med par chos ston pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-8: dga' bar bya ba ni rang gi don rjes su
T04D3903:282b-9: thob pa rnams dga' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir
T04D3903:282b-10: ro // mngon par dga' bar 'os pa ni rang
T04D3903:282b-11: gi don rjes su thob pa rnams kyis spro bar
T04D3903:282b-12: bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-13: kun shes par bya bar gzhug tu 'os pa ni
T04D3903:282b-14: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos yang dag par ston
T04D3903:282b-16: rnam par rig par byar gzhug tu 'os pa ni
T04D3903:282b-17: bsam par bya ba'i chos yang dag par ston pa
T04D3903:282b-19: rigs pa ni tshad ma dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-20: 'brel pa ni ji ltar 'os par gdul bya la ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-21: zlos pa'i skyon med pa ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-22: seng ge'i sgra'i shugs ni mu stegs can gyi tshogs thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-23: glang po che'i sgra skad ni rgya che ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-24: 'brug gi sgra dbyangs ni zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-25: klu'i dbang po'i sgra dbyangs ni gzung bar 'os pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-26: dri za'i glu dbyangs ni snyan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-27: ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs ni rno ba dang 'jebs pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-28: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa ni thag ring por grags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-29: shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grags pa ni grub
T04D3903:282b-30: pa thams cad la bkra shis pa nyid kyis sngon
T04D3903:282b-31: du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:282b-32: de la sgra bzung ba ni don rtogs par byed
T04D3903:282b-33: pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sgra rtogs par bya ba'i
T04D3903:282b-34: don du'o // dbyangs bzung ba ni thag ring por
T04D3903:282b-35: de dang de'i brda rtogs par byed pa'i don no
T04D3903:282b-36: don du'o // // grags pa bzung ba ni de
T04D3903:282b-37: dang de'i dbyangs kyis brda rjes su ston pa rtogs
T04D3903:282b-39: lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar snyan pa ni 'da' bar
T04D3903:282b-40: bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir rda'i sgra ni bdud
T04D3903:282b-41: dang glags tshol ba thams cad las rgyal ba'i sngon
T04D3903:282b-42: du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-0: ma khengs pa ni bstod pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med @283a * //
T04D3903:283a-2: mi dma' ba ni smad pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-3: sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa ni lung
T04D3903:283a-4: ston pa thams cad la mtshan nyid rnam pa thams
T04D3903:283a-5: cad la rjes su zhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T04D3903:283a-6: // sgra zur chag pa med pa ni dran pa nyams pas mi gsung ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-7: ma tshang ba med pa ni gdul bya'i bya ba
T04D3903:283a-8: rnams la dus thams cad du nye bar gnas pa'i
T04D3903:283a-9: phyir ro // ma zhum pa ni rnyed pa dang
T04D3903:283a-10: bkur sti la mi brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T04D3903:283a-11: phyir ro // // ma zhen pa ni 'jigs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-12: rab tu dga' ba ni mi skyo ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-13: khyab pa ni rig pa'i gnas thams cad mkhas pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-14: chub pa ni sems can rnams kyi de'i don thams
T04D3903:283a-15: cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir
T04D3903:283a-16: ro // rgyun chags pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-17: 'brel ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs su nye bar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-18: sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa ni sgra gcig
T04D3903:283a-19: las sgra'i rnam par rig pa du ma nye bar
T04D3903:283a-21: dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa ni gcig
T04D3903:283a-22: las don du ma'i rnam par rig pa nye bar
T04D3903:283a-24: ma smad pa ni dam bca' ba ji lta ba bzhin pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-25: mi 'gyur ba ni dus la bab par rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-26: ma brtabs pa ni rtab rtab por mi gsung ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-27: 'khor kun du grag pa ni ring ba dang nye
T04D3903:283a-28: ba'i 'khor du mtshungs par thos pa nyid kyi phyir
T04D3903:283a-29: ro // rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa
T04D3903:283a-30: ni 'jig rten pa'i don thams cad dpe'i chos su
T04D3903:283a-31: bsgyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes so //
T04D3903:283a-32: de bzhin du yon tan gzhan rnams kyang mdo sna
T04D3903:283a-33: tshogs rnams su rgyas par bstan pa 'di lta ste
T04D3903:283a-34: / spyod pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis 'jug pa'i
T04D3903:283a-35: yon tan ni gdul bya ji lta bar bdag nyid
T04D3903:283a-36: kyi lus yang dag par phye ba kun du ston
T04D3903:283a-37: pas 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:283a-38: dge ba'i chos skye ba mkhyen pa'i yon tan ni /

T04D3903:283a-40: nyan thos la sogs pa'i yul las 'das pa dge
T04D3903:283a-41: ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon phra mo yang rdo'i gseb
T04D3903:283a-42: tu son pa'i gser gyi sa bon bzhin du phyin
T04D3903:283a-43: ci ma log pa'i rnam par mkhyen pa'i phyir ro
T04D3903:283a-44: // ji ltar mos pa bzhin du ston pa'i yon
T04D3903:283b-0: tan ni @283b yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du
T04D3903:283b-1: rnam par rtog pa med par yang de bzhin gshegs
T04D3903:283b-2: // pa'i dbang dang / rang gi mos pa'i dbang
T04D3903:283b-3: las de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog la
T04D3903:283b-4: sogs pa'i sku can du mthong ba ste /
T04D3903:283b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rtog par mi mdzad pa rnam
T04D3903:283b-6: par rtog par mdzad ces pa la sogs pa mdo
T04D3903:283b-8: tshad med pa'i rten gyis sems can 'dul ba la
T04D3903:283b-9: rab tu sbyor ba'i yon tan ni tshad med pa'i
T04D3903:283b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i rten rnams kyis sems can 'dul
T04D3903:283b-11: ba'i ched du rab tu sbyor ba ste /
T04D3903:283b-12: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang sems pa dang /
T04D3903:283b-13: sgom pa'i rim gyis ye shes kyi khyad par thob
T04D3903:283b-14: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rjes su 'dzin
T04D3903:283b-15: pa dang yongs su gtang ba dag gis yongs su
T04D3903:283b-16: chad pa med par brgyud pas rab tu 'jug pa'i
T04D3903:283b-17: phyir ro // chos kyi sku dang pha rol tu
T04D3903:283b-18: phyin pa mnyam par rdzogs pa'i yon tan ni gnyis
T04D3903:283b-19: su med pa'i chos kyi sku can sangs rgyas kyi
T04D3903:283b-20: sa la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu
T04D3903:283b-21: phyin pa rnams mtshungs par rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:283b-22: 'dres pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar
T04D3903:283b-23: mos pa bzhin yang dag par ston pa'i yon tan
T04D3903:283b-24: ni / sems can gyi mos pa la ltos pas
T04D3903:283b-25: 'dres pa med cing ma 'dres par sangs rgyas kyi
T04D3903:283b-26: zhing gser la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du yang dag
T04D3903:283b-28: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum po rnams kyi yang yul
T04D3903:283b-29: yongs su chad pa med pa'i yon tan ni thog
T04D3903:283b-30: ma dang bar ma dang tha ma spangs pa'i sangs
T04D3903:283b-31: rgyas sku gsum gyi bdag nyid rnams kyi sa rnams
T04D3903:283b-32: dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su thams cad du
T04D3903:283b-33: yul yongs su gcad pa med pas mnyam pa nyid
T04D3903:283b-35: 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du sems can thams cad la
T04D3903:283b-36: phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon
T04D3903:283b-37: tan ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag
T04D3903:283b-38: pa 'khor ba'i bar du gnas pa las de'i rgyu
T04D3903:283b-39: mthun pa mdo la sogs pa'i chos rnams gdul bya
T04D3903:283b-40: rnams kyi dus ji lta ba bzhin phyi ma'i mthar
T04D3903:283b-41: dang de'i tshe nyid na yang so sor nye bar
T04D3903:283b-43: mi zad pa nyid kyi yon tan ni chos kyi
T04D3903:283b-44: dbyings la rnam par bkod pa rnams nam mkha' bzhin
T04D3903:284a-1: med pa las 'khor ba ji srid par chos kyi
T04D3903:284a-2: dbyings las 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don bya ba
T04D3903:284a-3: rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu sbyor ba nyid kyi
T04D3903:284a-4: phyir yon tan mi zad pa nyid do //
T04D3903:284a-5: mdzes pa dang slar ma ldog pa dang ma lus pa rtogs pa'i yon tan te /
T04D3903:284a-6: 'dis kyang rim pa ji lta bar phyi rol pa
T04D3903:284a-7: dang slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams rnam par
T04D3903:284a-9: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis thob
T04D3903:284a-10: pa de nyid kyis na mdzes par rtogs pa yin
T04D3903:284a-11: la de bzhin du phyi rol pa rnams kyi ma
T04D3903:284a-12: yin te / mtshams dang bcas pa nyid kyis de'i
T04D3903:284a-13: thar pa ni thar pa ma yin pa nyid kyi
T04D3903:284a-14: yin te / phyir ro // ldog pa'o zhes brjod
T04D3903:284a-15: pa na skye ba dang skyon kun du 'byung ba
T04D3903:284a-16: yin te / phyir ro // ste / de dag
T04D3903:284a-17: kyang slob pa rnams kyi yin la bcom ldan 'das
T04D3903:284a-19: lus pa ni nyon mongs pa med cing nad med
T04D3903:284a-20: la lus dang ngag dang yid las su mi rung

T04D3903:284a-23: pa rnams la yang ji ltar srid pa bzhin yod

T04D3903:284a-25: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa'i yon tan te /
T04D3903:284a-26: de la rig pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o //
T04D3903:284a-27: lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa ni zhabs so //
T04D3903:284a-28: rigs pa sngon ma can de dag zhabs nyid kyi phyir te /
T04D3903:284a-29: gang gi phyir rig pa mig dang 'dra bas bltas
T04D3903:284a-30: pas cig shos zhabs dang 'dra ba dag gis de
T04D3903:284a-31: ltar 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:284a-32: dbang phyug dang gzugs dang grags pa dang dpal dang
T04D3903:284a-33: ye shes dang brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa'i yon
T04D3903:284a-34: tan te / de la dbang phyug ni gzhan gyi dbang ma yin pa yin la /
T04D3903:284a-35: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T04D3903:284a-36: bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:284a-37: rnam pa thams cad du yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yang ngo //
T04D3903:284a-38: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa
T04D3903:284a-39: ni bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsis mngon par bran
T04D3903:284a-40: zhing bla na med la sgrib pa med pa'i sku
T04D3903:284a-41: dang gsung dang thugs phun sum tshogs pa rtogs par
T04D3903:284a-42: mdzad pas so // bcom ldan 'das mar gsungs pa /
T04D3903:284a-43: gang yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bde ba'o zhes so //
T04D3903:284a-44: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kho na bde ba ste /
T04D3903:284b-0: @284b sdug bsngal ma lus pa nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:284b-2: rab tu zhi ba mi g-yo mchog / dbang bsgyur mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T04D3903:284b-3: rnam par mi rtog bde de'i phyir //
T04D3903:284b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rtogs par byed //
T04D3903:284b-6: de nyid kyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
T04D3903:284b-7: la bcom ldan 'das ni btang snyoms kyi ye shes
T04D3903:284b-8: kyi rang bzhin no zhes 'dod pa ni mi 'thad
T04D3903:284b-10: gzugs phun sum tshogs pa ni bla na med pa'i
T04D3903:284b-11: mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis rnam par gsal
T04D3903:284b-12: ba'i sku can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:284b-13: grags pa phun sum tshogs pa ni phyogs dang phyogs
T04D3903:284b-14: mtshams rnams su sgra grag pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T04D3903:284b-15: // phun sum tshogs pa gang gis na mang po
T04D3903:284b-16: rnams kyis bstan par bya ba de ni dpal te
T04D3903:284b-17: // / bsod nams kyi tshogs bla na med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T04D3903:284b-18: de phun sum tshogs pa ni 'jig rten pa dang
T04D3903:284b-19: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams
T04D3903:284b-20: cad 'dod pa rnams kyis bstan par bya ba nyid
T04D3903:284b-21: kyi phyir ro // ye shes phun sum tshogs pa
T04D3903:284b-22: ni shes bya thams cad la rnam pa thams cad
T04D3903:284b-23: du dag pa dang chags pa med pa dang thogs
T04D3903:284b-24: pa med pa'i ye shes can nyid kyi phyir ro
T04D3903:284b-25: kyi phyir ro // // brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs
T04D3903:284b-26: pa ni bla na med pa'i gsung phun sum tshogs
T04D3903:284b-27: kyi phyir ro // // pa ste / lhun gyis
T04D3903:284b-28: grub pas chags pa med cing mi ldog la 'bad
T04D3903:284b-29: pa med par 'byung ba dang 'gro ba thams cad
T04D3903:284b-30: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tshim par byed pa
T04D3903:284b-31: kyi phyir ro // // pa ste / dang /
T04D3903:284b-32: dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang
T04D3903:284b-33: kyi phyir ro // // pa ste / dang / / 'gro ba grol bar byed pa'i gsung ste /
T04D3903:284b-34: gzhan gyi don rnam pa thams cad la longs spyod
T04D3903:284b-35: rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku dag gis rtag tu
T04D3903:284b-36: mi ldog pa'i bya ba can nyid kyi phyir ro
T04D3903:284b-38: rang bzhin legs par rnam par gnas pa me long
T04D3903:284b-39: ye shes kyis thob pa'i phyir dbang phyug phun sum
T04D3903:284b-40: tshogs pa'o // mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T04D3903:284b-41: rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T04D3903:284b-42: lus thob pa'i phyir gzugs phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04D3903:284b-43: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas na
T04D3903:284b-44: cho 'phrul thams cad kyis shin tu phra ba'i mtha'
T04D3903:284b-45: yas pa'i gdul bya'i sgrib pa spong ba'i phyir grags
T04D3903:285a-1: cad du mos pa ji lta bar sems can thams
T04D3903:285a-2: cad kyi mtha' yas pa'i bsod nams dang bya ba
T04D3903:285a-3: grub pa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs las mi
T04D3903:285a-4: zad pa'i rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi rten la
T04D3903:285a-5: sogs pa ston pas tshim par byed pa'i phyir dpal
T04D3903:285a-7: thun mong ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa thams
T04D3903:285a-8: cad du ye shes la dbang nyid thob pa'i phyir
T04D3903:285a-9: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04D3903:285a-10: de ltar gyur pa'i shin tu sems can gyi don
T04D3903:285a-11: la mchog tu sbyor ba na mchog tu mya ngan
T04D3903:285a-12: las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i phyir brtson
T04D3903:285a-13: 'grus phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes rnam gzhag mdzad do
T04D3903:285a-14: ; / de la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni
T04D3903:285a-15: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
T04D3903:285a-16: ; skye ste / nam mkha' gnas pa ji srid par bzhugs so //
T04D3903:285a-17: de ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin zhe na /
T04D3903:285a-18: de nyid der gtso bor 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:285a-19: 'jig cing rab tu 'jig pas na 'jig rten te /
T04D3903:285a-20: skye dgu dang de'i snod do //
T04D3903:285a-21: des na 'jig rten gyi khams ni rnam pa gnyis
T04D3903:285a-22: te sems can gyi 'jig rten dang snod kyi 'jig
T04D3903:285a-23: rten no // de la snod kyi 'jig rten du
T04D3903:285a-24: sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa khang bzangs skyed
T04D3903:285a-25: mos tshal dang 'bab stegs dang dpag bsam gyi shing
T04D3903:285a-26: la sogs pas bskor ba'i sems can gyi gnas mchog
T04D3903:285a-27: tu 'bar ba gser dang dngul dang bee d'urya dang
T04D3903:285a-28: mu sa ra gar bha dang rdo'i snying po dang
T04D3903:285a-29: mu tig dmar po dang kar ke ta na ste
T04D3903:285a-30: rten no // / rin po che sna bdun gyi
T04D3903:285a-31: rang bzhin dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T04D3903:285a-32: gzhan du 'gro ba'i 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa
T04D3903:285a-33: rten no // / / steng du yang nam mkha' dang rjes su mthun par snang ba'o //
T04D3903:285a-34: der sems can gang su dag skyes pa de rnams
T04D3903:285a-35: thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i sa thob pa'i byang chub
T04D3903:285a-37: slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu smin par bya'o //
T04D3903:285a-38: sems can de rnams kyang sa dang chu dang me
T04D3903:285a-39: dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i
T04D3903:285a-40: khams kyi rang bzhin gyis ni khams drug pa can
T04D3903:285a-41: te / dge slong skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:285a-42: de rnams kyi lus kyang mdzes pa dang ldan pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can te /
T04D3903:285a-43: sa gzhi dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs can no //
T04D3903:285b-0: de na sems @285b can rnams kyi longs spyod la
T04D3903:285b-1: yongs su longs spyod pa yang lha'i 'jig rten thams
T04D3903:285b-2: cad las so sor khyad par du 'phags pa ste
T04D3903:285b-3: / gang rnams kyi longs spyod ni mtha' gcig tu
T04D3903:285b-4: dge ba bde ba mtha' gcig tu kha na ma
T04D3903:285b-5: tho ba med pa mtha' gcig tu dbang bsgyur ba'o
T04D3903:285b-6: / // 'di 'dra ba ni khams drug yongs su dag pa ste /
T04D3903:285b-8: mtshams dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T04D3903:285b-9: shin tu rol pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:285b-10: der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mtha'
T04D3903:285b-11: yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas der
T04D3903:285b-12: sems can de rnams kyi mi dge ba bsags pa
T04D3903:285b-14: de'i gnyen po dge ba sogs pa rnams rab tu
T04D3903:285b-15: mkhyen nas dge ba'i chos bskyed pa'i ched du chos
T04D3903:285b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang yon tan 'di
T04D3903:285b-18: rnams thams cad yod la mchog tu rnam par dag
T04D3903:285b-19: par son pa ni ma yin no //
T04D3903:285b-20: de ltar mtshams med pa'i yon tan gyi gter gyi
T04D3903:285b-21: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mtha' yas pa'i rin po
T04D3903:285b-22: che'i rang bzhin gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi nang
T04D3903:285b-23: na / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad
T04D3903:285b-24: mchog tu 'bar bas sku rnam par gsal ba ni
T04D3903:285b-25: bcom ldan 'das longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T04D3903:285b-26: de la gzugs tshad mar byed pa'i gang zag rnams
T04D3903:285b-27: kyi ngor dad pa mngon par 'phel ba'i ched du
T04D3903:285b-28: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams
T04D3903:285b-29: dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams rnam par
T04D3903:285b-30: gzhag gi 'di rnams kyi grangs 'di tsam du bya
T04D3903:285b-31: bar nus par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T04D3903:285b-32: de la mtshan rnams ni phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-33: rus sbal bzhin zhabs shin tu gnas pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-34: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar dra bas 'brel ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-35: phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-37: sor mo ring ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-38: rting pa yangs pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-39: sku che zhing drang ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-40: zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-41: sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-42: byin pa ri dags ae ne ya lta bu dang /
T04D3903:285b-43: dpung pa ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:285b-44: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-1: spu re re nas g-yas su 'khyil ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-2: zhal mdzod spus mtshan pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-3: ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-4: spung mgo shin tu zlum pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-5: thal gang rgyas pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-6: ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-7: nya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-8: dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-9: ljags srab cing ring ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gyis
T04D3903:286a-11: dam pa'i chos go bar byed pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i
T04D3903:286a-12: dbyangs nyid dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-13: tshems shin tu dkar ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-15: tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-16: tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid dang /
T04D3903:286a-18: spyan rdzim [?] ba'i lta bu nyid do //
T04D3903:286a-19: zhabs shin tu gnas pa nyid ni sa la mnyam par reg pa ste /
T04D3903:286a-20: sa chen po thams cad la yang dma' ba dang mtho ba dang /
T04D3903:286a-21: gseg ma dang rdo ba dang chu dang 'dam dang /
T04D3903:286a-22: tsher ma dang bu ga la sogs pa med par mnyam por gnas la /
T04D3903:286a-23: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar
T04D3903:286a-24: gyi dbang gis ring ba yang nye bar 'gyur ro
T04D3903:286a-25: // sor mo'i tshigs dang po nas brtsams pa'i sor
T04D3903:286a-26: mo'i bar la seng seng po med na yang sor
T04D3903:286a-27: gdub la sogs pa'i rgyan gzhug tu rung ba'i sor
T04D3903:286a-28: // mo can no // 'jam pa ni shin tu gzhon pa nyid do //
T04D3903:286a-29: gzhon sha chags pa ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:286a-30: bdun ni phyag dang zhabs kyi rgyab gnyis dang /
T04D3903:286a-31: phrag gang gnyis dang ltag pa ste shas khengs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:286a-32: zhabs kyi mthil thams cad cha bzhir byas nas cha gsum rnams la zhabs dang /
T04D3903:286a-33: cha gcig la rting pa ste tshad dang ldan pa'o //
T04D3903:286a-34: zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa zhes 'dir mdo ni shin
T04D3903:286a-35: tu pus mo dang long bu mi mngon pa nyid
T04D3903:286a-36: kyi phyir zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa'o zhes so //
T04D3903:286a-37: de'i phyir shin tu yang sbas pa'i don can aud sgra'o //
T04D3903:286a-38: pus mo dang long mo'i rus pa rjod par byed pa ni sham kha'i sgra'o //
T04D3903:286a-39: brla'i rtsa ba las 'og thams cad la zhabs zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T04D3903:286a-40: ae ne ya'i yan lag ni ae ne ya ste /
T04D3903:286a-41: byin pa dang 'dra ba ni byin pa ste /
T04D3903:286b-0: sha shin tu rgyas pa dad rim gyis phra @286b ba dang /
T04D3903:286b-2: shin tu 'dril zhing yongs su zlum pa ste sor brgyad kyi phyogs su 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:286b-3: phyag dag mdzes pa nyid ni rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:286b-4: ring ba nyid ni ring ba ste /
T04D3903:286b-5: ma btud par pus mor sleb pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:286b-6: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni gang gis mdoms kyi sba ba mi mngon pa'o //
T04D3903:286b-7: mdog gser 'dra ba nyid kyis na sku mkhregs shing
T04D3903:286b-8: snum la 'od gsal ba'i kha dog can nyid du
T04D3903:286b-9: bstan pa'o // spu g-yas su 'khyil ba nyid ni g-yas phyogs su 'khor bas so //
T04D3903:286b-10: mdzod spu ni smin mtshams kyi bar na thig le'i
T04D3903:286b-11: gnas na 'jam pa dkar ba mnyen pa drangs na
T04D3903:286b-12: khru gang dang khru gnyis dang khru gsum la sogs
T04D3903:286b-15: rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam pa dngul 'bur gyi rnam pa'o //
T04D3903:286b-16: ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid ni rgyas pa
T04D3903:286b-17: yangs pa sha rgyas pa'i brang can nyid kyi phyir
T04D3903:286b-18: dang / mdzes pa nyid dang rgya che ba phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04D3903:286b-19: shin tu zlum pa rtsa'i dra ba mi mngon pa ni gang gi dpung mgo ste /
T04D3903:286b-20: gser gyi bum pa'i mgrin pa yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa legs par 'brel pa can no //
T04D3903:286b-21: dpung mgo dag gi bar dang bar ni thal gong
T04D3903:286b-22: ste 'di'i de nye bar rgyas pa'o zhes pa thal
T04D3903:286b-23: gong rgyas pa'o // ro drug po rnams kyi bro
T04D3903:286b-24: ba mkhyen zhing tshim par byed pa ste ro bro
T04D3903:286b-25: ba'i mchog nyid kyi zhal zas can ni bcom ldan
T04D3903:286b-26: 'das so zhes kha cig tu brjod do //
T04D3903:286b-27: yan lag dang nying lag rnams su ro rnams bro
T04D3903:286b-28: bar byed gsol bar byed ces pa ro bro ba
T04D3903:286b-30: de rnams kyi mchog nyid ni rlung dang mkhris pa
T04D3903:286b-31: dang bad kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs
T04D3903:286b-32: pa nyid kyis mnyam par gnas pa ste /
T04D3903:286b-33: 'di'i rlung la sogs pas ma dkrugs pa rnams ni mtho bar mi 'gyur 'dus khongs su ma yin /
T04D3903:286b-35: kha dog ngan pa ma yin te /
T04D3903:286b-36: mi mngon par rtsa de rnams kyis rnam 'gyur ma
T04D3903:286b-37: byas pa'i sku ni gser gyi gtan pa bzhin du
T04D3903:286b-39: rlung la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa de rnams kyis kyang yang dag par gsol ba'o //
T04D3903:286b-41: skyes bu chen po rnams kyi ma gri na pa
T04D3903:286b-42: ro gsol bar byed pa stong phrag bdun po gyen
T04D3903:286b-43: du kha phyogs pa rnams 'jug go zhes so //
T04D3903:287a-0: ro thams cad kyang zhal du bcug pas bdud rtsi'i ro dang @287a * //
T04D3903:287a-2: yang na ro bro bar bya'o zhes pa ro ste drug rnams so //
T04D3903:287a-3: de rnams kyi bro ba ste /
T04D3903:287a-5: de dang ldan pa'i zhal zas gang la yod pa
T04D3903:287a-6: ni de skad do zhes bye brag tu bshad do
T04D3903:287a-7: // n+yag ni dma' ba ste sku smad do /
T04D3903:287a-8: ro dha ni sku stod do //
T04D3903:287a-9: yongs su gab ba ni mnyam pa ste lte ba
T04D3903:287a-10: nas bzung nas sku smad dang sku stod tshad mnyam
T04D3903:287a-11: pa'o // yang na 'dom ni nya gro dha ste
T04D3903:287a-12: sku bzhengs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
T04D3903:287a-13: gnyis 'dom du byas pa na sku mtha' dag chu
T04D3903:287a-15: nya gro dha ni shing kha kha ta ste de
T04D3903:287a-16: dang 'dra bar chu dang zheng mnyam pa'o zhes kha

T04D3903:287a-18: ljags che ba nyid ni ring ba nyid kyi phyir te /
T04D3903:287a-19: snyan gyi bug pa'i bar dang dpral ba'i skra mtshams kyi mthar thug par ljags kyis reg pa'o //
T04D3903:287a-20: shin tu yang dag par rdzogs pa ma yin pa
T04D3903:287a-21: chos bcu gnyis kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra
T04D3903:287a-22: ba legs par 'brel pa dang 'gram pa'i mtha' zlum
T04D3903:287a-24: 'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu nyid do //
T04D3903:287a-25: tshems bzhi bcu tshad ba ni gzhan rnams kyi bzhin
T04D3903:287a-26: du sum cu rtsa gnyis sam nyi shu rtsa brgya
T04D3903:287a-27: ma yin pa'o // spyan ni zlum pa'i dbus snum
T04D3903:287a-28: zhing gnas pa dang nag po zlum po'i logs gnyis
T04D3903:287a-29: ma yin pa'o // dkar ba dang / rdzi ma
T04D3903:287a-30: gnas pa'i go skabs snum la mthing gar 'dug pa
T04D3903:287a-31: ma yin pa'o // dkar ba dang / dang /
T04D3903:287a-32: mtha' gnyis shing pi ppa la'i shun pa ltar dmar
T04D3903:287a-33: ma yin pa'o // dkar ba dang / dang /
T04D3903:287a-34: ba dang / rdzi ma dang spyan gyi bar gser
T04D3903:287a-35: gyi kha dog go zhes pa 'di lta bu dang
T04D3903:287a-36: ba lnga rnams dang ldan kyang spyan gyi dkyil 'khor
T04D3903:287a-37: gtso bo nyid kyi phyir spyan mthon mthing ngo zhes
T04D3903:287a-38: ma yin pa'o // dkar ba dang / dang /
T04D3903:287a-39: ba dang / gsungs so // be'u gzhon nu'i bzhin
T04D3903:287a-40: du bla 'og shin tu snum zhing 'od dang ldan
T04D3903:287a-42: ma 'dzings pa nyid kyi phyir spyan rdzi ma pa'i lta bu nyid do //
T04D3903:287a-43: mtshan 'di rnams rjes su gsal par byed pa'am mtshan dang rjes su mthun par gsal bar byed pa'am /

T04D3903:290b-24: 'das rnams kyi drung du shin tu dga' ba dang
T04D3903:290b-25: gus pa bskyed par bya nus te /
T04D3903:290b-26: 'di lta ste rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04D3903:290b-27: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang phan pa byed pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04D3903:290b-28: de la rgyu phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3903:290b-29: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la goms par byed pa dang /
T04D3903:290b-30: dus ring por goms par byed pa dang /
T04D3903:290b-31: rgyun du goms par byed pa dang /
T04D3903:290b-32: bkur stir byas te goms par byed pa'o //
T04D3903:290b-33: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3903:290b-37: gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04D3903:290b-38: phan par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3903:291a-1: bsngal las shin tu nges par 'grol pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-2: theg pa gsum dang bde 'gro la 'god pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04D3903:291a-3: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3903:291a-4: nye bar ma bstan par mkhyen pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-6: rnam pa thams cad du mkhyen pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-8: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3903:291a-9: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-11: bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-12: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'o //
T04D3903:291a-13: mthu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3903:291a-14: phyi rol gyi yul rnam sa sprul zhing yongs su
T04D3903:291a-15: bsgyur ba dang byin gyis rlob pa la dbang ba
T04D3903:291a-16: nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-17: sku tshe gtong ba dang byin gyis rlob pa la dbang ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-18: bsgribs pa dang nam mkhar dang ring ba la myur bar gshegs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-19: phra ba mang por 'jug pa la dbang ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-20: sku'i 'od kyis mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T04D3903:291a-21: snang bar byed pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna
T04D3903:291a-22: tshogs pa'i gnyug ma'i ngo mtshar ba phun sum tshogs
T04D3903:291a-23: pa'o // gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3903:291a-24: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-25: dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-26: stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04D3903:291a-27: rdo rje'i snying po'i rus pa'i lus phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04D3903:291a-28: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha dad pa dang zhing tha dad pa ste /
T04D3903:291a-29: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'ga' zhig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni shel gyi rang bzhin /
T04D3903:291a-30: 'ga' zhig gi ni bee d'urya'i rang bzhin te /
T04D3903:291a-31: de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
T04D3903:291a-32: ming tha dad pa ni 'od dpag med dang /
T04D3903:291a-33: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'o //
T04D3903:291a-34: sku tha dad pa ni 'ga' zhig gis rnam pa 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba ste /
T04D3903:291a-35: shel gyi rang bzhin la sogs pa tha dad pa'am /
T04D3903:291a-36: sku chung ba dang sku che ba tha dad pas so //
T04D3903:291a-37: chos la rdzogs par longs spyod pa tha dad pa
T04D3903:291b-0: ni sa bcu pa dang blo @291b gros mi zad
T04D3903:291b-1: pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs la sogs pa chos kyi
T04D3903:291b-2: rnam grangs tha dad pas so //
T04D3903:291b-3: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha dad pa ni der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ltos pa ste /
T04D3903:291b-4: bskor ba tha dad pa yang ngo //
T04D3903:291b-5: ji ltar sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis po
T04D3903:291b-6: 'di rnams 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir nges par bstan
T04D3903:291b-7: pa de ltar kho nar rtogs par bya ste /
T04D3903:291b-8: gnas gang de rnams bsams na byis pa nus pa
T04D3903:291b-9: zad pa las skyo zhing smyo la brgyal ba dang
T04D3903:291b-10: 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de rnams ni bsam gyis
T04D3903:291b-12: rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3903:291b-13: de rnams kyang ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor
T04D3903:291b-14: can gyi dbang phyug gi gtso bos gzigs shing bstan
T04D3903:291b-15: pa de kho na ltar bdag gis 'dir gdams ngag
T04D3903:291b-16: ji lta bar nges par bshad pa'o //
T04D3903:291b-17: de ltar 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po nyid mdor bsdus pa ste /
T04D3903:291b-18: phye bar bya na ni dbye ba mtha' yas par 'gyur ro //
T04D3903:291b-19: sangs rgyas rnams kho nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T04D3903:291b-20: rnams kyi ba spu'i khung bu re rer dang dpe
T04D3903:291b-21: byad dang skyes bu'i mtshan dang /
T04D3903:291b-23: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i
T04D3903:291b-24: yon tan gyi khyad par de rnams kyang yongs su
T04D3903:291b-26: mngon par brjod par yang nus mod /
T04D3903:291b-27: ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bskal
T04D3903:291b-28: pa grangs med par sku tshe'i tshad byin gyis brlabs
T04D3903:291b-29: par gyur cing / myur zhing myur bar las gzhan
T04D3903:291b-30: med par gyur nas gal te brjod par gyur pa
T04D3903:291b-31: de lta na yang yon tan yongs su rdzogs par
T04D3903:291b-33: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lta ci smos la
T04D3903:291b-34: rang sangs rgyas sam nyan thos rnams kyis ni sangs
T04D3903:291b-35: rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mtha' shes pa'am brjod par
T04D3903:291b-36: mi nus par sngar kho na'o //
T04D3903:291b-37: gshog pa'i rgya shin tu yangs pa'i rlung gi shugs
T04D3903:291b-38: rlob cing pha rol gnon pa'i nam mkha' lding yang
T04D3903:291b-39: / nam mkha' yongs su zad do snyam nas nam mkha' las 'bab pa ma yin gyi /
T04D3903:291b-40: 'on kyang rang gi stobs dang pha rol gnon pa nyams pas so //
T04D3903:291b-41: de bzhin du gang sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang
T04D3903:291b-42: chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
T04D3903:292a-2: de rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan de snyed mngon par brjod pa nus pa las /
T04D3903:292a-3: yon tan yongs su zad pas nam mkha' bzhin du
T04D3903:292a-4: mtha' med pa'i yon tan rnams las ldog pa ma
T04D3903:292a-5: yin gyi / rang gi blo'i stobs yongs su nyams pas ni log nas gnas na /
T04D3903:292a-6: rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos rnams kyis yon tan gyis rtogs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
T04D3903:292a-7: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su
T04D3903:292a-8: shes pa'am mngon par brjod pa la 'di lta bu'i
T04D3903:292a-10: de'i phyir bdag lta bu'i ma rig pa'i rab rib
T04D3903:292a-11: kyis long ba ji lta ba bzhin gyi de kho
T04D3903:292a-12: na nyid shin tu lkog tu gyur pa can rnams
T04D3903:292a-13: la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i skabs
T04D3903:292a-14: ga la yod / gal te yang de lta ste /
T04D3903:292a-15: de lta na yang 'phags pa klu sgrub dang /
T04D3903:292a-16: 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sde la sogs pa la brten ba las /
T04D3903:292a-17: the tshom med par bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig gi cha tsam brjod do //
T04D3903:292a-18: de ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mtha'
T04D3903:292a-19: yas shing rmad du byung ba'i yon tan rin po
T04D3903:292a-20: che chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no //
T04D3903:292a-21: 'on kyang slar yang byis pa rang yon tan gyis
T04D3903:292a-22: bkren pas mos pa dang bral ba rnams yon tan
T04D3903:292a-23: phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra ba thos kyang sangs
T04D3903:292a-24: rgyas de'i chos la gus par mi byed la /
T04D3903:292a-25: mkhas pa rnams ni rkang gi khong nas kyang bcom
T04D3903:292a-26: ldan 'das de dang de'i chos la'ang mngon par rab
T04D3903:292a-28: de rnams de la dad pa tsam gyis kyar mngon par bsgrub pa rnams /
T04D3903:292a-29: rnam par smin pa ma nges pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi phung po rnams zil gyis mnan te /
T04D3903:292a-30: lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong zhing /
T04D3903:292a-31: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla na med pa mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T04D3903:292a-32: thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan las yon tan gyi snang
T04D3903:292a-33: pa'i le 'u ste yongs su bcad ba bzhi pa'o
T04D3903:292a-35: / // / zhes pa thub dgongs dpag bsam ljon shing rtog pa'i rlung gis ni //
T04D3903:292a-36: g-yos shing lta ngan chu yis rgyun du rab zhir mthar zhugs pa //
T04D3903:292a-37: mi mthun phyogs rnams nye bar gyur las 'bras bu bzang rnams bsdus //
T04D3903:292a-38: kye snying slar yang skye ba dag pa 'byung ba
T04D3903:292a-39: ga la zhig / snang ba 'di las phan dang
T04D3903:292b-0: @292b mi phan pa yang rnam bltas nas //
T04D3903:292b-1: gang las mtho bas yon tan rang bzhin theg pa 'di zhon te //
T04D3903:292b-2: bdag nang stobs ldan dgra bo'i rigs kyi rtsa ba myur chod la //
T04D3903:292b-3: srid gsum rnam rgyal phun tshogs byang chub gnas kyis phun tshogs byon //
T04D3903:292b-4: tshul gsum rnams la bden pa zung gi srog / mdor bsdus bdag gis 'di ru nye bar bkod //
T04D3903:292b-5: gal te nyes par zin na de bzod mdzod //
T04D3903:292b-6: bden pa gnyis la sa brnyes tshad ma yin //
T04D3903:292b-7: gzhung lugs smad med bshad pa'i legs byas 'dod bya zla ba ni //
T04D3903:292b-8: rab rib 'joms byed gnyid bral de yis skye bo
T04D3903:292b-9: tshim byed shog bdag kyang so so'i sku 'dzin bsam
T04D3903:292b-10: mi khyab sku phun tshogs kyis //
T04D3903:292b-11: rtsod pa dang bral bskal par rol pa'i ched du
T04D3903:292b-12: 'du bar shog / yon tan dam pa bsgrigs pa'i
T04D3903:292b-13: rgyan // brten pa 'od 'bar dri med pa //
T04D3903:292b-14: snang ba 'di ni skyo bo yi //
T04D3903:292b-15: mgrin pa rnams la gdags par mdzod//
T04D3903:292b-16: snang ba dang bcas rgyan 'di ltar //
T04D3903:292b-17: sems can sems la sdong bu bzhin //
T04D3903:292b-19: nam mkha' ji srid gnas par shog / thub pa
T04D3903:292b-20: dgongs pa'i rgyan slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs
T04D3903:292b-21: med 'byung gnas sbas pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T04D3903:292b-23: / rnam gnon tshul mkhas 'ji gas med kyi //
T04D3903:292b-24: gnas la reg pa'i tshul 'di ni //
T04D3903:292b-25: dpal ldan dga' skyong rgyal srid kyi //
T04D3903:292b-26: sum cu'i lo la byas pa yin //
T04D3903:292b-27: phyed dang bcas pa'i stong phrag lnga //
T04D3903:292b-28: mkhas pa rnams kyis sdom pa'i tshad //
T04D3903:292b-30: / tshad bzhin snying la dngos po rnams //
T04D3903:292b-32: bde gshegs bstan pa bsam 'phel nor bu skye bo
T04D3903:292b-33: kun gyi rang gi mi shes mun pas bsgribs nas
T04D3903:292b-34: don med 'gyur // de rtogs don du shes rab
T04D3903:292b-35: sgron ma 'degs par byed pa'i dbang gyur shing rta
T04D3903:292b-36: chen po rnams kyang nub gyur te //
T04D3903:292b-37: 'gro ba kun la shin tu don med lta bur
T04D3903:292b-38: mi 'jigs seng ge'i thugs rje'i spyan gyis rab gzigs
T04D3903:292b-39: nas // yon tan rang bzhin thub chen dgongs pa'i
T04D3903:292b-40: sgron ma 'di ni mi shes mun pa bsal phyir
T04D3903:292b-41: nas // mdzad // de lta na yang 'phags pa'i
T04D3903:292b-42: skad kyis dben pa'i skye bo dag la don med
T04D3903:292b-43: lta bur kho bos rab rtogs nas //
T04D3903:293a-1: kun gyis yid kyi mun pa shin tu stug po
T04D3903:293a-2: rnam par bsal phyir bdag gis legs par 'di bsgyur
T04D3903:293a-3: nas // byung ba'i bsod nams chu 'dzin 'od zer
T04D3903:293a-4: lta bur shin tu gsal zhing dga' ba skyed pa
T04D3903:293a-5: nas // gang yin des // 'di ru skye bo
T04D3903:293a-6: kun gyi yid kyi mun pa shin tu stug po
T04D3903:293a-7: rnam par bsal nas zab mo'i lam rtogs shog //
T04D3903:293a-8: / mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu bde
T04D3903:293a-9: bar gshegs pa'i bka' rab 'byams la shes pa'i snang
T04D3903:293a-10: ba skyes pa'i mkhas pa chen po de nyid las
T04D3903:293a-11: mnyan nas / de nyid kyi zhal sngar sh'a kya'i
T04D3903:293a-12: dge slong dpang zho gsal ba grags zhes bya bas
T04D3903:293a-13: mnyan nas / / yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen
T04D3903:293a-14: po mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas dpal n'a lendrar bsgyur cing
T04D3903:293a-15: zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
T04D3903:293a-17: // / dus phyis lung dang rigs pa'i dbang phyug stag
T04D3903:293a-18: sde pa chen po seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi bka'
T04D3903:293a-19: drin dang / de nyid kyi sras kyi thu bo
T04D3903:293a-20: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyi stobs kyis
T04D3903:293a-21: mtha' yas pa'i shes bya'i chos la dbang bsgyur ba
T04D3903:293a-22: shong ston lo ts'a ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis
T04D3903:293a-23: legs par bshad pa'i srol la sogs pa la brten
T04D3903:293a-24: drin dang / nas / phyi dang nang gi gzhung
T04D3903:293a-25: lugs du ma rnams la blo'i snang ba cher rgyas
T04D3903:293a-26: drin dang / nas / pa / zhu chen gyi
T04D3903:293a-27: lo ts'a ba dpang dge slong dpal ldan blo gros
T04D3903:293a-28: drin dang / nas / pa / brtan pas / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dog shing dbon po dang /
T04D3903:293a-29: bde ba chos kyi bzang po la sogs pas /
T04D3903:293a-30: mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa la brten nas /
T04D3903:293a-31: legs par bcos nas dag par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
T04D3903:293a-34: // / slar yang dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa de nyid
T04D3903:293a-35: kyis gzhung 'di'i skabs dang gzhung lugs gzhan gyi skabs
T04D3903:293a-36: mthun pa ji snyed rnyed pa rnams sbyar zhing rgya
T04D3903:293a-37: dpe dang gtugs te legs par brtags shing dpyad nas
T04D3903:293a-39: don la yang legs par dpyad pas shin tu dag par bgyis pa'o //
T04D3903:293a-40: sgra don snang ba nyin byed 'od //
T04D3903:293a-41: brtson pas yang yang brten pa yis //
T04D3903:293a-42: gzhung mchog zab yangs 'dab brgya'i tshal //
T04D3903:293a-43: dgongs don ge sar rab gsal gyur //
